Soil analyzer using an USB microscope - for Linux PC and Beaglebone Black

31 
54 QCPPainter::QCPPainter()
55  : QPainter(), mModes(pmDefault), mIsAntialiasing(false) {
56  // don't setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefautPen) here, because painter
57  // isn't active yet and
58  // a call to begin() will follow
59 }
60 
70 QCPPainter::QCPPainter(QPaintDevice *device)
71  : QPainter(device), mModes(pmDefault), mIsAntialiasing(false) {
72 #if QT_VERSION < \
73  QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0) // before Qt5, default pens used to be cosmetic if
74  // NonCosmeticDefaultPen flag isn't set. So we set
75  // it to get consistency across Qt versions.
76  if (isActive())
77  setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen);
78 #endif
79 }
80 
81 QCPPainter::~QCPPainter() {}
82 
90 void QCPPainter::setPen(const QPen &pen) {
91  QPainter::setPen(pen);
92  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
93  makeNonCosmetic();
94 }
95 
104 void QCPPainter::setPen(const QColor &color) {
105  QPainter::setPen(color);
106  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
107  makeNonCosmetic();
108 }
109 
118 void QCPPainter::setPen(Qt::PenStyle penStyle) {
119  QPainter::setPen(penStyle);
120  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
121  makeNonCosmetic();
122 }
123 
134 void QCPPainter::drawLine(const QLineF &line) {
135  if (mIsAntialiasing || mModes.testFlag(pmVectorized))
136  QPainter::drawLine(line);
137  else
138  QPainter::drawLine(line.toLine());
139 }
140 
150 void QCPPainter::setAntialiasing(bool enabled) {
151  setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing, enabled);
152  if (mIsAntialiasing != enabled) {
153  mIsAntialiasing = enabled;
154  if (!mModes.testFlag(pmVectorized)) // antialiasing half-pixel shift only
155  // needed for rasterized outputs
156  {
157  if (mIsAntialiasing)
158  translate(0.5, 0.5);
159  else
160  translate(-0.5, -0.5);
161  }
162  }
163 }
164 
170 void QCPPainter::setModes(QCPPainter::PainterModes modes) { mModes = modes; }
171 
187 bool QCPPainter::begin(QPaintDevice *device) {
188  bool result = QPainter::begin(device);
189 #if QT_VERSION < \
190  QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0) // before Qt5, default pens used to be cosmetic if
191  // NonCosmeticDefaultPen flag isn't set. So we set
192  // it to get consistency across Qt versions.
193  if (result)
194  setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen);
195 #endif
196  return result;
197 }
198 
205 void QCPPainter::setMode(QCPPainter::PainterMode mode, bool enabled) {
206  if (!enabled && mModes.testFlag(mode))
207  mModes &= ~mode;
208  else if (enabled && !mModes.testFlag(mode))
209  mModes |= mode;
210 }
211 
222 void QCPPainter::save() {
223  mAntialiasingStack.push(mIsAntialiasing);
224  QPainter::save();
225 }
226 
237 void QCPPainter::restore() {
238  if (!mAntialiasingStack.isEmpty())
239  mIsAntialiasing = mAntialiasingStack.pop();
240  else
241  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Unbalanced save/restore";
242  QPainter::restore();
243 }
244 
250 void QCPPainter::makeNonCosmetic() {
251  if (qFuzzyIsNull(pen().widthF())) {
252  QPen p = pen();
253  p.setWidth(1);
254  QPainter::setPen(p);
255  }
256 }

370 QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle()
371  : mSize(6), mShape(ssNone), mPen(Qt::NoPen), mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
372  mPenDefined(false) {}

433  : mSize(size), mShape(shape), mPen(pen), mBrush(brush),
434  mPenDefined(pen.style() != Qt::NoPen) {}

442  : mSize(5), mShape(ssPixmap), mPen(Qt::NoPen), mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
443  mPixmap(pixmap), mPenDefined(false) {}

459 QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle(const QPainterPath &customPath,
460  const QPen &pen, const QBrush &brush,
461  double size)
462  : mSize(size), mShape(ssCustom), mPen(pen), mBrush(brush),

495  mPenDefined = true;
496  mPen = pen;

517  setShape(ssPixmap);
518  mPixmap = pixmap;
519 }

526 void QCPScatterStyle::setCustomPath(const QPainterPath &customPath) {
527  setShape(ssCustom);
528  mCustomPath = customPath;
529 }

543 void QCPScatterStyle::applyTo(QCPPainter *painter,
544  const QPen &defaultPen) const {
545  painter->setPen(mPenDefined ? mPen : defaultPen);
546  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
547 }
548 
558 void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, QPointF pos) const {
559  drawShape(painter, pos.x(), pos.y());
560 }
561 
565 void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y) const {
566  double w = mSize / 2.0;
567  switch (mShape) {
568  case ssNone:
569  break;
570  case ssDot: {
571  painter->drawLine(QPointF(x, y), QPointF(x + 0.0001, y));
572  break;
573  }
574  case ssCross: {
575  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y - w, x + w, y + w));
576  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y + w, x + w, y - w));
577  break;
578  }
579  case ssPlus: {
580  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y, x + w, y));
581  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y + w, x, y - w));
582  break;
583  }
584  case ssCircle: {
585  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
586  break;
587  }
588  case ssDisc: {
589  QBrush b = painter->brush();
590  painter->setBrush(painter->pen().color());
591  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
592  painter->setBrush(b);
593  break;
594  }
595  case ssSquare: {
596  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x - w, y - w, mSize, mSize));
597  break;
598  }
599  case ssDiamond: {
600  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y, x, y - w));
601  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y - w, x + w, y));
602  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x + w, y, x, y + w));
603  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y + w, x - w, y));
604  break;
605  }
606  case ssStar: {
607  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y, x + w, y));
608  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y + w, x, y - w));
609  painter->drawLine(
610  QLineF(x - w * 0.707, y - w * 0.707, x + w * 0.707, y + w * 0.707));
611  painter->drawLine(
612  QLineF(x - w * 0.707, y + w * 0.707, x + w * 0.707, y - w * 0.707));
613  break;
614  }
615  case ssTriangle: {
616  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y + 0.755 * w, x + w, y + 0.755 * w));
617  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x + w, y + 0.755 * w, x, y - 0.977 * w));
618  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y - 0.977 * w, x - w, y + 0.755 * w));
619  break;
620  }
621  case ssTriangleInverted: {
622  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y - 0.755 * w, x + w, y - 0.755 * w));
623  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x + w, y - 0.755 * w, x, y + 0.977 * w));
624  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y + 0.977 * w, x - w, y - 0.755 * w));
625  break;
626  }
627  case ssCrossSquare: {
628  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y - w, x + w * 0.95, y + w * 0.95));
629  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y + w * 0.95, x + w * 0.95, y - w));
630  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x - w, y - w, mSize, mSize));
631  break;
632  }
633  case ssPlusSquare: {
634  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y, x + w * 0.95, y));
635  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y + w, x, y - w));
636  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x - w, y - w, mSize, mSize));
637  break;
638  }
639  case ssCrossCircle: {
640  painter->drawLine(
641  QLineF(x - w * 0.707, y - w * 0.707, x + w * 0.670, y + w * 0.670));
642  painter->drawLine(
643  QLineF(x - w * 0.707, y + w * 0.670, x + w * 0.670, y - w * 0.707));
644  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
645  break;
646  }
647  case ssPlusCircle: {
648  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x - w, y, x + w, y));
649  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y + w, x, y - w));
650  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
651  break;
652  }
653  case ssPeace: {
654  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y - w, x, y + w));
655  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x - w * 0.707, y + w * 0.707));
656  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x + w * 0.707, y + w * 0.707));
657  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
658  break;
659  }
660  case ssPixmap: {
661  painter->drawPixmap(x - mPixmap.width() * 0.5, y - mPixmap.height() * 0.5,
662  mPixmap);
663  break;
664  }
665  case ssCustom: {
666  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
667  painter->translate(x, y);
668  painter->scale(mSize / 6.0, mSize / 6.0);
669  painter->drawPath(mCustomPath);
670  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
671  break;
672  }
673  }
674 }

763 /* end documentation of inline functions */
764 
775 QCPLayer::QCPLayer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &layerName)
776  : QObject(parentPlot), mParentPlot(parentPlot), mName(layerName),
777  mIndex(-1), // will be set to a proper value by the QCustomPlot layer
778  // creation function
779  mVisible(true) {
780  // Note: no need to make sure layerName is unique, because layer
781  // management is done with QCustomPlot functions.
782 }
783 
784 QCPLayer::~QCPLayer() {
785  // If child layerables are still on this layer, detach them, so they don't try
786  // to reach back to this
787  // then invalid layer once they get deleted/moved themselves. This only
788  // happens when layers are deleted
789  // directly, like in the QCustomPlot destructor. (The regular layer removal
790  // procedure for the user is to
791  // call QCustomPlot::removeLayer, which moves all layerables off this layer
792  // before deleting it.)
793 
794  while (!mChildren.isEmpty())
795  mChildren.last()->setLayer(
796  0); // removes itself from mChildren via removeChild()
797 
798  if (mParentPlot->currentLayer() == this)
799  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "The parent plot's mCurrentLayer will be a "
800  "dangling pointer. Should have been set to a "
801  "valid layer or 0 beforehand.";
802 }
803 
814 void QCPLayer::setVisible(bool visible) { mVisible = visible; }
815 
829 void QCPLayer::addChild(QCPLayerable *layerable, bool prepend) {
830  if (!mChildren.contains(layerable)) {
831  if (prepend)
832  mChildren.prepend(layerable);
833  else
834  mChildren.append(layerable);
835  } else
836  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layerable is already child of this layer"
837  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layerable);
838 }
839 
850 void QCPLayer::removeChild(QCPLayerable *layerable) {
851  if (!mChildren.removeOne(layerable))
852  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layerable is not child of this layer"
853  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layerable);
854 }
855

972 
999 QCPLayerable::QCPLayerable(QCustomPlot *plot, QString targetLayer,
1000  QCPLayerable *parentLayerable)
1001  : QObject(plot), mVisible(true), mParentPlot(plot),
1002  mParentLayerable(parentLayerable), mLayer(0), mAntialiased(true) {
1003  if (mParentPlot) {
1004  if (targetLayer.isEmpty())
1005  setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer());
1006  else if (!setLayer(targetLayer))
1007  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "setting QCPlayerable initial layer to"
1008  << targetLayer << "failed.";
1009  }
1010 }
1011 
1012 QCPLayerable::~QCPLayerable() {
1013  if (mLayer) {
1014  mLayer->removeChild(this);
1015  mLayer = 0;
1016  }
1017 }
1018 
1026 void QCPLayerable::setVisible(bool on) { mVisible = on; }
1027 
1035 bool QCPLayerable::setLayer(QCPLayer *layer) {
1036  return moveToLayer(layer, false);
1037 }
1038 
1044 bool QCPLayerable::setLayer(const QString &layerName) {
1045  if (!mParentPlot) {
1046  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent QCustomPlot set";
1047  return false;
1048  }
1049  if (QCPLayer *layer = mParentPlot->layer(layerName)) {
1050  return setLayer(layer);
1051  } else {
1052  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "there is no layer with name" << layerName;
1053  return false;
1054  }
1055 }
1056 
1064 void QCPLayerable::setAntialiased(bool enabled) { mAntialiased = enabled; }
1065 
1085 bool QCPLayerable::realVisibility() const {
1086  return mVisible && (!mLayer || mLayer->visible()) &&
1087  (!mParentLayerable || mParentLayerable.data()->realVisibility());
1088 }
1089 
1145 double QCPLayerable::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
1146  QVariant *details) const {
1147  Q_UNUSED(pos)
1148  Q_UNUSED(onlySelectable)
1149  Q_UNUSED(details)
1150  return -1.0;
1151 }
1152 
1177 void QCPLayerable::initializeParentPlot(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) {
1178  if (mParentPlot) {
1179  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called with mParentPlot already initialized";
1180  return;
1181  }
1182 
1183  if (!parentPlot)
1184  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called with parentPlot zero";
1185 
1186  mParentPlot = parentPlot;
1187  parentPlotInitialized(mParentPlot);
1188 }
1189 
1204 void QCPLayerable::setParentLayerable(QCPLayerable *parentLayerable) {
1205  mParentLayerable = parentLayerable;
1206 }
1207 
1218 bool QCPLayerable::moveToLayer(QCPLayer *layer, bool prepend) {
1219  if (layer && !mParentPlot) {
1220  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent QCustomPlot set";
1221  return false;
1222  }
1223  if (layer && layer->parentPlot() != mParentPlot) {
1224  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer" << layer->name()
1225  << "is not in same QCustomPlot as this layerable";
1226  return false;
1227  }
1228 
1229  QCPLayer *oldLayer = mLayer;
1230  if (mLayer)
1231  mLayer->removeChild(this);
1232  mLayer = layer;
1233  if (mLayer)
1234  mLayer->addChild(this, prepend);
1235  if (mLayer != oldLayer)
1236  emit layerChanged(mLayer);
1237  return true;
1238 }
1239 
1250 void QCPLayerable::applyAntialiasingHint(
1251  QCPPainter *painter, bool localAntialiased,
1252  QCP::AntialiasedElement overrideElement) const {
1253  if (mParentPlot &&
1254  mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements().testFlag(overrideElement))
1255  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
1256  else if (mParentPlot &&
1257  mParentPlot->antialiasedElements().testFlag(overrideElement))
1258  painter->setAntialiasing(true);
1259  else
1260  painter->setAntialiasing(localAntialiased);
1261 }
1262 
1285 void QCPLayerable::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) {
1286  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
1287 }
1288 
1303 QCP::Interaction QCPLayerable::selectionCategory() const {
1304  return QCP::iSelectOther;
1305 }
1306 
1319 QRect QCPLayerable::clipRect() const {
1320  if (mParentPlot)
1321  return mParentPlot->viewport();
1322  else
1323  return QRect();
1324 }

1374  Q_UNUSED(details)
1375  Q_UNUSED(selectionStateChanged)
1376 }

1401 
1419 const double QCPRange::minRange = 1e-280;
1420 
1432 const double QCPRange::maxRange = 1e250;
1433 
1437 QCPRange::QCPRange() : lower(0), upper(0) {}
1438 
1442 QCPRange::QCPRange(double lower, double upper) : lower(lower), upper(upper) {
1443  normalize();
1444 }
1445 
1449 double QCPRange::size() const { return upper - lower; }
1450 
1454 double QCPRange::center() const { return (upper + lower) * 0.5; }
1455 
1461 void QCPRange::normalize() {
1462  if (lower > upper)
1463  qSwap(lower, upper);
1464 }
1465 
1476 void QCPRange::expand(const QCPRange &otherRange) {
1477  if (lower > otherRange.lower)
1478  lower = otherRange.lower;
1479  if (upper < otherRange.upper)
1480  upper = otherRange.upper;
1481 }
1482 
1490 QCPRange QCPRange::expanded(const QCPRange &otherRange) const {
1491  QCPRange result = *this;
1492  result.expand(otherRange);
1493  return result;
1494 }
1495 
1515 QCPRange QCPRange::sanitizedForLogScale() const {
1516  double rangeFac = 1e-3;
1517  QCPRange sanitizedRange(lower, upper);
1518  sanitizedRange.normalize();
1519  // can't have range spanning negative and positive values in log plot, so
1520  // change range to fix it
1521  // if (qFuzzyCompare(sanitizedRange.lower+1, 1) &&
1522  // !qFuzzyCompare(sanitizedRange.upper+1, 1))
1523  if (sanitizedRange.lower == 0.0 && sanitizedRange.upper != 0.0) {
1524  // case lower is 0
1525  if (rangeFac < sanitizedRange.upper * rangeFac)
1526  sanitizedRange.lower = rangeFac;
1527  else
1528  sanitizedRange.lower = sanitizedRange.upper * rangeFac;
1529  } // else if (!qFuzzyCompare(lower+1, 1) && qFuzzyCompare(upper+1, 1))
1530  else if (sanitizedRange.lower != 0.0 && sanitizedRange.upper == 0.0) {
1531  // case upper is 0
1532  if (-rangeFac > sanitizedRange.lower * rangeFac)
1533  sanitizedRange.upper = -rangeFac;
1534  else
1535  sanitizedRange.upper = sanitizedRange.lower * rangeFac;
1536  } else if (sanitizedRange.lower < 0 && sanitizedRange.upper > 0) {
1537  // find out whether negative or positive interval is wider to decide which
1538  // sign domain will be chosen
1539  if (-sanitizedRange.lower > sanitizedRange.upper) {
1540  // negative is wider, do same as in case upper is 0
1541  if (-rangeFac > sanitizedRange.lower * rangeFac)
1542  sanitizedRange.upper = -rangeFac;
1543  else
1544  sanitizedRange.upper = sanitizedRange.lower * rangeFac;
1545  } else {
1546  // positive is wider, do same as in case lower is 0
1547  if (rangeFac < sanitizedRange.upper * rangeFac)
1548  sanitizedRange.lower = rangeFac;
1549  else
1550  sanitizedRange.lower = sanitizedRange.upper * rangeFac;
1551  }
1552  }
1553  // due to normalization, case lower>0 && upper<0 should never occur, because
1554  // that implies upper<lower
1555  return sanitizedRange;
1556 }
1557 
1563 QCPRange QCPRange::sanitizedForLinScale() const {
1564  QCPRange sanitizedRange(lower, upper);
1565  sanitizedRange.normalize();
1566  return sanitizedRange;
1567 }
1568 
1572 bool QCPRange::contains(double value) const {
1573  return value >= lower && value <= upper;
1574 }
1575 
1584 bool QCPRange::validRange(double lower, double upper) {
1585  /*
1586  return (lower > -maxRange &&
1587  upper < maxRange &&
1588  qAbs(lower-upper) > minRange &&
1589  (lower < -minRange || lower > minRange) &&
1590  (upper < -minRange || upper > minRange));
1591  */
1592  return (lower > -maxRange && upper < maxRange &&
1593  qAbs(lower - upper) > minRange && qAbs(lower - upper) < maxRange);
1594 }
1595 
1605 bool QCPRange::validRange(const QCPRange &range) {
1606  /*
1607  return (range.lower > -maxRange &&
1608  range.upper < maxRange &&
1609  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) > minRange &&
1610  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) < maxRange &&
1611  (range.lower < -minRange || range.lower > minRange) &&
1612  (range.upper < -minRange || range.upper > minRange));
1613  */
1614  return (range.lower > -maxRange && range.upper < maxRange &&
1615  qAbs(range.lower - range.upper) > minRange &&
1616  qAbs(range.lower - range.upper) < maxRange);
1617 }
1618 
1622 
1667 /* start documentation of inline functions */
1668 
1677 /* end documentation of inline functions */
1678 
1682 QCPMarginGroup::QCPMarginGroup(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
1683  : QObject(parentPlot), mParentPlot(parentPlot) {
1684  mChildren.insert(QCP::msLeft, QList<QCPLayoutElement *>());
1685  mChildren.insert(QCP::msRight, QList<QCPLayoutElement *>());
1686  mChildren.insert(QCP::msTop, QList<QCPLayoutElement *>());
1687  mChildren.insert(QCP::msBottom, QList<QCPLayoutElement *>());
1688 }
1689 
1690 QCPMarginGroup::~QCPMarginGroup() { clear(); }
1691 
1697 bool QCPMarginGroup::isEmpty() const {
1698  QHashIterator<QCP::MarginSide, QList<QCPLayoutElement *>> it(mChildren);
1699  while (it.hasNext()) {
1700  it.next();
1701  if (!it.value().isEmpty())
1702  return false;
1703  }
1704  return true;
1705 }
1706 
1712 void QCPMarginGroup::clear() {
1713  // make all children remove themselves from this margin group:
1714  QHashIterator<QCP::MarginSide, QList<QCPLayoutElement *>> it(mChildren);
1715  while (it.hasNext()) {
1716  it.next();
1717  const QList<QCPLayoutElement *> elements = it.value();
1718  for (int i = elements.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i)
1719  elements.at(i)->setMarginGroup(
1720  it.key(), 0); // removes itself from mChildren via removeChild
1721  }
1722 }
1723 
1737 int QCPMarginGroup::commonMargin(QCP::MarginSide side) const {
1738  // query all automatic margins of the layout elements in this margin group
1739  // side and find maximum:
1740  int result = 0;
1741  const QList<QCPLayoutElement *> elements = mChildren.value(side);
1742  for (int i = 0; i < elements.size(); ++i) {
1743  if (!elements.at(i)->autoMargins().testFlag(side))
1744  continue;
1745  int m = qMax(elements.at(i)->calculateAutoMargin(side),
1746  QCP::getMarginValue(elements.at(i)->minimumMargins(), side));
1747  if (m > result)
1748  result = m;
1749  }
1750  return result;
1751 }
1752 
1760 void QCPMarginGroup::addChild(QCP::MarginSide side, QCPLayoutElement *element) {
1761  if (!mChildren[side].contains(element))
1762  mChildren[side].append(element);
1763  else
1764  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
1765  << "element is already child of this margin group side"
1766  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(element);
1767 }
1768 
1776 void QCPMarginGroup::removeChild(QCP::MarginSide side,
1777  QCPLayoutElement *element) {
1778  if (!mChildren[side].removeOne(element))
1779  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "element is not child of this margin group side"
1780  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(element);
1781 }
1782 
1786 
1830 /* start documentation of inline functions */
1831 
1891 /* end documentation of inline functions */
1892 
1896 QCPLayoutElement::QCPLayoutElement(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
1897  : QCPLayerable(parentPlot), // parenthood is changed as soon as layout
1898  // element gets inserted into a layout (except
1899  // for top level layout)
1900  mParentLayout(0), mMinimumSize(),
1901  mMaximumSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, QWIDGETSIZE_MAX), mRect(0, 0, 0, 0),
1902  mOuterRect(0, 0, 0, 0), mMargins(0, 0, 0, 0), mMinimumMargins(0, 0, 0, 0),
1903  mAutoMargins(QCP::msAll) {}
1904 
1905 QCPLayoutElement::~QCPLayoutElement() {
1906  setMarginGroup(QCP::msAll,
1907  0); // unregister at margin groups, if there are any
1908  // unregister at layout:
1909  if (qobject_cast<QCPLayout *>(mParentLayout)) // the qobject_cast is just a
1910  // safeguard in case the layout
1911  // forgets to call clear() in
1912  // its dtor and this dtor is
1913  // called by QObject dtor
1914  mParentLayout->take(this);
1915 }
1916 
1931 void QCPLayoutElement::setOuterRect(const QRect &rect) {
1932  if (mOuterRect != rect) {
1933  mOuterRect = rect;
1934  mRect = mOuterRect.adjusted(mMargins.left(), mMargins.top(),
1935  -mMargins.right(), -mMargins.bottom());
1936  }
1937 }
1938 
1954 void QCPLayoutElement::setMargins(const QMargins &margins) {
1955  if (mMargins != margins) {
1956  mMargins = margins;
1957  mRect = mOuterRect.adjusted(mMargins.left(), mMargins.top(),
1958  -mMargins.right(), -mMargins.bottom());
1959  }
1960 }
1961 
1973 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumMargins(const QMargins &margins) {
1974  if (mMinimumMargins != margins) {
1975  mMinimumMargins = margins;
1976  }
1977 }
1978 
1994 void QCPLayoutElement::setAutoMargins(QCP::MarginSides sides) {
1995  mAutoMargins = sides;
1996 }
1997 
2012 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumSize(const QSize &size) {
2013  if (mMinimumSize != size) {
2014  mMinimumSize = size;
2015  if (mParentLayout)
2016  mParentLayout->sizeConstraintsChanged();
2017  }
2018 }
2019 
2024 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumSize(int width, int height) {
2025  setMinimumSize(QSize(width, height));
2026 }
2027 
2034 void QCPLayoutElement::setMaximumSize(const QSize &size) {
2035  if (mMaximumSize != size) {
2036  mMaximumSize = size;
2037  if (mParentLayout)
2038  mParentLayout->sizeConstraintsChanged();
2039  }
2040 }
2041 
2046 void QCPLayoutElement::setMaximumSize(int width, int height) {
2047  setMaximumSize(QSize(width, height));
2048 }
2049 
2063 void QCPLayoutElement::setMarginGroup(QCP::MarginSides sides,
2064  QCPMarginGroup *group) {
2065  QVector<QCP::MarginSide> sideVector;
2066  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msLeft))
2067  sideVector.append(QCP::msLeft);
2068  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msRight))
2069  sideVector.append(QCP::msRight);
2070  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msTop))
2071  sideVector.append(QCP::msTop);
2072  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msBottom))
2073  sideVector.append(QCP::msBottom);
2074 
2075  for (int i = 0; i < sideVector.size(); ++i) {
2076  QCP::MarginSide side = sideVector.at(i);
2077  if (marginGroup(side) != group) {
2078  QCPMarginGroup *oldGroup = marginGroup(side);
2079  if (oldGroup) // unregister at old group
2080  oldGroup->removeChild(side, this);
2081 
2082  if (!group) // if setting to 0, remove hash entry. Else set hash entry to
2083  // new group and register there
2084  {
2085  mMarginGroups.remove(side);
2086  } else // setting to a new group
2087  {
2088  mMarginGroups[side] = group;
2089  group->addChild(side, this);
2090  }
2091  }
2092  }
2093 }
2094 
2112 void QCPLayoutElement::update(UpdatePhase phase) {
2113  if (phase == upMargins) {
2114  if (mAutoMargins != QCP::msNone) {
2115  // set the margins of this layout element according to automatic margin
2116  // calculation, either directly or via a margin group:
2117  QMargins newMargins = mMargins;
2118  QList<QCP::MarginSide> allMarginSides = QList<QCP::MarginSide>()
2119  << QCP::msLeft << QCP::msRight
2120  << QCP::msTop << QCP::msBottom;
2121  foreach (QCP::MarginSide side, allMarginSides) {
2122  if (mAutoMargins.testFlag(
2123  side)) // this side's margin shall be calculated automatically
2124  {
2125  if (mMarginGroups.contains(side))
2126  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side,
2127  mMarginGroups[side]->commonMargin(
2128  side)); // this side is part of a margin
2129  // group, so get the margin value
2130  // from that group
2131  else
2132  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side,
2133  calculateAutoMargin(side)); // this side is not
2134  // part of a group,
2135  // so calculate the
2136  // value directly
2137  // apply minimum margin restrictions:
2138  if (QCP::getMarginValue(newMargins, side) <
2139  QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side))
2140  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side,
2141  QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side));
2142  }
2143  }
2144  setMargins(newMargins);
2145  }
2146  }
2147 }
2148 
2159 QSize QCPLayoutElement::minimumSizeHint() const { return mMinimumSize; }
2160 
2171 QSize QCPLayoutElement::maximumSizeHint() const { return mMaximumSize; }
2172 
2182 QList<QCPLayoutElement *> QCPLayoutElement::elements(bool recursive) const {
2183  Q_UNUSED(recursive)
2184  return QList<QCPLayoutElement *>();
2185 }
2186 
2203 double QCPLayoutElement::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
2204  QVariant *details) const {
2205  Q_UNUSED(details)
2206 
2207  if (onlySelectable)
2208  return -1;
2209 
2210  if (QRectF(mOuterRect).contains(pos)) {
2211  if (mParentPlot)
2212  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
2213  else {
2214  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "parent plot not defined";
2215  return -1;
2216  }
2217  } else
2218  return -1;
2219 }
2220 
2227 void QCPLayoutElement::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) {
2228  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *el, elements(false)) {
2229  if (!el->parentPlot())
2230  el->initializeParentPlot(parentPlot);
2231  }
2232 }
2233 
2246 int QCPLayoutElement::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side) {
2247  return qMax(QCP::getMarginValue(mMargins, side),
2248  QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side));
2249 }
2250 
2254 
2288 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
2289 
2339 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
2340 
2346 QCPLayout::QCPLayout() {}
2347 
2358 void QCPLayout::update(UpdatePhase phase) {
2359  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
2360 
2361  // set child element rects according to layout:
2362  if (phase == upLayout)
2363  updateLayout();
2364 
2365  // propagate update call to child elements:
2366  const int elCount = elementCount();
2367  for (int i = 0; i < elCount; ++i) {
2368  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(i))
2369  el->update(phase);
2370  }
2371 }
2372 
2373 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2374 QList<QCPLayoutElement *> QCPLayout::elements(bool recursive) const {
2375  const int c = elementCount();
2376  QList<QCPLayoutElement *> result;
2377 #if QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0)
2378  result.reserve(c);
2379 #endif
2380  for (int i = 0; i < c; ++i)
2381  result.append(elementAt(i));
2382  if (recursive) {
2383  for (int i = 0; i < c; ++i) {
2384  if (result.at(i))
2385  result << result.at(i)->elements(recursive);
2386  }
2387  }
2388  return result;
2389 }
2390 
2400 void QCPLayout::simplify() {}
2401 
2417 bool QCPLayout::removeAt(int index) {
2418  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = takeAt(index)) {
2419  delete el;
2420  return true;
2421  } else
2422  return false;
2423 }
2424 
2440 bool QCPLayout::remove(QCPLayoutElement *element) {
2441  if (take(element)) {
2442  delete element;
2443  return true;
2444  } else
2445  return false;
2446 }
2447 
2455 void QCPLayout::clear() {
2456  for (int i = elementCount() - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
2457  if (elementAt(i))
2458  removeAt(i);
2459  }
2460  simplify();
2461 }
2462 
2475 void QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged() const {
2476  if (QWidget *w = qobject_cast<QWidget *>(parent()))
2477  w->updateGeometry();
2478  else if (QCPLayout *l = qobject_cast<QCPLayout *>(parent()))
2479  l->sizeConstraintsChanged();
2480 }
2481 
2497 void QCPLayout::updateLayout() {}
2498 
2514 void QCPLayout::adoptElement(QCPLayoutElement *el) {
2515  if (el) {
2516  el->mParentLayout = this;
2517  el->setParentLayerable(this);
2518  el->setParent(this);
2519  if (!el->parentPlot())
2520  el->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
2521  } else
2522  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Null element passed";
2523 }
2524 
2539 void QCPLayout::releaseElement(QCPLayoutElement *el) {
2540  if (el) {
2541  el->mParentLayout = 0;
2542  el->setParentLayerable(0);
2543  el->setParent(mParentPlot);
2544  // Note: Don't initializeParentPlot(0) here, because layout element will
2545  // stay in same parent plot
2546  } else
2547  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Null element passed";
2548 }
2549 
2593 QVector<int> QCPLayout::getSectionSizes(QVector<int> maxSizes,
2594  QVector<int> minSizes,
2595  QVector<double> stretchFactors,
2596  int totalSize) const {
2597  if (maxSizes.size() != minSizes.size() ||
2598  minSizes.size() != stretchFactors.size()) {
2599  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed vector sizes aren't equal:" << maxSizes
2600  << minSizes << stretchFactors;
2601  return QVector<int>();
2602  }
2603  if (stretchFactors.isEmpty())
2604  return QVector<int>();
2605  int sectionCount = stretchFactors.size();
2606  QVector<double> sectionSizes(sectionCount);
2607  // if provided total size is forced smaller than total minimum size, ignore
2608  // minimum sizes (squeeze sections):
2609  int minSizeSum = 0;
2610  for (int i = 0; i < sectionCount; ++i)
2611  minSizeSum += minSizes.at(i);
2612  if (totalSize < minSizeSum) {
2613  // new stretch factors are minimum sizes and minimum sizes are set to zero:
2614  for (int i = 0; i < sectionCount; ++i) {
2615  stretchFactors[i] = minSizes.at(i);
2616  minSizes[i] = 0;
2617  }
2618  }
2619 
2620  QList<int> minimumLockedSections;
2621  QList<int> unfinishedSections;
2622  for (int i = 0; i < sectionCount; ++i)
2623  unfinishedSections.append(i);
2624  double freeSize = totalSize;
2625 
2626  int outerIterations = 0;
2627  while (!unfinishedSections.isEmpty() &&
2628  outerIterations < sectionCount * 2) // the iteration check ist just a
2629  // failsafe in case something
2630  // really strange happens
2631  {
2632  ++outerIterations;
2633  int innerIterations = 0;
2634  while (!unfinishedSections.isEmpty() &&
2635  innerIterations < sectionCount * 2) // the iteration check ist just a
2636  // failsafe in case something
2637  // really strange happens
2638  {
2639  ++innerIterations;
2640  // find section that hits its maximum next:
2641  int nextId = -1;
2642  double nextMax = 1e12;
2643  for (int i = 0; i < unfinishedSections.size(); ++i) {
2644  int secId = unfinishedSections.at(i);
2645  double hitsMaxAt = (maxSizes.at(secId) - sectionSizes.at(secId)) /
2646  stretchFactors.at(secId);
2647  if (hitsMaxAt < nextMax) {
2648  nextMax = hitsMaxAt;
2649  nextId = secId;
2650  }
2651  }
2652  // check if that maximum is actually within the bounds of the total size
2653  // (i.e. can we stretch all remaining sections so far that the found
2654  // section
2655  // actually hits its maximum, without exceeding the total size when we add
2656  // up all sections)
2657  double stretchFactorSum = 0;
2658  for (int i = 0; i < unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2659  stretchFactorSum += stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i));
2660  double nextMaxLimit = freeSize / stretchFactorSum;
2661  if (nextMax < nextMaxLimit) // next maximum is actually hit, move forward
2662  // to that point and fix the size of that
2663  // section
2664  {
2665  for (int i = 0; i < unfinishedSections.size(); ++i) {
2666  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] +=
2667  nextMax *
2668  stretchFactors.at(
2669  unfinishedSections.at(i)); // increment all sections
2670  freeSize -= nextMax * stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i));
2671  }
2672  unfinishedSections.removeOne(nextId); // exclude the section that is now
2673  // at maximum from further changes
2674  } else // next maximum isn't hit, just distribute rest of free space on
2675  // remaining sections
2676  {
2677  for (int i = 0; i < unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2678  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] +=
2679  nextMaxLimit *
2680  stretchFactors.at(
2681  unfinishedSections.at(i)); // increment all sections
2682  unfinishedSections.clear();
2683  }
2684  }
2685  if (innerIterations == sectionCount * 2)
2686  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
2687  << "Exceeded maximum expected inner iteration count, layouting "
2688  "aborted. Input was:" << maxSizes << minSizes
2689  << stretchFactors << totalSize;
2690 
2691  // now check whether the resulting section sizes violate minimum
2692  // restrictions:
2693  bool foundMinimumViolation = false;
2694  for (int i = 0; i < sectionSizes.size(); ++i) {
2695  if (minimumLockedSections.contains(i))
2696  continue;
2697  if (sectionSizes.at(i) < minSizes.at(i)) // section violates minimum
2698  {
2699  sectionSizes[i] = minSizes.at(i); // set it to minimum
2700  foundMinimumViolation =
2701  true; // make sure we repeat the whole optimization process
2702  minimumLockedSections.append(i);
2703  }
2704  }
2705  if (foundMinimumViolation) {
2706  freeSize = totalSize;
2707  for (int i = 0; i < sectionCount; ++i) {
2708  if (!minimumLockedSections.contains(i)) // only put sections that
2709  // haven't hit their minimum
2710  // back into the pool
2711  unfinishedSections.append(i);
2712  else
2713  freeSize -= sectionSizes.at(i); // remove size of minimum locked
2714  // sections from available space in
2715  // next round
2716  }
2717  // reset all section sizes to zero that are in unfinished sections (all
2718  // others have been set to their minimum):
2719  for (int i = 0; i < unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2720  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] = 0;
2721  }
2722  }
2723  if (outerIterations == sectionCount * 2)
2724  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
2725  << "Exceeded maximum expected outer iteration count, layouting "
2726  "aborted. Input was:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors
2727  << totalSize;
2728 
2729  QVector<int> result(sectionCount);
2730  for (int i = 0; i < sectionCount; ++i)
2731  result[i] = qRound(sectionSizes.at(i));
2732  return result;
2733 }
2734 
2738 
2766 QCPLayoutGrid::QCPLayoutGrid() : mColumnSpacing(5), mRowSpacing(5) {}
2767 
2768 QCPLayoutGrid::~QCPLayoutGrid() {
2769  // clear all child layout elements. This is important because only the
2770  // specific layouts know how
2771  // to handle removing elements (clear calls virtual removeAt method to do
2772  // that).
2773  clear();
2774 }
2775 
2786 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::element(int row, int column) const {
2787  if (row >= 0 && row < mElements.size()) {
2788  if (column >= 0 && column < mElements.first().size()) {
2789  if (QCPLayoutElement *result = mElements.at(row).at(column))
2790  return result;
2791  else
2792  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Requested cell is empty. Row:" << row
2793  << "Column:" << column;
2794  } else
2795  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid column. Row:" << row
2796  << "Column:" << column;
2797  } else
2798  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid row. Row:" << row
2799  << "Column:" << column;
2800  return 0;
2801 }
2802 
2808 int QCPLayoutGrid::rowCount() const { return mElements.size(); }
2809 
2815 int QCPLayoutGrid::columnCount() const {
2816  if (mElements.size() > 0)
2817  return mElements.first().size();
2818  else
2819  return 0;
2820 }
2821 
2835 bool QCPLayoutGrid::addElement(int row, int column, QCPLayoutElement *element) {
2836  if (element) {
2837  if (!hasElement(row, column)) {
2838  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
2839  element->layout()->take(element);
2840  expandTo(row + 1, column + 1);
2841  mElements[row][column] = element;
2842  adoptElement(element);
2843  return true;
2844  } else
2845  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
2846  << "There is already an element in the specified row/column:"
2847  << row << column;
2848  } else
2849  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element to row/column:" << row
2850  << column;
2851  return false;
2852 }
2853 
2861 bool QCPLayoutGrid::hasElement(int row, int column) {
2862  if (row >= 0 && row < rowCount() && column >= 0 && column < columnCount())
2863  return mElements.at(row).at(column);
2864  else
2865  return false;
2866 }
2867 
2881 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnStretchFactor(int column, double factor) {
2882  if (column >= 0 && column < columnCount()) {
2883  if (factor > 0)
2884  mColumnStretchFactors[column] = factor;
2885  else
2886  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
2887  << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << factor;
2888  } else
2889  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid column:" << column;
2890 }
2891 
2906 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnStretchFactors(const QList<double> &factors) {
2907  if (factors.size() == mColumnStretchFactors.size()) {
2908  mColumnStretchFactors = factors;
2909  for (int i = 0; i < mColumnStretchFactors.size(); ++i) {
2910  if (mColumnStretchFactors.at(i) <= 0) {
2911  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:"
2912  << mColumnStretchFactors.at(i);
2913  mColumnStretchFactors[i] = 1;
2914  }
2915  }
2916  } else
2917  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
2918  << "Column count not equal to passed stretch factor count:"
2919  << factors;
2920 }
2921 
2935 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowStretchFactor(int row, double factor) {
2936  if (row >= 0 && row < rowCount()) {
2937  if (factor > 0)
2938  mRowStretchFactors[row] = factor;
2939  else
2940  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
2941  << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << factor;
2942  } else
2943  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid row:" << row;
2944 }
2945 
2960 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowStretchFactors(const QList<double> &factors) {
2961  if (factors.size() == mRowStretchFactors.size()) {
2962  mRowStretchFactors = factors;
2963  for (int i = 0; i < mRowStretchFactors.size(); ++i) {
2964  if (mRowStretchFactors.at(i) <= 0) {
2965  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:"
2966  << mRowStretchFactors.at(i);
2967  mRowStretchFactors[i] = 1;
2968  }
2969  }
2970  } else
2971  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
2972  << "Row count not equal to passed stretch factor count:"
2973  << factors;
2974 }
2975 
2981 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnSpacing(int pixels) { mColumnSpacing = pixels; }
2982 
2988 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowSpacing(int pixels) { mRowSpacing = pixels; }
2989 
3008 void QCPLayoutGrid::expandTo(int newRowCount, int newColumnCount) {
3009  // add rows as necessary:
3010  while (rowCount() < newRowCount) {
3011  mElements.append(QList<QCPLayoutElement *>());
3012  mRowStretchFactors.append(1);
3013  }
3014  // go through rows and expand columns as necessary:
3015  int newColCount = qMax(columnCount(), newColumnCount);
3016  for (int i = 0; i < rowCount(); ++i) {
3017  while (mElements.at(i).size() < newColCount)
3018  mElements[i].append(0);
3019  }
3020  while (mColumnStretchFactors.size() < newColCount)
3021  mColumnStretchFactors.append(1);
3022 }
3023 
3032 void QCPLayoutGrid::insertRow(int newIndex) {
3033  if (mElements.isEmpty() ||
3034  mElements.first()
3035  .isEmpty()) // if grid is completely empty, add first cell
3036  {
3037  expandTo(1, 1);
3038  return;
3039  }
3040 
3041  if (newIndex < 0)
3042  newIndex = 0;
3043  if (newIndex > rowCount())
3044  newIndex = rowCount();
3045 
3046  mRowStretchFactors.insert(newIndex, 1);
3047  QList<QCPLayoutElement *> newRow;
3048  for (int col = 0; col < columnCount(); ++col)
3049  newRow.append((QCPLayoutElement *)0);
3050  mElements.insert(newIndex, newRow);
3051 }
3052 
3061 void QCPLayoutGrid::insertColumn(int newIndex) {
3062  if (mElements.isEmpty() ||
3063  mElements.first()
3064  .isEmpty()) // if grid is completely empty, add first cell
3065  {
3066  expandTo(1, 1);
3067  return;
3068  }
3069 
3070  if (newIndex < 0)
3071  newIndex = 0;
3072  if (newIndex > columnCount())
3073  newIndex = columnCount();
3074 
3075  mColumnStretchFactors.insert(newIndex, 1);
3076  for (int row = 0; row < rowCount(); ++row)
3077  mElements[row].insert(newIndex, (QCPLayoutElement *)0);
3078 }
3079 
3080 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3081 void QCPLayoutGrid::updateLayout() {
3082  QVector<int> minColWidths, minRowHeights, maxColWidths, maxRowHeights;
3083  getMinimumRowColSizes(&minColWidths, &minRowHeights);
3084  getMaximumRowColSizes(&maxColWidths, &maxRowHeights);
3085 
3086  int totalRowSpacing = (rowCount() - 1) * mRowSpacing;
3087  int totalColSpacing = (columnCount() - 1) * mColumnSpacing;
3088  QVector<int> colWidths = getSectionSizes(maxColWidths, minColWidths,
3089  mColumnStretchFactors.toVector(),
3090  mRect.width() - totalColSpacing);
3091  QVector<int> rowHeights = getSectionSizes(maxRowHeights, minRowHeights,
3092  mRowStretchFactors.toVector(),
3093  mRect.height() - totalRowSpacing);
3094 
3095  // go through cells and set rects accordingly:
3096  int yOffset = mRect.top();
3097  for (int row = 0; row < rowCount(); ++row) {
3098  if (row > 0)
3099  yOffset += rowHeights.at(row - 1) + mRowSpacing;
3100  int xOffset = mRect.left();
3101  for (int col = 0; col < columnCount(); ++col) {
3102  if (col > 0)
3103  xOffset += colWidths.at(col - 1) + mColumnSpacing;
3104  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
3105  mElements.at(row).at(col)->setOuterRect(
3106  QRect(xOffset, yOffset, colWidths.at(col), rowHeights.at(row)));
3107  }
3108  }
3109 }
3110 
3111 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3112 int QCPLayoutGrid::elementCount() const { return rowCount() * columnCount(); }
3113 
3114 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3115 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::elementAt(int index) const {
3116  if (index >= 0 && index < elementCount())
3117  return mElements.at(index / columnCount()).at(index % columnCount());
3118  else
3119  return 0;
3120 }
3121 
3122 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3123 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::takeAt(int index) {
3124  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(index)) {
3125  releaseElement(el);
3126  mElements[index / columnCount()][index % columnCount()] = 0;
3127  return el;
3128  } else {
3129  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Attempt to take invalid index:" << index;
3130  return 0;
3131  }
3132 }
3133 
3134 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3135 bool QCPLayoutGrid::take(QCPLayoutElement *element) {
3136  if (element) {
3137  for (int i = 0; i < elementCount(); ++i) {
3138  if (elementAt(i) == element) {
3139  takeAt(i);
3140  return true;
3141  }
3142  }
3143  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Element not in this layout, couldn't take";
3144  } else
3145  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't take null element";
3146  return false;
3147 }
3148 
3149 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3150 QList<QCPLayoutElement *> QCPLayoutGrid::elements(bool recursive) const {
3151  QList<QCPLayoutElement *> result;
3152  int colC = columnCount();
3153  int rowC = rowCount();
3154 #if QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0)
3155  result.reserve(colC * rowC);
3156 #endif
3157  for (int row = 0; row < rowC; ++row) {
3158  for (int col = 0; col < colC; ++col) {
3159  result.append(mElements.at(row).at(col));
3160  }
3161  }
3162  if (recursive) {
3163  int c = result.size();
3164  for (int i = 0; i < c; ++i) {
3165  if (result.at(i))
3166  result << result.at(i)->elements(recursive);
3167  }
3168  }
3169  return result;
3170 }
3171 
3176 void QCPLayoutGrid::simplify() {
3177  // remove rows with only empty cells:
3178  for (int row = rowCount() - 1; row >= 0; --row) {
3179  bool hasElements = false;
3180  for (int col = 0; col < columnCount(); ++col) {
3181  if (mElements.at(row).at(col)) {
3182  hasElements = true;
3183  break;
3184  }
3185  }
3186  if (!hasElements) {
3187  mRowStretchFactors.removeAt(row);
3188  mElements.removeAt(row);
3189  if (mElements.isEmpty()) // removed last element, also remove stretch
3190  // factor (wouldn't happen below because also
3191  // columnCount changed to 0 now)
3192  mColumnStretchFactors.clear();
3193  }
3194  }
3195 
3196  // remove columns with only empty cells:
3197  for (int col = columnCount() - 1; col >= 0; --col) {
3198  bool hasElements = false;
3199  for (int row = 0; row < rowCount(); ++row) {
3200  if (mElements.at(row).at(col)) {
3201  hasElements = true;
3202  break;
3203  }
3204  }
3205  if (!hasElements) {
3206  mColumnStretchFactors.removeAt(col);
3207  for (int row = 0; row < rowCount(); ++row)
3208  mElements[row].removeAt(col);
3209  }
3210  }
3211 }
3212 
3213 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3214 QSize QCPLayoutGrid::minimumSizeHint() const {
3215  QVector<int> minColWidths, minRowHeights;
3216  getMinimumRowColSizes(&minColWidths, &minRowHeights);
3217  QSize result(0, 0);
3218  for (int i = 0; i < minColWidths.size(); ++i)
3219  result.rwidth() += minColWidths.at(i);
3220  for (int i = 0; i < minRowHeights.size(); ++i)
3221  result.rheight() += minRowHeights.at(i);
3222  result.rwidth() += qMax(0, columnCount() - 1) * mColumnSpacing +
3223  mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
3224  result.rheight() += qMax(0, rowCount() - 1) * mRowSpacing + mMargins.top() +
3225  mMargins.bottom();
3226  return result;
3227 }
3228 
3229 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3230 QSize QCPLayoutGrid::maximumSizeHint() const {
3231  QVector<int> maxColWidths, maxRowHeights;
3232  getMaximumRowColSizes(&maxColWidths, &maxRowHeights);
3233 
3234  QSize result(0, 0);
3235  for (int i = 0; i < maxColWidths.size(); ++i)
3236  result.setWidth(qMin(result.width() + maxColWidths.at(i), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX));
3237  for (int i = 0; i < maxRowHeights.size(); ++i)
3238  result.setHeight(
3239  qMin(result.height() + maxRowHeights.at(i), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX));
3240  result.rwidth() += qMax(0, columnCount() - 1) * mColumnSpacing +
3241  mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
3242  result.rheight() += qMax(0, rowCount() - 1) * mRowSpacing + mMargins.top() +
3243  mMargins.bottom();
3244  return result;
3245 }
3246 
3261 void QCPLayoutGrid::getMinimumRowColSizes(QVector<int> *minColWidths,
3262  QVector<int> *minRowHeights) const {
3263  *minColWidths = QVector<int>(columnCount(), 0);
3264  *minRowHeights = QVector<int>(rowCount(), 0);
3265  for (int row = 0; row < rowCount(); ++row) {
3266  for (int col = 0; col < columnCount(); ++col) {
3267  if (mElements.at(row).at(col)) {
3268  QSize minHint = mElements.at(row).at(col)->minimumSizeHint();
3269  QSize min = mElements.at(row).at(col)->minimumSize();
3270  QSize final(min.width() > 0 ? min.width() : minHint.width(),
3271  min.height() > 0 ? min.height() : minHint.height());
3272  if (minColWidths->at(col) < final.width())
3273  (*minColWidths)[col] = final.width();
3274  if (minRowHeights->at(row) < final.height())
3275  (*minRowHeights)[row] = final.height();
3276  }
3277  }
3278  }
3279 }
3280 
3296 void QCPLayoutGrid::getMaximumRowColSizes(QVector<int> *maxColWidths,
3297  QVector<int> *maxRowHeights) const {
3298  *maxColWidths = QVector<int>(columnCount(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
3299  *maxRowHeights = QVector<int>(rowCount(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
3300  for (int row = 0; row < rowCount(); ++row) {
3301  for (int col = 0; col < columnCount(); ++col) {
3302  if (mElements.at(row).at(col)) {
3303  QSize maxHint = mElements.at(row).at(col)->maximumSizeHint();
3304  QSize max = mElements.at(row).at(col)->maximumSize();
3305  QSize final(
3306  max.width() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? max.width() : maxHint.width(),
3307  max.height() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? max.height() : maxHint.height());
3308  if (maxColWidths->at(col) > final.width())
3309  (*maxColWidths)[col] = final.width();
3310  if (maxRowHeights->at(row) > final.height())
3311  (*maxRowHeights)[row] = final.height();
3312  }
3313  }
3314  }
3315 }
3316 
3320 
3347 /* start documentation of inline functions */
3348 
3356 /* end documentation of inline functions */
3357 
3361 QCPLayoutInset::QCPLayoutInset() {}
3362 
3363 QCPLayoutInset::~QCPLayoutInset() {
3364  // clear all child layout elements. This is important because only the
3365  // specific layouts know how
3366  // to handle removing elements (clear calls virtual removeAt method to do
3367  // that).
3368  clear();
3369 }
3370 
3374 QCPLayoutInset::InsetPlacement QCPLayoutInset::insetPlacement(int index) const {
3375  if (elementAt(index))
3376  return mInsetPlacement.at(index);
3377  else {
3378  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3379  return ipFree;
3380  }
3381 }
3382 
3389 Qt::Alignment QCPLayoutInset::insetAlignment(int index) const {
3390  if (elementAt(index))
3391  return mInsetAlignment.at(index);
3392  else {
3393  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3394  return 0;
3395  }
3396 }
3397 
3403 QRectF QCPLayoutInset::insetRect(int index) const {
3404  if (elementAt(index))
3405  return mInsetRect.at(index);
3406  else {
3407  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3408  return QRectF();
3409  }
3410 }
3411 
3418 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetPlacement(
3419  int index, QCPLayoutInset::InsetPlacement placement) {
3420  if (elementAt(index))
3421  mInsetPlacement[index] = placement;
3422  else
3423  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3424 }
3425 
3438 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetAlignment(int index, Qt::Alignment alignment) {
3439  if (elementAt(index))
3440  mInsetAlignment[index] = alignment;
3441  else
3442  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3443 }
3444 
3460 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetRect(int index, const QRectF &rect) {
3461  if (elementAt(index))
3462  mInsetRect[index] = rect;
3463  else
3464  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3465 }
3466 
3467 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3468 void QCPLayoutInset::updateLayout() {
3469  for (int i = 0; i < mElements.size(); ++i) {
3470  QRect insetRect;
3471  QSize finalMinSize, finalMaxSize;
3472  QSize minSizeHint = mElements.at(i)->minimumSizeHint();
3473  QSize maxSizeHint = mElements.at(i)->maximumSizeHint();
3474  finalMinSize.setWidth(mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().width() > 0
3475  ? mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().width()
3476  : minSizeHint.width());
3477  finalMinSize.setHeight(mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().height() > 0
3478  ? mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().height()
3479  : minSizeHint.height());
3480  finalMaxSize.setWidth(mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().width() <
3481  QWIDGETSIZE_MAX
3482  ? mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().width()
3483  : maxSizeHint.width());
3484  finalMaxSize.setHeight(mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().height() <
3485  QWIDGETSIZE_MAX
3486  ? mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().height()
3487  : maxSizeHint.height());
3488  if (mInsetPlacement.at(i) == ipFree) {
3489  insetRect = QRect(rect().x() + rect().width() * mInsetRect.at(i).x(),
3490  rect().y() + rect().height() * mInsetRect.at(i).y(),
3491  rect().width() * mInsetRect.at(i).width(),
3492  rect().height() * mInsetRect.at(i).height());
3493  if (insetRect.size().width() < finalMinSize.width())
3494  insetRect.setWidth(finalMinSize.width());
3495  if (insetRect.size().height() < finalMinSize.height())
3496  insetRect.setHeight(finalMinSize.height());
3497  if (insetRect.size().width() > finalMaxSize.width())
3498  insetRect.setWidth(finalMaxSize.width());
3499  if (insetRect.size().height() > finalMaxSize.height())
3500  insetRect.setHeight(finalMaxSize.height());
3501  } else if (mInsetPlacement.at(i) == ipBorderAligned) {
3502  insetRect.setSize(finalMinSize);
3503  Qt::Alignment al = mInsetAlignment.at(i);
3504  if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignLeft))
3505  insetRect.moveLeft(rect().x());
3506  else if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight))
3507  insetRect.moveRight(rect().x() + rect().width());
3508  else
3509  insetRect.moveLeft(rect().x() + rect().width() * 0.5 -
3510  finalMinSize.width() *
3511  0.5); // default to Qt::AlignHCenter
3512  if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignTop))
3513  insetRect.moveTop(rect().y());
3514  else if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom))
3515  insetRect.moveBottom(rect().y() + rect().height());
3516  else
3517  insetRect.moveTop(rect().y() + rect().height() * 0.5 -
3518  finalMinSize.height() *
3519  0.5); // default to Qt::AlignVCenter
3520  }
3521  mElements.at(i)->setOuterRect(insetRect);
3522  }
3523 }
3524 
3525 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3526 int QCPLayoutInset::elementCount() const { return mElements.size(); }
3527 
3528 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3529 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutInset::elementAt(int index) const {
3530  if (index >= 0 && index < mElements.size())
3531  return mElements.at(index);
3532  else
3533  return 0;
3534 }
3535 
3536 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3537 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutInset::takeAt(int index) {
3538  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(index)) {
3539  releaseElement(el);
3540  mElements.removeAt(index);
3541  mInsetPlacement.removeAt(index);
3542  mInsetAlignment.removeAt(index);
3543  mInsetRect.removeAt(index);
3544  return el;
3545  } else {
3546  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Attempt to take invalid index:" << index;
3547  return 0;
3548  }
3549 }
3550 
3551 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3552 bool QCPLayoutInset::take(QCPLayoutElement *element) {
3553  if (element) {
3554  for (int i = 0; i < elementCount(); ++i) {
3555  if (elementAt(i) == element) {
3556  takeAt(i);
3557  return true;
3558  }
3559  }
3560  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Element not in this layout, couldn't take";
3561  } else
3562  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't take null element";
3563  return false;
3564 }
3565 
3580 double QCPLayoutInset::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
3581  QVariant *details) const {
3582  Q_UNUSED(details)
3583  if (onlySelectable)
3584  return -1;
3585 
3586  for (int i = 0; i < mElements.size(); ++i) {
3587  // inset layout shall only return positive selectTest, if actually an inset
3588  // object is at pos
3589  // else it would block the entire underlying QCPAxisRect with its surface.
3590  if (mElements.at(i)->realVisibility() &&
3591  mElements.at(i)->selectTest(pos, onlySelectable) >= 0)
3592  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
3593  }
3594  return -1;
3595 }
3596 
3612 void QCPLayoutInset::addElement(QCPLayoutElement *element,
3613  Qt::Alignment alignment) {
3614  if (element) {
3615  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
3616  element->layout()->take(element);
3617  mElements.append(element);
3618  mInsetPlacement.append(ipBorderAligned);
3619  mInsetAlignment.append(alignment);
3620  mInsetRect.append(QRectF(0.6, 0.6, 0.4, 0.4));
3621  adoptElement(element);
3622  } else
3623  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element";
3624 }
3625 
3641 void QCPLayoutInset::addElement(QCPLayoutElement *element, const QRectF &rect) {
3642  if (element) {
3643  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
3644  element->layout()->take(element);
3645  mElements.append(element);
3646  mInsetPlacement.append(ipFree);
3647  mInsetAlignment.append(Qt::AlignRight | Qt::AlignTop);
3648  mInsetRect.append(rect);
3649  adoptElement(element);
3650  } else
3651  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element";
3652 }
3653 
3657 
3689 QCPLineEnding::QCPLineEnding()
3690  : mStyle(esNone), mWidth(8), mLength(10), mInverted(false) {}
3691 
3695 QCPLineEnding::QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::EndingStyle style, double width,
3696  double length, bool inverted)
3697  : mStyle(style), mWidth(width), mLength(length), mInverted(inverted) {}
3698 
3702 void QCPLineEnding::setStyle(QCPLineEnding::EndingStyle style) {
3703  mStyle = style;
3704 }
3705 
3713 void QCPLineEnding::setWidth(double width) { mWidth = width; }
3714 
3722 void QCPLineEnding::setLength(double length) { mLength = length; }
3723 
3736 void QCPLineEnding::setInverted(bool inverted) { mInverted = inverted; }
3737 
3751 double QCPLineEnding::boundingDistance() const {
3752  switch (mStyle) {
3753  case esNone:
3754  return 0;
3755 
3756  case esFlatArrow:
3757  case esSpikeArrow:
3758  case esLineArrow:
3759  case esSkewedBar:
3760  return qSqrt(mWidth * mWidth +
3761  mLength * mLength); // items that have width and length
3762 
3763  case esDisc:
3764  case esSquare:
3765  case esDiamond:
3766  case esBar:
3767  case esHalfBar:
3768  return mWidth * 1.42; // items that only have a width -> width*sqrt(2)
3769  }
3770  return 0;
3771 }
3772 
3789 double QCPLineEnding::realLength() const {
3790  switch (mStyle) {
3791  case esNone:
3792  case esLineArrow:
3793  case esSkewedBar:
3794  case esBar:
3795  case esHalfBar:
3796  return 0;
3797 
3798  case esFlatArrow:
3799  return mLength;
3800 
3801  case esDisc:
3802  case esSquare:
3803  case esDiamond:
3804  return mWidth * 0.5;
3805 
3806  case esSpikeArrow:
3807  return mLength * 0.8;
3808  }
3809  return 0;
3810 }
3811 
3818 void QCPLineEnding::draw(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector2D &pos,
3819  const QVector2D &dir) const {
3820  if (mStyle == esNone)
3821  return;
3822 
3823  QVector2D lengthVec(dir.normalized());
3824  if (lengthVec.isNull())
3825  lengthVec = QVector2D(1, 0);
3826  QVector2D widthVec(-lengthVec.y(), lengthVec.x());
3827  lengthVec *= (float)(mLength * (mInverted ? -1 : 1));
3828  widthVec *= (float)(mWidth * 0.5 * (mInverted ? -1 : 1));
3829 
3830  QPen penBackup = painter->pen();
3831  QBrush brushBackup = painter->brush();
3832  QPen miterPen = penBackup;
3833  miterPen.setJoinStyle(Qt::MiterJoin); // to make arrow heads spikey
3834  QBrush brush(painter->pen().color(), Qt::SolidPattern);
3835  switch (mStyle) {
3836  case esNone:
3837  break;
3838  case esFlatArrow: {
3839  QPointF points[3] = {pos.toPointF(),
3840  (pos - lengthVec + widthVec).toPointF(),
3841  (pos - lengthVec - widthVec).toPointF()};
3842  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3843  painter->setBrush(brush);
3844  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 3);
3845  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3846  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3847  break;
3848  }
3849  case esSpikeArrow: {
3850  QPointF points[4] = {pos.toPointF(),
3851  (pos - lengthVec + widthVec).toPointF(),
3852  (pos - lengthVec * 0.8f).toPointF(),
3853  (pos - lengthVec - widthVec).toPointF()};
3854  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3855  painter->setBrush(brush);
3856  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3857  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3858  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3859  break;
3860  }
3861  case esLineArrow: {
3862  QPointF points[3] = {(pos - lengthVec + widthVec).toPointF(),
3863  pos.toPointF(),
3864  (pos - lengthVec - widthVec).toPointF()};
3865  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3866  painter->drawPolyline(points, 3);
3867  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3868  break;
3869  }
3870  case esDisc: {
3871  painter->setBrush(brush);
3872  painter->drawEllipse(pos.toPointF(), mWidth * 0.5, mWidth * 0.5);
3873  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3874  break;
3875  }
3876  case esSquare: {
3877  QVector2D widthVecPerp(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
3878  QPointF points[4] = {(pos - widthVecPerp + widthVec).toPointF(),
3879  (pos - widthVecPerp - widthVec).toPointF(),
3880  (pos + widthVecPerp - widthVec).toPointF(),
3881  (pos + widthVecPerp + widthVec).toPointF()};
3882  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3883  painter->setBrush(brush);
3884  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3885  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3886  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3887  break;
3888  }
3889  case esDiamond: {
3890  QVector2D widthVecPerp(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
3891  QPointF points[4] = {
3892  (pos - widthVecPerp).toPointF(), (pos - widthVec).toPointF(),
3893  (pos + widthVecPerp).toPointF(), (pos + widthVec).toPointF()};
3894  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3895  painter->setBrush(brush);
3896  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3897  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3898  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3899  break;
3900  }
3901  case esBar: {
3902  painter->drawLine((pos + widthVec).toPointF(), (pos - widthVec).toPointF());
3903  break;
3904  }
3905  case esHalfBar: {
3906  painter->drawLine((pos + widthVec).toPointF(), pos.toPointF());
3907  break;
3908  }
3909  case esSkewedBar: {
3910  if (qFuzzyIsNull(painter->pen().widthF()) &&
3911  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic)) {
3912  // if drawing with cosmetic pen (perfectly thin stroke, happens only in
3913  // vector exports), draw bar exactly on tip of line
3914  painter->drawLine(
3915  (pos + widthVec + lengthVec * 0.2f * (mInverted ? -1 : 1)).toPointF(),
3916  (pos - widthVec - lengthVec * 0.2f * (mInverted ? -1 : 1))
3917  .toPointF());
3918  } else {
3919  // if drawing with thick (non-cosmetic) pen, shift bar a little in line
3920  // direction to prevent line from sticking through bar slightly
3921  painter->drawLine(
3922  (pos + widthVec + lengthVec * 0.2f * (mInverted ? -1 : 1) +
3923  dir.normalized() * qMax(1.0f, (float)painter->pen().widthF()) * 0.5f)
3924  .toPointF(),
3925  (pos - widthVec - lengthVec * 0.2f * (mInverted ? -1 : 1) +
3926  dir.normalized() * qMax(1.0f, (float)painter->pen().widthF()) * 0.5f)
3927  .toPointF());
3928  }
3929  break;
3930  }
3931  }
3932 }
3933 
3940 void QCPLineEnding::draw(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector2D &pos,
3941  double angle) const {
3942  draw(painter, pos, QVector2D(qCos(angle), qSin(angle)));
3943 }
3944 
3948 
3974 QCPGrid::QCPGrid(QCPAxis *parentAxis)
3975  : QCPLayerable(parentAxis->parentPlot(), QString(), parentAxis),
3976  mParentAxis(parentAxis) {
3977  // warning: this is called in QCPAxis constructor, so parentAxis members
3978  // should not be accessed/called
3979  setParent(parentAxis);
3980  setPen(QPen(QColor(200, 200, 200), 0, Qt::DotLine));
3981  setSubGridPen(QPen(QColor(220, 220, 220), 0, Qt::DotLine));
3982  setZeroLinePen(QPen(QColor(200, 200, 200), 0, Qt::SolidLine));
3983  setSubGridVisible(false);
3984  setAntialiased(false);
3985  setAntialiasedSubGrid(false);
3986  setAntialiasedZeroLine(false);
3987 }
3988 
3994 void QCPGrid::setSubGridVisible(bool visible) { mSubGridVisible = visible; }
3995 
3999 void QCPGrid::setAntialiasedSubGrid(bool enabled) {
4000  mAntialiasedSubGrid = enabled;
4001 }
4002 
4006 void QCPGrid::setAntialiasedZeroLine(bool enabled) {
4007  mAntialiasedZeroLine = enabled;
4008 }
4009 
4013 void QCPGrid::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
4014 
4018 void QCPGrid::setSubGridPen(const QPen &pen) { mSubGridPen = pen; }
4019 
4028 void QCPGrid::setZeroLinePen(const QPen &pen) { mZeroLinePen = pen; }
4029 
4046 void QCPGrid::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const {
4047  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeGrid);
4048 }
4049 
4057 void QCPGrid::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
4058  if (!mParentAxis) {
4059  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis";
4060  return;
4061  }
4062 
4063  if (mSubGridVisible)
4064  drawSubGridLines(painter);
4065  drawGridLines(painter);
4066 }
4067 
4074 void QCPGrid::drawGridLines(QCPPainter *painter) const {
4075  if (!mParentAxis) {
4076  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis";
4077  return;
4078  }
4079 
4080  int lowTick = mParentAxis->mLowestVisibleTick;
4081  int highTick = mParentAxis->mHighestVisibleTick;
4082  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
4083  if (mParentAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
4084  // draw zeroline:
4085  int zeroLineIndex = -1;
4086  if (mZeroLinePen.style() != Qt::NoPen && mParentAxis->mRange.lower < 0 &&
4087  mParentAxis->mRange.upper > 0) {
4088  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedZeroLine, QCP::aeZeroLine);
4089  painter->setPen(mZeroLinePen);
4090  double epsilon =
4091  mParentAxis->range().size() * 1E-6; // for comparing double to zero
4092  for (int i = lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i) {
4093  if (qAbs(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)) < epsilon) {
4094  zeroLineIndex = i;
4095  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // x
4096  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t,
4097  mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
4098  break;
4099  }
4100  }
4101  }
4102  // draw grid lines:
4103  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
4104  painter->setPen(mPen);
4105  for (int i = lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i) {
4106  if (i == zeroLineIndex)
4107  continue; // don't draw a gridline on top of the zeroline
4108  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // x
4109  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t,
4110  mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
4111  }
4112  } else {
4113  // draw zeroline:
4114  int zeroLineIndex = -1;
4115  if (mZeroLinePen.style() != Qt::NoPen && mParentAxis->mRange.lower < 0 &&
4116  mParentAxis->mRange.upper > 0) {
4117  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedZeroLine, QCP::aeZeroLine);
4118  painter->setPen(mZeroLinePen);
4119  double epsilon =
4120  mParentAxis->mRange.size() * 1E-6; // for comparing double to zero
4121  for (int i = lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i) {
4122  if (qAbs(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)) < epsilon) {
4123  zeroLineIndex = i;
4124  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // y
4125  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t,
4126  mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
4127  break;
4128  }
4129  }
4130  }
4131  // draw grid lines:
4132  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
4133  painter->setPen(mPen);
4134  for (int i = lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i) {
4135  if (i == zeroLineIndex)
4136  continue; // don't draw a gridline on top of the zeroline
4137  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // y
4138  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t,
4139  mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
4140  }
4141  }
4142 }
4143 
4150 void QCPGrid::drawSubGridLines(QCPPainter *painter) const {
4151  if (!mParentAxis) {
4152  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis";
4153  return;
4154  }
4155 
4156  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedSubGrid, QCP::aeSubGrid);
4157  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
4158  painter->setPen(mSubGridPen);
4159  if (mParentAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
4160  for (int i = 0; i < mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.size(); ++i) {
4161  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.at(i)); // x
4162  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t,
4163  mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
4164  }
4165  } else {
4166  for (int i = 0; i < mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.size(); ++i) {
4167  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.at(i)); // y
4168  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t,
4169  mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
4170  }
4171  }
4172 }
4173 
4177 
4199 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
4200 
4224 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
4225 /* start of documentation of signals */
4226 
4297 /* end of documentation of signals */
4298 
4308 QCPAxis::QCPAxis(QCPAxisRect *parent, AxisType type)
4309  : QCPLayerable(parent->parentPlot(), QString(), parent),
4310  // axis base:
4311  mAxisType(type), mAxisRect(parent), mPadding(5),
4312  mOrientation(orientation(type)),
4313  mSelectableParts(spAxis | spTickLabels | spAxisLabel),
4314  mSelectedParts(spNone),
4315  mBasePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4316  mSelectedBasePen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4317  // axis label:
4318  mLabel(), mLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
4319  mSelectedLabelFont(
4320  QFont(mLabelFont.family(), mLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
4321  mLabelColor(Qt::black), mSelectedLabelColor(Qt::blue),
4322  // tick labels:
4323  mTickLabels(true), mAutoTickLabels(true), mTickLabelType(ltNumber),
4324  mTickLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
4325  mSelectedTickLabelFont(QFont(mTickLabelFont.family(),
4326  mTickLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
4327  mTickLabelColor(Qt::black), mSelectedTickLabelColor(Qt::blue),
4328  mDateTimeFormat(QLatin1String("hh:mm:ss\ndd.MM.yy")),
4329  mDateTimeSpec(Qt::LocalTime), mNumberPrecision(6), mNumberFormatChar('g'),
4330  mNumberBeautifulPowers(true),
4331  // ticks and subticks:
4332  mTicks(true), mTickStep(1), mSubTickCount(4), mAutoTickCount(6),
4333  mAutoTicks(true), mAutoTickStep(true), mAutoSubTicks(true),
4334  mTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4335  mSelectedTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4336  mSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4337  mSelectedSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4338  // scale and range:
4339  mRange(0, 5), mRangeReversed(false), mScaleType(stLinear),
4340  mScaleLogBase(10), mScaleLogBaseLogInv(1.0 / qLn(mScaleLogBase)),
4341  // internal members:
4342  mGrid(new QCPGrid(this)),
4343  mAxisPainter(new QCPAxisPainterPrivate(parent->parentPlot())),
4344  mLowestVisibleTick(0), mHighestVisibleTick(-1), mCachedMarginValid(false),
4345  mCachedMargin(0) {
4346  mGrid->setVisible(false);
4347  setAntialiased(false);
4348  setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer()); // it's actually on that layer already,
4349  // but we want it in front of the grid,
4350  // so we place it on there again
4351 
4352  if (type == atTop) {
4353  setTickLabelPadding(3);
4354  setLabelPadding(6);
4355  } else if (type == atRight) {
4356  setTickLabelPadding(7);
4357  setLabelPadding(12);
4358  } else if (type == atBottom) {
4359  setTickLabelPadding(3);
4360  setLabelPadding(3);
4361  } else if (type == atLeft) {
4362  setTickLabelPadding(5);
4363  setLabelPadding(10);
4364  }
4365 }
4366 
4367 QCPAxis::~QCPAxis() {
4368  delete mAxisPainter;
4369  delete mGrid; // delete grid here instead of via parent ~QObject for better
4370  // defined deletion order
4371 }

4386 /* No documentation as it is a property getter */
4387 QString QCPAxis::numberFormat() const {
4388  QString result;
4389  result.append(mNumberFormatChar);
4390  if (mNumberBeautifulPowers) {
4391  result.append(QLatin1Char('b'));
4392  if (mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross)
4393  result.append(QLatin1Char('c'));
4394  }
4395  return result;
4396 }

4400

4443 void QCPAxis::setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType type) {
4444  if (mScaleType != type) {
4445  mScaleType = type;
4446  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4447  setRange(mRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
4448  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4449  emit scaleTypeChanged(mScaleType);
4450  }
4451 }
4452 
4463 void QCPAxis::setScaleLogBase(double base) {
4464  if (base > 1) {
4465  mScaleLogBase = base;
4466  mScaleLogBaseLogInv =
4467  1.0 / qLn(mScaleLogBase); // buffer for faster baseLog() calculation
4468  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4469  } else
4470  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
4471  << "Invalid logarithmic scale base (must be greater 1):" << base;
4472 }
4473 
4483 void QCPAxis::setRange(const QCPRange &range) {
4484  if (range.lower == mRange.lower && range.upper == mRange.upper)
4485  return;
4486 
4487  if (!QCPRange::validRange(range))
4488  return;
4489  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
4490  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic) {
4491  mRange = range.sanitizedForLogScale();
4492  } else {
4493  mRange = range.sanitizedForLinScale();
4494  }
4495  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4496  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4497  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
4498 }
4499 
4513 void QCPAxis::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable) {
4514  if (mSelectableParts != selectable) {
4515  mSelectableParts = selectable;
4516  emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
4517  }
4518 }
4519 
4541 void QCPAxis::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected) {
4542  if (mSelectedParts != selected) {
4543  mSelectedParts = selected;
4544  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
4545  }
4546 }
4547 
4557 void QCPAxis::setRange(double lower, double upper) {
4558  if (lower == mRange.lower && upper == mRange.upper)
4559  return;
4560 
4561  if (!QCPRange::validRange(lower, upper))
4562  return;
4563  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
4564  mRange.lower = lower;
4565  mRange.upper = upper;
4566  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic) {
4567  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4568  } else {
4569  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4570  }
4571  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4572  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4573  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
4574 }
4575 
4591 void QCPAxis::setRange(double position, double size,
4592  Qt::AlignmentFlag alignment) {
4593  if (alignment == Qt::AlignLeft)
4594  setRange(position, position + size);
4595  else if (alignment == Qt::AlignRight)
4596  setRange(position - size, position);
4597  else // alignment == Qt::AlignCenter
4598  setRange(position - size / 2.0, position + size / 2.0);
4599 }
4600 
4605 void QCPAxis::setRangeLower(double lower) {
4606  if (mRange.lower == lower)
4607  return;
4608 
4609  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
4610  mRange.lower = lower;
4611  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic) {
4612  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4613  } else {
4614  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4615  }
4616  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4617  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4618  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
4619 }
4620 
4625 void QCPAxis::setRangeUpper(double upper) {
4626  if (mRange.upper == upper)
4627  return;
4628 
4629  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
4630  mRange.upper = upper;
4631  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic) {
4632  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4633  } else {
4634  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4635  }
4636  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4637  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4638  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
4639 }

4710  << approximateCount;
4711  }

4898 void QCPAxis::setTickLabelRotation(double degrees) {
4899  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(degrees - mAxisPainter->tickLabelRotation)) {
4900  mAxisPainter->tickLabelRotation = qBound(-90.0, degrees, 90.0);
4901  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4902  }

4953 
5011 void QCPAxis::setNumberFormat(const QString &formatCode) {
5012  if (formatCode.isEmpty()) {
5013  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed formatCode is empty";
5014  return;
5015  }
5016  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5017 
5018  // interpret first char as number format char:
5019  QString allowedFormatChars(QLatin1String("eEfgG"));
5020  if (allowedFormatChars.contains(formatCode.at(0))) {
5021  mNumberFormatChar = QLatin1Char(formatCode.at(0).toLatin1());
5022  } else {
5023  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
5024  << "Invalid number format code (first char not in 'eEfgG'):"
5025  << formatCode;
5026  return;
5027  }
5028  if (formatCode.length() < 2) {
5029  mNumberBeautifulPowers = false;
5030  mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross = false;
5031  return;
5032  }
5033 
5034  // interpret second char as indicator for beautiful decimal powers:
5035  if (formatCode.at(1) == QLatin1Char('b') &&
5036  (mNumberFormatChar == QLatin1Char('e') ||
5037  mNumberFormatChar == QLatin1Char('g'))) {
5038  mNumberBeautifulPowers = true;
5039  } else {
5040  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
5041  << "Invalid number format code (second char not 'b' or first char "
5042  "neither 'e' nor 'g'):" << formatCode;
5043  return;
5044  }
5045  if (formatCode.length() < 3) {
5046  mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross = false;
5047  return;
5048  }
5049 
5050  // interpret third char as indicator for dot or cross multiplication symbol:
5051  if (formatCode.at(2) == QLatin1Char('c')) {
5052  mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross = true;
5053  } else if (formatCode.at(2) == QLatin1Char('d')) {
5054  mAxisPainter->numberMultiplyCross = false;
5055  } else {
5056  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
5057  << "Invalid number format code (third char neither 'c' nor 'd'):"
5058  << formatCode;
5059  return;
5060  }
5061 }
5062 
5080 void QCPAxis::setNumberPrecision(int precision) {
5081  if (mNumberPrecision != precision) {
5082  mNumberPrecision = precision;
5083  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5084  }
5085 }
5086 
5093 void QCPAxis::setTickStep(double step) {
5094  if (mTickStep != step) {
5095  mTickStep = step;
5096  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5097  }
5098 }
5099 
5119 void QCPAxis::setTickVector(const QVector<double> &vec) {
5120  // don't check whether mTickVector != vec here, because it takes longer than
5121  // we would save
5122  mTickVector = vec;
5123  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5124 }
5125 
5141 void QCPAxis::setTickVectorLabels(const QVector<QString> &vec) {

5143  // than we would save

5459 
5470 void QCPAxis::moveRange(double diff) {
5471  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
5472  if (mScaleType == stLinear) {
5473  mRange.lower += diff;
5474  mRange.upper += diff;
5475  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5476  {
5477  mRange.lower *= diff;
5478  mRange.upper *= diff;
5479  }
5480  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5481  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5482  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
5483 }
5484 
5494 void QCPAxis::scaleRange(double factor, double center) {
5495  QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
5496  if (mScaleType == stLinear) {
5497  QCPRange newRange;
5498  newRange.lower = (mRange.lower - center) * factor + center;
5499  newRange.upper = (mRange.upper - center) * factor + center;
5500  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5501  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
5502  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5503  {
5504  if ((mRange.upper < 0 && center < 0) ||
5505  (mRange.upper > 0 &&
5506  center > 0)) // make sure center has same sign as range
5507  {
5508  QCPRange newRange;
5509  newRange.lower = qPow(mRange.lower / center, factor) * center;
5510  newRange.upper = qPow(mRange.upper / center, factor) * center;
5511  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5512  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
5513  } else
5514  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
5515  << "Center of scaling operation doesn't lie in same logarithmic "
5516  "sign domain as range:" << center;
5517  }
5518  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5519  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5520  emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
5521 }
5522 
5542 void QCPAxis::setScaleRatio(const QCPAxis *otherAxis, double ratio) {
5543  int otherPixelSize, ownPixelSize;
5544 
5545  if (otherAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5546  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->width();
5547  else
5548  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->height();
5549 
5550  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5551  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->width();
5552  else
5553  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->height();
5554 
5555  double newRangeSize =
5556  ratio * otherAxis->range().size() * ownPixelSize / (double)otherPixelSize;
5557  setRange(range().center(), newRangeSize, Qt::AlignCenter);
5558 }
5559 
5567 void QCPAxis::rescale(bool onlyVisiblePlottables) {
5568  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable *> p = plottables();
5569  QCPRange newRange;
5570  bool haveRange = false;
5571  for (int i = 0; i < p.size(); ++i) {
5572  if (!p.at(i)->realVisibility() && onlyVisiblePlottables)
5573  continue;
5574  QCPRange plottableRange;
5575  bool currentFoundRange;
5576  QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain signDomain = QCPAbstractPlottable::sdBoth;
5577  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
5578  signDomain = (mRange.upper < 0 ? QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative
5579  : QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive);
5580  if (p.at(i)->keyAxis() == this)
5581  plottableRange = p.at(i)->getKeyRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
5582  else
5583  plottableRange = p.at(i)->getValueRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
5584  if (currentFoundRange) {
5585  if (!haveRange)
5586  newRange = plottableRange;
5587  else
5588  newRange.expand(plottableRange);
5589  haveRange = true;
5590  }
5591  }
5592  if (haveRange) {
5593  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero
5594  // (plottable has only constant data in
5595  // this axis dimension), shift current
5596  // range to at least center the
5597  // plottable
5598  {
5599  double center = (newRange.lower + newRange.upper) *
5600  0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just
5601  // to make sure, incase validRange returned false for
5602  // other reason
