5603  if (mScaleType == stLinear) {
5604  newRange.lower = center - mRange.size() / 2.0;
5605  newRange.upper = center + mRange.size() / 2.0;
5606  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5607  {
5608  newRange.lower = center / qSqrt(mRange.upper / mRange.lower);
5609  newRange.upper = center * qSqrt(mRange.upper / mRange.lower);
5610  }
5611  }
5612  setRange(newRange);
5613  }
5614 }
5615 
5620 double QCPAxis::pixelToCoord(double value) const {
5621  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
5622  if (mScaleType == stLinear) {
5623  if (!mRangeReversed)
5624  return (value - mAxisRect->left()) / (double)mAxisRect->width() *
5625  mRange.size() +
5626  mRange.lower;
5627  else
5628  return -(value - mAxisRect->left()) / (double)mAxisRect->width() *
5629  mRange.size() +
5630  mRange.upper;
5631  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5632  {
5633  if (!mRangeReversed)
5634  return qPow(mRange.upper / mRange.lower,
5635  (value - mAxisRect->left()) / (double)mAxisRect->width()) *
5636  mRange.lower;
5637  else
5638  return qPow(mRange.upper / mRange.lower,
5639  (mAxisRect->left() - value) / (double)mAxisRect->width()) *
5640  mRange.upper;
5641  }
5642  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5643  {
5644  if (mScaleType == stLinear) {
5645  if (!mRangeReversed)
5646  return (mAxisRect->bottom() - value) / (double)mAxisRect->height() *
5647  mRange.size() +
5648  mRange.lower;
5649  else
5650  return -(mAxisRect->bottom() - value) / (double)mAxisRect->height() *
5651  mRange.size() +
5652  mRange.upper;
5653  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5654  {
5655  if (!mRangeReversed)
5656  return qPow(mRange.upper / mRange.lower,
5657  (mAxisRect->bottom() - value) /
5658  (double)mAxisRect->height()) *
5659  mRange.lower;
5660  else
5661  return qPow(mRange.upper / mRange.lower,
5662  (value - mAxisRect->bottom()) /
5663  (double)mAxisRect->height()) *
5664  mRange.upper;
5665  }
5666  }
5667 }
5668 
5673 double QCPAxis::coordToPixel(double value) const {
5674  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
5675  if (mScaleType == stLinear) {
5676  if (!mRangeReversed)
5677  return (value - mRange.lower) / mRange.size() * mAxisRect->width() +
5678  mAxisRect->left();
5679  else
5680  return (mRange.upper - value) / mRange.size() * mAxisRect->width() +
5681  mAxisRect->left();
5682  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5683  {
5684  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic
5685  // scale, just draw it outside visible
5686  // range
5687  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->right() + 200
5688  : mAxisRect->left() - 200;
5689  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic
5690  // scale, just draw it outside
5691  // visible range
5692  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->left() - 200
5693  : mAxisRect->right() + 200;
5694  else {
5695  if (!mRangeReversed)
5696  return baseLog(value / mRange.lower) /
5697  baseLog(mRange.upper / mRange.lower) * mAxisRect->width() +
5698  mAxisRect->left();
5699  else
5700  return baseLog(mRange.upper / value) /
5701  baseLog(mRange.upper / mRange.lower) * mAxisRect->width() +
5702  mAxisRect->left();
5703  }
5704  }
5705  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5706  {
5707  if (mScaleType == stLinear) {
5708  if (!mRangeReversed)
5709  return mAxisRect->bottom() -
5710  (value - mRange.lower) / mRange.size() * mAxisRect->height();
5711  else
5712  return mAxisRect->bottom() -
5713  (mRange.upper - value) / mRange.size() * mAxisRect->height();
5714  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5715  {
5716  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic
5717  // scale, just draw it outside visible
5718  // range
5719  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->top() - 200
5720  : mAxisRect->bottom() + 200;
5721  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic
5722  // scale, just draw it outside
5723  // visible range
5724  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->bottom() + 200
5725  : mAxisRect->top() - 200;
5726  else {
5727  if (!mRangeReversed)
5728  return mAxisRect->bottom() -
5729  baseLog(value / mRange.lower) /
5730  baseLog(mRange.upper / mRange.lower) * mAxisRect->height();
5731  else
5732  return mAxisRect->bottom() -
5733  baseLog(mRange.upper / value) /
5734  baseLog(mRange.upper / mRange.lower) * mAxisRect->height();
5735  }
5736  }
5737  }
5738 }
5739 
5752 QCPAxis::SelectablePart QCPAxis::getPartAt(const QPointF &pos) const {
5753  if (!mVisible)
5754  return spNone;
5755 
5756  if (mAxisPainter->axisSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
5757  return spAxis;
5758  else if (mAxisPainter->tickLabelsSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
5759  return spTickLabels;
5760  else if (mAxisPainter->labelSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
5761  return spAxisLabel;
5762  else
5763  return spNone;
5764 }
5765 
5766 /* inherits documentation from base class */
5767 double QCPAxis::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
5768  QVariant *details) const {
5769  if (!mParentPlot)
5770  return -1;
5771  SelectablePart part = getPartAt(pos);
5772  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(part)) || part == spNone)
5773  return -1;
5774 
5775  if (details)
5776  details->setValue(part);
5777  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
5778 }
5779 
5787 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable *> QCPAxis::plottables() const {
5788  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable *> result;
5789  if (!mParentPlot)
5790  return result;
5791 
5792  for (int i = 0; i < mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i) {
5793  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis() == this ||
5794  mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5795  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
5796  }
5797  return result;
5798 }
5799 
5805 QList<QCPGraph *> QCPAxis::graphs() const {
5806  QList<QCPGraph *> result;
5807  if (!mParentPlot)
5808  return result;
5809 
5810  for (int i = 0; i < mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i) {
5811  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis() == this ||
5812  mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5813  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
5814  }
5815  return result;
5816 }
5817 
5826 QList<QCPAbstractItem *> QCPAxis::items() const {
5827  QList<QCPAbstractItem *> result;
5828  if (!mParentPlot)
5829  return result;
5830 
5831  for (int itemId = 0; itemId < mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId) {
5832  QList<QCPItemPosition *> positions =
5833  mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
5834  for (int posId = 0; posId < positions.size(); ++posId) {
5835  if (positions.at(posId)->keyAxis() == this ||
5836  positions.at(posId)->valueAxis() == this) {
5837  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
5838  break;
5839  }
5840  }
5841  }
5842  return result;
5843 }
5844 
5850 QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(QCP::MarginSide side) {
5851  switch (side) {
5852  case QCP::msLeft:
5853  return atLeft;
5854  case QCP::msRight:
5855  return atRight;
5856  case QCP::msTop:
5857  return atTop;
5858  case QCP::msBottom:
5859  return atBottom;
5860  default:
5861  break;
5862  }
5863  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid margin side passed:" << (int)side;
5864  return atLeft;
5865 }
5866 
5871 QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::opposite(QCPAxis::AxisType type) {
5872  switch (type) {
5873  case atLeft:
5874  return atRight;
5875  break;
5876  case atRight:
5877  return atLeft;
5878  break;
5879  case atBottom:
5880  return atTop;
5881  break;
5882  case atTop:
5883  return atBottom;
5884  break;
5885  default:
5886  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis type";
5887  return atLeft;
5888  break;
5889  }
5890 }
5891 
5903 void QCPAxis::setupTickVectors() {
5904  if (!mParentPlot)
5905  return;
5906  if ((!mTicks && !mTickLabels && !mGrid->visible()) || mRange.size() <= 0)
5907  return;
5908 
5909  // fill tick vectors, either by auto generating or by notifying user to fill
5910  // the vectors himself
5911  if (mAutoTicks) {
5912  generateAutoTicks();
5913  } else {
5914  emit ticksRequest();
5915  }
5916 
5917  visibleTickBounds(mLowestVisibleTick, mHighestVisibleTick);
5918  if (mTickVector.isEmpty()) {
5919  mSubTickVector.clear();
5920  return;
5921  }
5922 
5923  // generate subticks between ticks:
5924  mSubTickVector.resize((mTickVector.size() - 1) * mSubTickCount);
5925  if (mSubTickCount > 0) {
5926  double subTickStep = 0;
5927  double subTickPosition = 0;
5928  int subTickIndex = 0;
5929  bool done = false;
5930  int lowTick =
5931  mLowestVisibleTick > 0 ? mLowestVisibleTick - 1 : mLowestVisibleTick;
5932  int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick < mTickVector.size() - 1
5933  ? mHighestVisibleTick + 1
5934  : mHighestVisibleTick;
5935  for (int i = lowTick + 1; i <= highTick; ++i) {
5936  subTickStep = (mTickVector.at(i) - mTickVector.at(i - 1)) /
5937  (double)(mSubTickCount + 1);
5938  for (int k = 1; k <= mSubTickCount; ++k) {
5939  subTickPosition = mTickVector.at(i - 1) + k * subTickStep;
5940  if (subTickPosition < mRange.lower)
5941  continue;
5942  if (subTickPosition > mRange.upper) {
5943  done = true;
5944  break;
5945  }
5946  mSubTickVector[subTickIndex] = subTickPosition;
5947  subTickIndex++;
5948  }
5949  if (done)
5950  break;
5951  }
5952  mSubTickVector.resize(subTickIndex);
5953  }
5954 
5955  // generate tick labels according to tick positions:
5956  if (mAutoTickLabels) {
5957  int vecsize = mTickVector.size();
5958  mTickVectorLabels.resize(vecsize);
5959  if (mTickLabelType == ltNumber) {
5960  for (int i = mLowestVisibleTick; i <= mHighestVisibleTick; ++i)
5961  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(
5962  mTickVector.at(i), mNumberFormatChar.toLatin1(), mNumberPrecision);
5963  } else if (mTickLabelType == ltDateTime) {
5964  for (int i = mLowestVisibleTick; i <= mHighestVisibleTick; ++i) {
5965 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0) // use fromMSecsSinceEpoch function
5966  // if available, to gain sub-second
5967  // accuracy on tick labels (e.g. for
5968  // format "hh:mm:ss:zzz")
5969  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(
5970  QDateTime::fromTime_t(mTickVector.at(i)).toTimeSpec(mDateTimeSpec),
5971  mDateTimeFormat);
5972 #else
5973  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(
5974  QDateTime::fromMSecsSinceEpoch(mTickVector.at(i) * 1000)
5975  .toTimeSpec(mDateTimeSpec),
5976  mDateTimeFormat);
5977 #endif
5978  }
5979  }
5980  } else // mAutoTickLabels == false
5981  {
5982  if (mAutoTicks) // ticks generated automatically, but not ticklabels, so
5983  // emit ticksRequest here for labels
5984  {
5985  emit ticksRequest();
5986  }
5987  // make sure provided tick label vector has correct (minimal) length:
5988  if (mTickVectorLabels.size() < mTickVector.size())
5989  mTickVectorLabels.resize(mTickVector.size());
5990  }
5991 }
5992 
6005 void QCPAxis::generateAutoTicks() {
6006  if (mScaleType == stLinear) {
6007  if (mAutoTickStep) {
6008  // Generate tick positions according to linear scaling:
6009  mTickStep = mRange.size() /
6010  (double)(mAutoTickCount + 1e-10); // mAutoTickCount ticks on
6011  // average, the small
6012  // addition is to prevent
6013  // jitter on exact integers
6014  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(
6015  10.0,
6016  qFloor(
6017  qLn(mTickStep) /
6018  qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
6019  double tickStepMantissa = mTickStep / magnitudeFactor;
6020  if (tickStepMantissa < 5) {
6021  // round digit after decimal point to 0.5
6022  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa * 2) / 2.0 * magnitudeFactor;
6023  } else {
6024  // round to first digit in multiples of 2
6025  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa / 2.0) * 2.0 * magnitudeFactor;
6026  }
6027  }
6028  if (mAutoSubTicks)
6029  mSubTickCount = calculateAutoSubTickCount(mTickStep);
6030  // Generate tick positions according to mTickStep:
6031  qint64 firstStep = floor(
6032  mRange.lower /
6033  mTickStep); // do not use qFloor here, or we'll lose 64 bit precision
6034  qint64 lastStep = ceil(
6035  mRange.upper /
6036  mTickStep); // do not use qCeil here, or we'll lose 64 bit precision
6037  int tickcount = lastStep - firstStep + 1;
6038  if (tickcount < 0)
6039  tickcount = 0;
6040  mTickVector.resize(tickcount);
6041  for (int i = 0; i < tickcount; ++i)
6042  mTickVector[i] = (firstStep + i) * mTickStep;
6043  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
6044  {
6045  // Generate tick positions according to logbase scaling:
6046  if (mRange.lower > 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // positive range
6047  {
6048  double lowerMag = basePow(qFloor(baseLog(mRange.lower)));
6049  double currentMag = lowerMag;
6050  mTickVector.clear();
6051  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
6052  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag > 0) // currentMag might be
6053  // zero for ranges
6054  // ~1e-300, just
6055  // cancel in that case
6056  {
6057  currentMag *= mScaleLogBase;
6058  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
6059  }
6060  } else if (mRange.lower < 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // negative range
6061  {
6062  double lowerMag = -basePow(qCeil(baseLog(-mRange.lower)));
6063  double currentMag = lowerMag;
6064  mTickVector.clear();
6065  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
6066  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag < 0) // currentMag might be
6067  // zero for ranges
6068  // ~1e-300, just
6069  // cancel in that case
6070  {
6071  currentMag /= mScaleLogBase;
6072  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
6073  }
6074  } else // invalid range for logarithmic scale, because lower and upper have
6075  // different sign
6076  {
6077  mTickVector.clear();
6078  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
6079  << "Invalid range for logarithmic plot: " << mRange.lower << "-"
6080  << mRange.upper;
6081  }
6082  }
6083 }
6084 
6105 int QCPAxis::calculateAutoSubTickCount(double tickStep) const {
6106  int result = mSubTickCount; // default to current setting, if no proper value
6107  // can be found
6108 
6109  // get mantissa of tickstep:
6110  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(
6111  10.0,
6112  qFloor(qLn(tickStep) /
6113  qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
6114  double tickStepMantissa = tickStep / magnitudeFactor;
6115 
6116  // separate integer and fractional part of mantissa:
6117  double epsilon = 0.01;
6118  double intPartf;
6119  int intPart;
6120  double fracPart = modf(tickStepMantissa, &intPartf);
6121  intPart = intPartf;
6122 
6123  // handle cases with (almost) integer mantissa:
6124  if (fracPart < epsilon || 1.0 - fracPart < epsilon) {
6125  if (1.0 - fracPart < epsilon)
6126  ++intPart;
6127  switch (intPart) {
6128  case 1:
6129  result = 4;
6130  break; // 1.0 -> 0.2 substep
6131  case 2:
6132  result = 3;
6133  break; // 2.0 -> 0.5 substep
6134  case 3:
6135  result = 2;
6136  break; // 3.0 -> 1.0 substep
6137  case 4:
6138  result = 3;
6139  break; // 4.0 -> 1.0 substep
6140  case 5:
6141  result = 4;
6142  break; // 5.0 -> 1.0 substep
6143  case 6:
6144  result = 2;
6145  break; // 6.0 -> 2.0 substep
6146  case 7:
6147  result = 6;
6148  break; // 7.0 -> 1.0 substep
6149  case 8:
6150  result = 3;
6151  break; // 8.0 -> 2.0 substep
6152  case 9:
6153  result = 2;
6154  break; // 9.0 -> 3.0 substep
6155  }
6156  } else {
6157  // handle cases with significantly fractional mantissa:
6158  if (qAbs(fracPart - 0.5) < epsilon) // *.5 mantissa
6159  {
6160  switch (intPart) {
6161  case 1:
6162  result = 2;
6163  break; // 1.5 -> 0.5 substep
6164  case 2:
6165  result = 4;
6166  break; // 2.5 -> 0.5 substep
6167  case 3:
6168  result = 4;
6169  break; // 3.5 -> 0.7 substep
6170  case 4:
6171  result = 2;
6172  break; // 4.5 -> 1.5 substep
6173  case 5:
6174  result = 4;
6175  break; // 5.5 -> 1.1 substep (won't occur with autoTickStep from here
6176  // on)
6177  case 6:
6178  result = 4;
6179  break; // 6.5 -> 1.3 substep
6180  case 7:
6181  result = 2;
6182  break; // 7.5 -> 2.5 substep
6183  case 8:
6184  result = 4;
6185  break; // 8.5 -> 1.7 substep
6186  case 9:
6187  result = 4;
6188  break; // 9.5 -> 1.9 substep
6189  }
6190  }
6191  // if mantissa fraction isnt 0.0 or 0.5, don't bother finding good sub tick
6192  // marks, leave default
6193  }
6194 
6195  return result;
6196 }
6197 
6198 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6199 void QCPAxis::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive,
6200  const QVariant &details,
6201  bool *selectionStateChanged) {
6202  Q_UNUSED(event)
6203  SelectablePart part = details.value<SelectablePart>();
6204  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(part)) {
6205  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
6206  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts ^ part : part);
6207  if (selectionStateChanged)
6208  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
6209  }
6210 }
6211 
6212 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6213 void QCPAxis::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged) {
6214  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
6215  setSelectedParts(mSelectedParts & ~mSelectableParts);
6216  if (selectionStateChanged)
6217  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
6218 }
6219 
6236 void QCPAxis::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const {
6237  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeAxes);
6238 }
6239 
6246 void QCPAxis::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
6247  const int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick;
6248  const int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick;
6249  QVector<double> subTickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector
6250  // passed to QCPAxisPainter
6251  QVector<double> tickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector
6252  // passed to QCPAxisPainter
6253  QVector<QString> tickLabels; // the final vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
6254  tickPositions.reserve(highTick - lowTick + 1);
6255  tickLabels.reserve(highTick - lowTick + 1);
6256  subTickPositions.reserve(mSubTickVector.size());
6257 
6258  if (mTicks) {
6259  for (int i = lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i) {
6260  tickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)));
6261  if (mTickLabels)
6262  tickLabels.append(mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
6263  }
6264 
6265  if (mSubTickCount > 0) {
6266  const int subTickCount = mSubTickVector.size();
6267  for (int i = 0; i < subTickCount; ++i) // no need to check bounds because
6268  // subticks are always only created
6269  // inside current mRange
6270  subTickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i)));
6271  }
6272  }
6273  // transfer all properties of this axis to QCPAxisPainterPrivate which it
6274  // needs to draw the axis.
6275  // Note that some axis painter properties are already set by direct
6276  // feed-through with QCPAxis setters
6277  mAxisPainter->type = mAxisType;
6278  mAxisPainter->basePen = getBasePen();
6279  mAxisPainter->labelFont = getLabelFont();
6280  mAxisPainter->labelColor = getLabelColor();
6281  mAxisPainter->label = mLabel;
6282  mAxisPainter->substituteExponent =
6283  mAutoTickLabels && mNumberBeautifulPowers && mTickLabelType == ltNumber;
6284  mAxisPainter->tickPen = getTickPen();
6285  mAxisPainter->subTickPen = getSubTickPen();
6286  mAxisPainter->tickLabelFont = getTickLabelFont();
6287  mAxisPainter->tickLabelColor = getTickLabelColor();
6288  mAxisPainter->axisRect = mAxisRect->rect();
6289  mAxisPainter->viewportRect = mParentPlot->viewport();
6290  mAxisPainter->abbreviateDecimalPowers = mScaleType == stLogarithmic;
6291  mAxisPainter->reversedEndings = mRangeReversed;
6292  mAxisPainter->tickPositions = tickPositions;
6293  mAxisPainter->tickLabels = tickLabels;
6294  mAxisPainter->subTickPositions = subTickPositions;
6295  mAxisPainter->draw(painter);
6296 }
6297 
6323 void QCPAxis::visibleTickBounds(int &lowIndex, int &highIndex) const {
6324  bool lowFound = false;
6325  bool highFound = false;
6326  lowIndex = 0;
6327  highIndex = -1;
6328 
6329  for (int i = 0; i < mTickVector.size(); ++i) {
6330  if (mTickVector.at(i) >= mRange.lower) {
6331  lowFound = true;
6332  lowIndex = i;
6333  break;
6334  }
6335  }
6336  for (int i = mTickVector.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
6337  if (mTickVector.at(i) <= mRange.upper) {
6338  highFound = true;
6339  highIndex = i;
6340  break;
6341  }
6342  }
6343 
6344  if (!lowFound && highFound)
6345  lowIndex = highIndex + 1;
6346  else if (lowFound && !highFound)
6347  highIndex = lowIndex - 1;
6348 }
6349 
6360 double QCPAxis::baseLog(double value) const {
6361  return qLn(value) * mScaleLogBaseLogInv;
6362 }
6363 
6372 double QCPAxis::basePow(double value) const {
6373  return qPow(mScaleLogBase, value);
6374 }
6375 
6382 QPen QCPAxis::getBasePen() const {
6383  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedBasePen : mBasePen;
6384 }
6385 
6392 QPen QCPAxis::getTickPen() const {
6393  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedTickPen : mTickPen;
6394 }
6395 
6402 QPen QCPAxis::getSubTickPen() const {
6403  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedSubTickPen : mSubTickPen;
6404 }
6405 
6412 QFont QCPAxis::getTickLabelFont() const {
6413  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelFont
6414  : mTickLabelFont;
6415 }
6416 
6423 QFont QCPAxis::getLabelFont() const {
6424  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelFont : mLabelFont;
6425 }
6426 
6433 QColor QCPAxis::getTickLabelColor() const {
6434  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelColor
6435  : mTickLabelColor;
6436 }
6437 
6444 QColor QCPAxis::getLabelColor() const {
6445  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelColor
6446  : mLabelColor;
6447 }
6448 
6469 int QCPAxis::calculateMargin() {
6470  if (!mVisible) // if not visible, directly return 0, don't cache 0 because we
6471  // can't react to setVisible in QCPAxis
6472  return 0;
6473 
6474  if (mCachedMarginValid)
6475  return mCachedMargin;
6476 
6477  // run through similar steps as QCPAxis::draw, and caluclate margin needed to
6478  // fit axis and its labels
6479  int margin = 0;
6480 
6481  int lowTick, highTick;
6482  visibleTickBounds(lowTick, highTick);
6483  QVector<double> tickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector
6484  // passed to QCPAxisPainter
6485  QVector<QString> tickLabels; // the final vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
6486  tickPositions.reserve(highTick - lowTick + 1);
6487  tickLabels.reserve(highTick - lowTick + 1);
6488  if (mTicks) {
6489  for (int i = lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i) {
6490  tickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)));
6491  if (mTickLabels)
6492  tickLabels.append(mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
6493  }
6494  }
6495  // transfer all properties of this axis to QCPAxisPainterPrivate which it
6496  // needs to calculate the size.
6497  // Note that some axis painter properties are already set by direct
6498  // feed-through with QCPAxis setters
6499  mAxisPainter->type = mAxisType;
6500  mAxisPainter->labelFont = getLabelFont();
6501  mAxisPainter->label = mLabel;
6502  mAxisPainter->tickLabelFont = mTickLabelFont;
6503  mAxisPainter->axisRect = mAxisRect->rect();
6504  mAxisPainter->viewportRect = mParentPlot->viewport();
6505  mAxisPainter->tickPositions = tickPositions;
6506  mAxisPainter->tickLabels = tickLabels;
6507  margin += mAxisPainter->size();
6508  margin += mPadding;
6509 
6510  mCachedMargin = margin;
6511  mCachedMarginValid = true;
6512  return margin;
6513 }
6514 
6515 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6516 QCP::Interaction QCPAxis::selectionCategory() const { return QCP::iSelectAxes; }
6517 
6521 
6541 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::QCPAxisPainterPrivate(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
6542  : type(QCPAxis::atLeft),
6543  basePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
6544  lowerEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone), upperEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
6545  labelPadding(0), tickLabelPadding(0), tickLabelRotation(0),
6546  tickLabelSide(QCPAxis::lsOutside), substituteExponent(true),
6547  numberMultiplyCross(false), tickLengthIn(5), tickLengthOut(0),
6548  subTickLengthIn(2), subTickLengthOut(0),
6549  tickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
6550  subTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)), offset(0),
6551  abbreviateDecimalPowers(false), reversedEndings(false),
6552  mParentPlot(parentPlot), mLabelCache(16) // cache at most 16 (tick) labels
6553 {}
6554 
6555 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::~QCPAxisPainterPrivate() {}
6556 
6565 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
6566  QByteArray newHash = generateLabelParameterHash();
6567  if (newHash != mLabelParameterHash) {
6568  mLabelCache.clear();
6569  mLabelParameterHash = newHash;
6570  }
6571 
6572  QPoint origin;
6573  switch (type) {
6574  case QCPAxis::atLeft:
6575  origin = axisRect.bottomLeft() + QPoint(-offset, 0);
6576  break;
6577  case QCPAxis::atRight:
6578  origin = axisRect.bottomRight() + QPoint(+offset, 0);
6579  break;
6580  case QCPAxis::atTop:
6581  origin = axisRect.topLeft() + QPoint(0, -offset);
6582  break;
6583  case QCPAxis::atBottom:
6584  origin = axisRect.bottomLeft() + QPoint(0, +offset);
6585  break;
6586  }
6587 
6588  double xCor = 0, yCor = 0; // paint system correction, for pixel exact matches
6589  // (affects baselines and ticks of top/right axes)
6590  switch (type) {
6591  case QCPAxis::atTop:
6592  yCor = -1;
6593  break;
6594  case QCPAxis::atRight:
6595  xCor = 1;
6596  break;
6597  default:
6598  break;
6599  }
6600  int margin = 0;
6601  // draw baseline:
6602  QLineF baseLine;
6603  painter->setPen(basePen);
6604  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6605  baseLine.setPoints(origin + QPointF(xCor, yCor),
6606  origin + QPointF(axisRect.width() + xCor, yCor));
6607  else
6608  baseLine.setPoints(origin + QPointF(xCor, yCor),
6609  origin + QPointF(xCor, -axisRect.height() + yCor));
6610  if (reversedEndings)
6611  baseLine = QLineF(baseLine.p2(), baseLine.p1()); // won't make a difference
6612  // for line itself, but for
6613  // line endings later
6614  painter->drawLine(baseLine);
6615 
6616  // draw ticks:
6617  if (!tickPositions.isEmpty()) {
6618  painter->setPen(tickPen);
6619  int tickDir = (type == QCPAxis::atBottom || type == QCPAxis::atRight)
6620  ? -1
6621  : 1; // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left
6622  // axis and left for right axis)
6623  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal) {
6624  for (int i = 0; i < tickPositions.size(); ++i)
6625  painter->drawLine(QLineF(tickPositions.at(i) + xCor,
6626  origin.y() - tickLengthOut * tickDir + yCor,
6627  tickPositions.at(i) + xCor,
6628  origin.y() + tickLengthIn * tickDir + yCor));
6629  } else {
6630  for (int i = 0; i < tickPositions.size(); ++i)
6631  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x() - tickLengthOut * tickDir + xCor,
6632  tickPositions.at(i) + yCor,
6633  origin.x() + tickLengthIn * tickDir + xCor,
6634  tickPositions.at(i) + yCor));
6635  }
6636  }
6637 
6638  // draw subticks:
6639  if (!subTickPositions.isEmpty()) {
6640  painter->setPen(subTickPen);
6641  // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right
6642  // axis)
6643  int tickDir =
6644  (type == QCPAxis::atBottom || type == QCPAxis::atRight) ? -1 : 1;
6645  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal) {
6646  for (int i = 0; i < subTickPositions.size(); ++i)
6647  painter->drawLine(
6648  QLineF(subTickPositions.at(i) + xCor,
6649  origin.y() - subTickLengthOut * tickDir + yCor,
6650  subTickPositions.at(i) + xCor,
6651  origin.y() + subTickLengthIn * tickDir + yCor));
6652  } else {
6653  for (int i = 0; i < subTickPositions.size(); ++i)
6654  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x() - subTickLengthOut * tickDir + xCor,
6655  subTickPositions.at(i) + yCor,
6656  origin.x() + subTickLengthIn * tickDir + xCor,
6657  subTickPositions.at(i) + yCor));
6658  }
6659  }
6660  margin += qMax(0, qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut));
6661 
6662  // draw axis base endings:
6663  bool antialiasingBackup = painter->antialiasing();
6664  painter->setAntialiasing(true); // always want endings to be antialiased, even
6665  // if base and ticks themselves aren't
6666  painter->setBrush(QBrush(basePen.color()));
6667  QVector2D baseLineVector(baseLine.dx(), baseLine.dy());
6668  if (lowerEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
6669  lowerEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p1()) -
6670  baseLineVector.normalized() *
6671  lowerEnding.realLength() *
6672  (lowerEnding.inverted() ? -1 : 1),
6673  -baseLineVector);
6674  if (upperEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
6675  upperEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p2()) +
6676  baseLineVector.normalized() *
6677  upperEnding.realLength() *
6678  (upperEnding.inverted() ? -1 : 1),
6679  baseLineVector);
6680  painter->setAntialiasing(antialiasingBackup);
6681 
6682  // tick labels:
6683  QRect oldClipRect;
6684  if (tickLabelSide ==
6685  QCPAxis::lsInside) // if using inside labels, clip them to the axis rect
6686  {
6687  oldClipRect = painter->clipRegion().boundingRect();
6688  painter->setClipRect(axisRect);
6689  }
6690  QSize tickLabelsSize(
6691  0, 0); // size of largest tick label, for offset calculation of axis label
6692  if (!tickLabels.isEmpty()) {
6693  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
6694  margin += tickLabelPadding;
6695  painter->setFont(tickLabelFont);
6696  painter->setPen(QPen(tickLabelColor));
6697  const int maxLabelIndex = qMin(tickPositions.size(), tickLabels.size());
6698  int distanceToAxis = margin;
6699  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)
6700  distanceToAxis =
6701  -(qMax(tickLengthIn, subTickLengthIn) + tickLabelPadding);
6702  for (int i = 0; i < maxLabelIndex; ++i)
6703  placeTickLabel(painter, tickPositions.at(i), distanceToAxis,
6704  tickLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
6705  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
6706  margin += (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6707  ? tickLabelsSize.height()
6708  : tickLabelsSize.width();
6709  }
6710  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)
6711  painter->setClipRect(oldClipRect);
6712 
6713  // axis label:
6714  QRect labelBounds;
6715  if (!label.isEmpty()) {
6716  margin += labelPadding;
6717  painter->setFont(labelFont);
6718  painter->setPen(QPen(labelColor));
6719  labelBounds = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0,
6720  Qt::TextDontClip, label);
6721  if (type == QCPAxis::atLeft) {
6722  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
6723  painter->translate((origin.x() - margin - labelBounds.height()),
6724  origin.y());
6725  painter->rotate(-90);
6726  painter->drawText(0, 0, axisRect.height(), labelBounds.height(),
6727  Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6728  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
6729  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atRight) {
6730  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
6731  painter->translate((origin.x() + margin + labelBounds.height()),
6732  origin.y() - axisRect.height());
6733  painter->rotate(90);
6734  painter->drawText(0, 0, axisRect.height(), labelBounds.height(),
6735  Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6736  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
6737  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atTop)
6738  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y() - margin - labelBounds.height(),
6739  axisRect.width(), labelBounds.height(),
6740  Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6741  else if (type == QCPAxis::atBottom)
6742  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y() + margin, axisRect.width(),
6743  labelBounds.height(),
6744  Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
6745  }
6746 
6747  // set selection boxes:
6748  int selectionTolerance = 0;
6749  if (mParentPlot)
6750  selectionTolerance = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance();
6751  else
6752  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "mParentPlot is null";
6753  int selAxisOutSize =
6754  qMax(qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut), selectionTolerance);
6755  int selAxisInSize = selectionTolerance;
6756  int selTickLabelSize;
6757  int selTickLabelOffset;
6758  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) {
6759  selTickLabelSize =
6760  (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height()
6761  : tickLabelsSize.width());
6762  selTickLabelOffset =
6763  qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut) + tickLabelPadding;
6764  } else {
6765  selTickLabelSize = -(QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal
6766  ? tickLabelsSize.height()
6767  : tickLabelsSize.width());
6768  selTickLabelOffset =
6769  -(qMax(tickLengthIn, subTickLengthIn) + tickLabelPadding);
6770  }
6771  int selLabelSize = labelBounds.height();
6772  int selLabelOffset =
6773  qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut) +
6774  (!tickLabels.isEmpty() && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside
6775  ? tickLabelPadding + selTickLabelSize
6776  : 0) +
6777  labelPadding;
6778  if (type == QCPAxis::atLeft) {
6779  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x() - selAxisOutSize, axisRect.top(),
6780  origin.x() + selAxisInSize, axisRect.bottom());
6781  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(
6782  origin.x() - selTickLabelOffset - selTickLabelSize, axisRect.top(),
6783  origin.x() - selTickLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
6784  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x() - selLabelOffset - selLabelSize,
6785  axisRect.top(), origin.x() - selLabelOffset,
6786  axisRect.bottom());
6787  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atRight) {
6788  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x() - selAxisInSize, axisRect.top(),
6789  origin.x() + selAxisOutSize, axisRect.bottom());
6790  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(
6791  origin.x() + selTickLabelOffset + selTickLabelSize, axisRect.top(),
6792  origin.x() + selTickLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
6793  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x() + selLabelOffset + selLabelSize,
6794  axisRect.top(), origin.x() + selLabelOffset,
6795  axisRect.bottom());
6796  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atTop) {
6797  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y() - selAxisOutSize,
6798  axisRect.right(), origin.y() + selAxisInSize);
6799  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(
6800  axisRect.left(), origin.y() - selTickLabelOffset - selTickLabelSize,
6801  axisRect.right(), origin.y() - selTickLabelOffset);
6802  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(),
6803  origin.y() - selLabelOffset - selLabelSize,
6804  axisRect.right(), origin.y() - selLabelOffset);
6805  } else if (type == QCPAxis::atBottom) {
6806  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y() - selAxisInSize,
6807  axisRect.right(), origin.y() + selAxisOutSize);
6808  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(
6809  axisRect.left(), origin.y() + selTickLabelOffset + selTickLabelSize,
6810  axisRect.right(), origin.y() + selTickLabelOffset);
6811  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(),
6812  origin.y() + selLabelOffset + selLabelSize,
6813  axisRect.right(), origin.y() + selLabelOffset);
6814  }
6815  mAxisSelectionBox = mAxisSelectionBox.normalized();
6816  mTickLabelsSelectionBox = mTickLabelsSelectionBox.normalized();
6817  mLabelSelectionBox = mLabelSelectionBox.normalized();
6818  // draw hitboxes for debug purposes:
6819  // painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
6820  // painter->drawRects(QVector<QRect>() << mAxisSelectionBox <<
6821  // mTickLabelsSelectionBox << mLabelSelectionBox);
6822 }
6823 
6830 int QCPAxisPainterPrivate::size() const {
6831  int result = 0;
6832 
6833  // get length of tick marks pointing outwards:
6834  if (!tickPositions.isEmpty())
6835  result += qMax(0, qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut));
6836 
6837  // calculate size of tick labels:
6838  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) {
6839  QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0);
6840  if (!tickLabels.isEmpty()) {
6841  for (int i = 0; i < tickLabels.size(); ++i)
6842  getMaxTickLabelSize(tickLabelFont, tickLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
6843  result += QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal
6844  ? tickLabelsSize.height()
6845  : tickLabelsSize.width();
6846  result += tickLabelPadding;
6847  }
6848  }
6849 
6850  // calculate size of axis label (only height needed, because left/right labels
6851  // are rotated by 90 degrees):
6852  if (!label.isEmpty()) {
6853  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(labelFont);
6854  QRect bounds;
6855  bounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(
6856  0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignVCenter,
6857  label);
6858  result += bounds.height() + labelPadding;
6859  }
6860 
6861  return result;
6862 }
6863 
6872 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::clearCache() { mLabelCache.clear(); }
6873 
6884 QByteArray QCPAxisPainterPrivate::generateLabelParameterHash() const {
6885  QByteArray result;
6886  result.append(QByteArray::number(tickLabelRotation));
6887  result.append(QByteArray::number((int)tickLabelSide));
6888  result.append(QByteArray::number((int)substituteExponent));
6889  result.append(QByteArray::number((int)numberMultiplyCross));
6890  result.append(tickLabelColor.name().toLatin1() +
6891  QByteArray::number(tickLabelColor.alpha(), 16));
6892  result.append(tickLabelFont.toString().toLatin1());
6893  return result;
6894 }
6895 
6926 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::placeTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double position,
6927  int distanceToAxis,
6928  const QString &text,
6929  QSize *tickLabelsSize) {
6930  // warning: if you change anything here, also adapt getMaxTickLabelSize()
6931  // accordingly!
6932  if (text.isEmpty())
6933  return;
6934  QSize finalSize;
6935  QPointF labelAnchor;
6936  switch (type) {
6937  case QCPAxis::atLeft:
6938  labelAnchor = QPointF(axisRect.left() - distanceToAxis - offset, position);
6939  break;
6940  case QCPAxis::atRight:
6941  labelAnchor = QPointF(axisRect.right() + distanceToAxis + offset, position);
6942  break;
6943  case QCPAxis::atTop:
6944  labelAnchor = QPointF(position, axisRect.top() - distanceToAxis - offset);
6945  break;
6946  case QCPAxis::atBottom:
6947  labelAnchor =
6948  QPointF(position, axisRect.bottom() + distanceToAxis + offset);
6949  break;
6950  }
6951  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) &&
6952  !painter->modes().testFlag(
6953  QCPPainter::pmNoCaching)) // label caching enabled
6954  {
6955  CachedLabel *cachedLabel =
6956  mLabelCache.take(text); // attempt to get label from cache
6957  if (!cachedLabel) // no cached label existed, create it
6958  {
6959  cachedLabel = new CachedLabel;
6960  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
6961  cachedLabel->offset = getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData) +
6962  labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft();
6963  cachedLabel->pixmap = QPixmap(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size());
6964  cachedLabel->pixmap.fill(Qt::transparent);
6965  QCPPainter cachePainter(&cachedLabel->pixmap);
6966  cachePainter.setPen(painter->pen());
6967  drawTickLabel(&cachePainter, -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().x(),
6968  -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().y(), labelData);
6969  }
6970  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it
6971  // (only for outside tick labels):
6972  bool labelClippedByBorder = false;
6973  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) {
6974  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
6975  labelClippedByBorder =
6976  labelAnchor.x() + cachedLabel->offset.x() +
6977  cachedLabel->pixmap.width() >
6978  viewportRect.right() ||
6979  labelAnchor.x() + cachedLabel->offset.x() < viewportRect.left();
6980  else
6981  labelClippedByBorder =
6982  labelAnchor.y() + cachedLabel->offset.y() +
6983  cachedLabel->pixmap.height() >
6984  viewportRect.bottom() ||
6985  labelAnchor.y() + cachedLabel->offset.y() < viewportRect.top();
6986  }
6987  if (!labelClippedByBorder) {
6988  painter->drawPixmap(labelAnchor + cachedLabel->offset,
6989  cachedLabel->pixmap);
6990  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
6991  }
6992  mLabelCache.insert(text, cachedLabel); // return label to cache or insert
6993  // for the first time if newly
6994  // created
6995  } else // label caching disabled, draw text directly on surface:
6996  {
6997  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
6998  QPointF finalPosition = labelAnchor + getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData);
6999  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it
7000  // (only for outside tick labels):
7001  bool labelClippedByBorder = false;
7002  if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) {
7003  if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
7004  labelClippedByBorder =
7005  finalPosition.x() + (labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.width() +
7006  labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left()) >
7007  viewportRect.right() ||
7008  finalPosition.x() + labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left() <
7009  viewportRect.left();
7010  else
7011  labelClippedByBorder =
7012  finalPosition.y() + (labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.height() +
7013  labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top()) >
7014  viewportRect.bottom() ||
7015  finalPosition.y() + labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top() <
7016  viewportRect.top();
7017  }
7018  if (!labelClippedByBorder) {
7019  drawTickLabel(painter, finalPosition.x(), finalPosition.y(), labelData);
7020  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
7021  }
7022  }
7023 
7024  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
7025  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
7026  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
7027  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
7028  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
7029 }
7030 
7043 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::drawTickLabel(
7044  QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y,
7045  const TickLabelData &labelData) const {
7046  // backup painter settings that we're about to change:
7047  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
7048  QFont oldFont = painter->font();
7049 
7050  // transform painter to position/rotation:
7051  painter->translate(x, y);
7052  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation))
7053  painter->rotate(tickLabelRotation);
7054 
7055  // draw text:
7056  if (!labelData.expPart
7057  .isEmpty()) // indicator that beautiful powers must be used
7058  {
7059  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
7060  painter->drawText(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.basePart);
7061  painter->setFont(labelData.expFont);
7062  painter->drawText(labelData.baseBounds.width() + 1, 0,
7063  labelData.expBounds.width(), labelData.expBounds.height(),
7064  Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.expPart);
7065  } else {
7066  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
7067  painter->drawText(0, 0, labelData.totalBounds.width(),
7068  labelData.totalBounds.height(),
7069  Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, labelData.basePart);
7070  }
7071 
7072  // reset painter settings to what it was before:
7073  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
7074  painter->setFont(oldFont);
7075 }
7076 
7088 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::TickLabelData
7089 QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getTickLabelData(const QFont &font,
7090  const QString &text) const {
7091  TickLabelData result;
7092 
7093  // determine whether beautiful decimal powers should be used
7094  bool useBeautifulPowers = false;
7095  int ePos = -1;
7096  if (substituteExponent) {
7097  ePos = text.indexOf(QLatin1Char('e'));
7098  if (ePos > -1)
7099  useBeautifulPowers = true;
7100  }
7101 
7102  // calculate text bounding rects and do string preparation for beautiful
7103  // decimal powers:
7104  result.baseFont = font;
7105  if (result.baseFont.pointSizeF() > 0) // might return -1 if specified with
7106  // setPixelSize, in that case we can't
7107  // do correction in next line
7108  result.baseFont.setPointSizeF(result.baseFont.pointSizeF() +
7109  0.05); // QFontMetrics.boundingRect has a bug
7110  // for exact point sizes that make the
7111  // results oscillate due to internal
7112  // rounding
7113  if (useBeautifulPowers) {
7114  // split text into parts of number/symbol that will be drawn normally and
7115  // part that will be drawn as exponent:
7116  result.basePart = text.left(ePos);
7117  // in log scaling, we want to turn "1*10^n" into "10^n", else add
7118  // multiplication sign and decimal base:
7119  if (abbreviateDecimalPowers && result.basePart == QLatin1String("1"))
7120  result.basePart = QLatin1String("10");
7121  else
7122  result.basePart +=
7123  (numberMultiplyCross ? QString(QChar(215)) : QString(QChar(183))) +
7124  QLatin1String("10");
7125  result.expPart = text.mid(ePos + 1);
7126  // clip "+" and leading zeros off expPart:
7127  while (result.expPart.length() > 2 &&
7128  result.expPart.at(1) == QLatin1Char('0')) // length > 2 so we leave
7129  // one zero when
7130  // numberFormatChar is 'e'
7131  result.expPart.remove(1, 1);
7132  if (!result.expPart.isEmpty() && result.expPart.at(0) == QLatin1Char('+'))
7133  result.expPart.remove(0, 1);
7134  // prepare smaller font for exponent:
7135  result.expFont = font;
7136  if (result.expFont.pointSize() > 0)
7137  result.expFont.setPointSize(result.expFont.pointSize() * 0.75);
7138  else
7139  result.expFont.setPixelSize(result.expFont.pixelSize() * 0.75);
7140  // calculate bounding rects of base part, exponent part and total one:
7141  result.baseBounds =
7142  QFontMetrics(result.baseFont)
7143  .boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.basePart);
7144  result.expBounds =
7145  QFontMetrics(result.expFont)
7146  .boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.expPart);
7147  result.totalBounds = result.baseBounds.adjusted(
7148  0, 0, result.expBounds.width() + 2,
7149  0); // +2 consists of the 1 pixel spacing between base and exponent (see
7150  // drawTickLabel) and an extra pixel to include AA
7151  } else // useBeautifulPowers == false
7152  {
7153  result.basePart = text;
7154  result.totalBounds =
7155  QFontMetrics(result.baseFont)
7156  .boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter,
7157  result.basePart);
7158  }
7159  result.totalBounds.moveTopLeft(QPoint(0, 0)); // want bounding box aligned top
7160  // left at origin, independent
7161  // of how it was created, to
7162  // make further processing
7163  // simpler
7164 
7165  // calculate possibly different bounding rect after rotation:
7166  result.rotatedTotalBounds = result.totalBounds;
7167  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation)) {
7168  QTransform transform;
7169  transform.rotate(tickLabelRotation);
7170  result.rotatedTotalBounds = transform.mapRect(result.rotatedTotalBounds);
7171  }
7172 
7173  return result;
7174 }
7175 
7188 QPointF QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getTickLabelDrawOffset(
7189  const TickLabelData &labelData) const {
7190  /*
7191  calculate label offset from base point at tick (non-trivial, for best visual
7192  appearance): short
7193  explanation for bottom axis: The anchor, i.e. the point in the label that is
7194  placed
7195  horizontally under the corresponding tick is always on the label side that
7196  is closer to the
7197  axis (e.g. the left side of the text when we're rotating clockwise). On that
7198  side, the height
7199  is halved and the resulting point is defined the anchor. This way, a 90
7200  degree rotated text
7201  will be centered under the tick (i.e. displaced horizontally by half its
7202  height). At the same
7203  time, a 45 degree rotated text will "point toward" its tick, as is typical
7204  for rotated tick
7205  labels.
7206  */
7207  bool doRotation = !qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation);
7208  bool flip = qFuzzyCompare(qAbs(tickLabelRotation),
7209  90.0); // perfect +/-90 degree flip. Indicates
7210  // vertical label centering on vertical axes.
7211  double radians = tickLabelRotation / 180.0 * M_PI;
7212  int x = 0, y = 0;
7213  if ((type == QCPAxis::atLeft && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) ||
7214  (type == QCPAxis::atRight &&
7215  tickLabelSide ==
7216  QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at right side of tick label
7217  {
7218  if (doRotation) {
7219  if (tickLabelRotation > 0) {
7220  x = -qCos(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.width();
7221  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width() / 2.0
7222  : -qSin(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.width() -
7223  qCos(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7224  } else {
7225  x = -qCos(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.width() -
7226  qSin(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height();
7227  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width() / 2.0
7228  : +qSin(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.width() -
7229  qCos(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7230  }
7231  } else {
7232  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width();
7233  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7234  }
7235  } else if ((type == QCPAxis::atRight &&
7236  tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) ||
7237  (type == QCPAxis::atLeft &&
7238  tickLabelSide ==
7239  QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at left side of tick label
7240  {
7241  if (doRotation) {
7242  if (tickLabelRotation > 0) {
7243  x = +qSin(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height();
7244  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width() / 2.0
7245  : -qCos(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7246  } else {
7247  x = 0;
7248  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width() / 2.0
7249  : -qCos(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7250  }
7251  } else {
7252  x = 0;
7253  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7254  }
7255  } else if ((type == QCPAxis::atTop && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) ||
7256  (type == QCPAxis::atBottom &&
7257  tickLabelSide ==
7258  QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at bottom side of tick label
7259  {
7260  if (doRotation) {
7261  if (tickLabelRotation > 0) {
7262  x = -qCos(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.width() +
7263  qSin(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7264  y = -qSin(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.width() -
7265  qCos(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height();
7266  } else {
7267  x = -qSin(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7268  y = -qCos(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height();
7269  }
7270  } else {
7271  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width() / 2.0;
7272  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height();
7273  }
7274  } else if ((type == QCPAxis::atBottom &&
7275  tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) ||
7276  (type == QCPAxis::atTop &&
7277  tickLabelSide ==
7278  QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at top side of tick label
7279  {
7280  if (doRotation) {
7281  if (tickLabelRotation > 0) {
7282  x = +qSin(radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7283  y = 0;
7284  } else {
7285  x = -qCos(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.width() -
7286  qSin(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.height() / 2.0;
7287  y = +qSin(-radians) * labelData.totalBounds.width();
7288  }
7289  } else {
7290  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width() / 2.0;
7291  y = 0;
7292  }
7293  }
7294 
7295  return QPointF(x, y);
7296 }
7297 
7308 void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getMaxTickLabelSize(const QFont &font,
7309  const QString &text,
7310  QSize *tickLabelsSize) const {
7311  // note: this function must return the same tick label sizes as the
7312  // placeTickLabel function.
7313  QSize finalSize;
7314  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) &&
7315  mLabelCache.contains(text)) // label caching enabled and have cached label
7316  {
7317  const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
7318  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
7319  } else // label caching disabled or no label with this text cached:
7320  {
7321  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(font, text);
7322  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
7323  }
7324 
7325  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
7326  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
7327  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
7328  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
7329  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
7330 }
7331 
7335 
7425 /* start of documentation of pure virtual functions */
7426 
7494 /* end of documentation of pure virtual functions */
7495 /* start of documentation of signals */
7496 
7511 /* end of documentation of signals */
7512 
7530 QCPAbstractPlottable::QCPAbstractPlottable(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
7531  : QCPLayerable(keyAxis->parentPlot(), QString(), keyAxis->axisRect()),
7532  mName(), mAntialiasedFill(true), mAntialiasedScatters(true),
7533  mAntialiasedErrorBars(false), mPen(Qt::black), mSelectedPen(Qt::black),
7534  mBrush(Qt::NoBrush), mSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush), mKeyAxis(keyAxis),
7535  mValueAxis(valueAxis), mSelectable(true), mSelected(false) {
7536  if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != valueAxis->parentPlot())
7537  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
7538  << "Parent plot of keyAxis is not the same as that of valueAxis.";
7539  if (keyAxis->orientation() == valueAxis->orientation())
7540  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
7541  << "keyAxis and valueAxis must be orthogonal to each other.";
7542 }
7543 
7549 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setName(const QString &name) { mName = name; }
7550 
7558 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedFill(bool enabled) {
7559  mAntialiasedFill = enabled;
7560 }
7561 
7570 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedScatters(bool enabled) {
7571  mAntialiasedScatters = enabled;
7572 }
7573 
7581 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedErrorBars(bool enabled) {
7582  mAntialiasedErrorBars = enabled;
7583 }
7584 
7594 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
7595 
7603 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen) {
7604  mSelectedPen = pen;
7605 }
7606 
7617 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setBrush(const QBrush &brush) { mBrush = brush; }
7618 
7626 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush) {
7627  mSelectedBrush = brush;
7628 }
7629 
7646 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setKeyAxis(QCPAxis *axis) { mKeyAxis = axis; }
7647 
7664 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setValueAxis(QCPAxis *axis) { mValueAxis = axis; }
7665 
7677 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectable(bool selectable) {
7678  if (mSelectable != selectable) {
7679  mSelectable = selectable;
7680  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
7681  }
7682 }
7683 
7704 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelected(bool selected) {
7705  if (mSelected != selected) {
7706  mSelected = selected;
7707  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
7708  }
7709 }
7710 
7731 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge) const {
7732  rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge);
7733  rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge);
7734 }
7735 
7741 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const {
7742  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7743  if (!keyAxis) {
7744  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis";
7745  return;
7746  }
7747 
7748  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
7749  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
7750  signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
7751 
7752  bool foundRange;
7753  QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(foundRange, signDomain);
7754  if (foundRange) {
7755  if (onlyEnlarge)
7756  newRange.expand(keyAxis->range());
7757  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero
7758  // (plottable has only constant data in
7759  // this axis dimension), shift current
7760  // range to at least center the
7761  // plottable
7762  {
7763  double center = (newRange.lower + newRange.upper) *
7764  0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just
7765  // to make sure, incase validRange returned false for
7766  // other reason
7767  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear) {
7768  newRange.lower = center - keyAxis->range().size() / 2.0;
7769  newRange.upper = center + keyAxis->range().size() / 2.0;
7770  } else // scaleType() == stLogarithmic
7771  {
7772  newRange.lower =
7773  center / qSqrt(keyAxis->range().upper / keyAxis->range().lower);
7774  newRange.upper =
7775  center * qSqrt(keyAxis->range().upper / keyAxis->range().lower);
7776  }
7777  }
7778  keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
7779  }
7780 }
7781 
7791 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const {
7792  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7793  if (!valueAxis) {
7794  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid value axis";
7795  return;
7796  }
7797 
7798  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
7799  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
7800  signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
7801 
7802  bool foundRange;
7803  QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(foundRange, signDomain);
7804  if (foundRange) {
7805  if (onlyEnlarge)
7806  newRange.expand(valueAxis->range());
7807  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero
7808  // (plottable has only constant data in
7809  // this axis dimension), shift current
7810  // range to at least center the
7811  // plottable
7812  {
7813  double center = (newRange.lower + newRange.upper) *
7814  0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just
7815  // to make sure, incase validRange returned false for
7816  // other reason
7817  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear) {
7818  newRange.lower = center - valueAxis->range().size() / 2.0;
7819  newRange.upper = center + valueAxis->range().size() / 2.0;
7820  } else // scaleType() == stLogarithmic
7821  {
7822  newRange.lower =
7823  center / qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper / valueAxis->range().lower);
7824  newRange.upper =
7825  center * qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper / valueAxis->range().lower);
7826  }
7827  }
7828  valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
7829  }
7830 }
7831 
7848 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::addToLegend() {
7849  if (!mParentPlot || !mParentPlot->legend)
7850  return false;
7851 
7852  if (!mParentPlot->legend->hasItemWithPlottable(this)) {
7853  mParentPlot->legend->addItem(
7854  new QCPPlottableLegendItem(mParentPlot->legend, this));
7855  return true;
7856  } else
7857  return false;
7858 }
7859 
7873 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::removeFromLegend() const {
7874  if (!mParentPlot->legend)
7875  return false;
7876 
7877  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *lip =
7878  mParentPlot->legend->itemWithPlottable(this))
7879  return mParentPlot->legend->removeItem(lip);
7880  else
7881  return false;
7882 }
7883 
7884 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7885 QRect QCPAbstractPlottable::clipRect() const {
7886  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
7887  return mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect() &
7888  mValueAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect();
7889  else
7890  return QRect();
7891 }
7892 
7893 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7894 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractPlottable::selectionCategory() const {
7895  return QCP::iSelectPlottables;
7896 }
7897 
7911 void QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value, double &x,
7912  double &y) const {
7913  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7914  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7915  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
7916  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
7917  return;
7918  }
7919 
7920  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
7921  x = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
7922  y = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
7923  } else {
7924  y = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
7925  x = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
7926  }
7927 }
7928 
7934 const QPointF QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key,
7935  double value) const {
7936  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7937  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7938  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
7939  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
7940  return QPointF();
7941  }
7942 
7943  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7944  return QPointF(keyAxis->coordToPixel(key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(value));
7945  else
7946  return QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(key));
7947 }
7948 
7962 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(double x, double y, double &key,
7963  double &value) const {
7964  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
7965  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
7966  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
7967  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
7968  return;
7969  }
7970 
7971  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
7972  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
7973  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
7974  } else {
7975  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
7976  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
7977  }
7978 }
7979 
7985 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(const QPointF &pixelPos, double &key,
7986  double &value) const {
7987  pixelsToCoords(pixelPos.x(), pixelPos.y(), key, value);
7988 }
7989 
7996 QPen QCPAbstractPlottable::mainPen() const {
7997  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
7998 }
7999 
8006 QBrush QCPAbstractPlottable::mainBrush() const {
8007  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
8008 }
8009 
8027 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(
8028  QCPPainter *painter) const {
8029  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aePlottables);
8030 }
8031 
8046 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyFillAntialiasingHint(
8047  QCPPainter *painter) const {
8048  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedFill, QCP::aeFills);
8049 }
8050 
8065 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyScattersAntialiasingHint(
8066  QCPPainter *painter) const {
8067  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedScatters, QCP::aeScatters);
8068 }
8069 
8084 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(
8085  QCPPainter *painter) const {
8086  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedErrorBars, QCP::aeErrorBars);
8087 }
8088 
8101 double QCPAbstractPlottable::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start,
8102  const QPointF &end,
8103  const QPointF &point) const {
8104  QVector2D a(start);
8105  QVector2D b(end);
8106  QVector2D p(point);
8107  QVector2D v(b - a);
8108 
8109  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
8110  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr)) {
8111  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p - a, v) / vLengthSqr;
8112  if (mu < 0)
8113  return (a - p).lengthSquared();
8114  else if (mu > 1)
8115  return (b - p).lengthSquared();
8116  else
8117  return ((a + mu * v) - p).lengthSquared();
8118  } else
8119  return (a - p).lengthSquared();
8120 }
8121 
8122 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8123 void QCPAbstractPlottable::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive,
8124  const QVariant &details,
8125  bool *selectionStateChanged) {
8126  Q_UNUSED(event)
8127  Q_UNUSED(details)
8128  if (mSelectable) {
8129  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8130  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
8131  if (selectionStateChanged)
8132  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8133  }
8134 }
8135 
8136 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8137 void QCPAbstractPlottable::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged) {
8138  if (mSelectable) {
8139  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8140  setSelected(false);
8141  if (selectionStateChanged)
8142  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8143  }
8144 }
8145 
8149 
8180 /* start documentation of inline functions */
8181 
8195 /* end documentation of inline functions */
8196 
8204 QCPItemAnchor::QCPItemAnchor(QCustomPlot *parentPlot,
8205  QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString name,
8206  int anchorId)
8207  : mName(name), mParentPlot(parentPlot), mParentItem(parentItem),
8208  mAnchorId(anchorId) {}
8209 
8210 QCPItemAnchor::~QCPItemAnchor() {
8211  // unregister as parent at children:
8212  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenX.toList()) {
8213  if (child->parentAnchorX() == this)
8214  child->setParentAnchorX(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child
8215  // removes itself from mChildrenX
8216  }
8217  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenY.toList()) {
8218  if (child->parentAnchorY() == this)
8219  child->setParentAnchorY(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child
8220  // removes itself from mChildrenY
8221  }
8222 }
8223 
8232 QPointF QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint() const {
8233  if (mParentItem) {
8234  if (mAnchorId > -1) {
8235  return mParentItem->anchorPixelPoint(mAnchorId);
8236  } else {
8237  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no valid anchor id set:" << mAnchorId;
8238  return QPointF();
8239  }
8240  } else {
8241  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent item set";
8242  return QPointF();
8243  }
8244 }
8245 
8256 void QCPItemAnchor::addChildX(QCPItemPosition *pos) {
8257  if (!mChildrenX.contains(pos))
8258  mChildrenX.insert(pos);
8259  else
8260  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos is child already"
8261  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
8262 }
8263 
8270 void QCPItemAnchor::removeChildX(QCPItemPosition *pos) {
8271  if (!mChildrenX.remove(pos))
8272  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos isn't child"
8273  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
8274 }
8275 
8286 void QCPItemAnchor::addChildY(QCPItemPosition *pos) {
8287  if (!mChildrenY.contains(pos))
8288  mChildrenY.insert(pos);
8289  else
8290  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos is child already"
8291  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
8292 }
8293 
8300 void QCPItemAnchor::removeChildY(QCPItemPosition *pos) {
8301  if (!mChildrenY.remove(pos))
8302  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos isn't child"
8303  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
8304 }
8305 
8309 
8364 /* start documentation of inline functions */
8365 
8390 /* end documentation of inline functions */
8391 
8399 QCPItemPosition::QCPItemPosition(QCustomPlot *parentPlot,
8400  QCPAbstractItem *parentItem,
8401  const QString name)
8402  : QCPItemAnchor(parentPlot, parentItem, name), mPositionTypeX(ptAbsolute),
8403  mPositionTypeY(ptAbsolute), mKey(0), mValue(0), mParentAnchorX(0),
8404  mParentAnchorY(0) {}
8405 
8406 QCPItemPosition::~QCPItemPosition() {
8407  // unregister as parent at children:
8408  // Note: this is done in ~QCPItemAnchor again, but it's important
8409  // QCPItemPosition does it itself, because only then
8410  // the setParentAnchor(0) call the correct QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint
8411  // function instead of QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint
8412  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenX.toList()) {
8413  if (child->parentAnchorX() == this)
8414  child->setParentAnchorX(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child
8415  // removes itself from mChildrenX
8416  }
8417  foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenY.toList()) {
8418  if (child->parentAnchorY() == this)
8419  child->setParentAnchorY(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child
8420  // removes itself from mChildrenY
8421  }
8422  // unregister as child in parent:
8423  if (mParentAnchorX)
8424  mParentAnchorX->removeChildX(this);
8425  if (mParentAnchorY)
8426  mParentAnchorY->removeChildY(this);
8427 }
8428 
8429 /* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with
8430  * forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
8431 QCPAxisRect *QCPItemPosition::axisRect() const { return mAxisRect.data(); }
8432 
8470 void QCPItemPosition::setType(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type) {
8471  setTypeX(type);
8472  setTypeY(type);
8473 }
8474 
8483 void QCPItemPosition::setTypeX(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type) {
8484  if (mPositionTypeX != type) {
8485  // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because
8486  // axes or axis rect
8487  // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPoint() because it would
8488  // output a qDebug warning.
8489  bool retainPixelPosition = true;
8490  if ((mPositionTypeX == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) &&
8491  (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
8492  retainPixelPosition = false;
8493  if ((mPositionTypeX == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) &&
8494  (!mAxisRect))
8495  retainPixelPosition = false;
8496 
8497  QPointF pixel;
8498  if (retainPixelPosition)
8499  pixel = pixelPoint();
8500 
8501  mPositionTypeX = type;
8502 
8503  if (retainPixelPosition)
8504  setPixelPoint(pixel);
8505  }
8506 }
8507 
8516 void QCPItemPosition::setTypeY(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type) {
8517  if (mPositionTypeY != type) {
8518  // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because
8519  // axes or axis rect
8520  // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPoint() because it would
8521  // output a qDebug warning.
8522  bool retainPixelPosition = true;
8523  if ((mPositionTypeY == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) &&
8524  (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
8525  retainPixelPosition = false;
8526  if ((mPositionTypeY == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) &&
8527  (!mAxisRect))
8528  retainPixelPosition = false;
8529 
8530  QPointF pixel;
8531  if (retainPixelPosition)
8532  pixel = pixelPoint();
8533 
8534  mPositionTypeY = type;
8535 
8536  if (retainPixelPosition)
8537  setPixelPoint(pixel);
8538  }
8539 }
8540 
8569 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchor(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor,
8570  bool keepPixelPosition) {
8571  bool successX = setParentAnchorX(parentAnchor, keepPixelPosition);
8572  bool successY = setParentAnchorY(parentAnchor, keepPixelPosition);
8573  return successX && successY;
8574 }
8575 
8584 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchorX(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor,
8585  bool keepPixelPosition) {
8586  // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
8587  if (parentAnchor == this) {
8588  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor"
8589  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
8590  return false;
8591  }
8592  // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
8593  QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
8594  while (currentParent) {
8595  if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos =
8596  currentParent->toQCPItemPosition()) {
8597  // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
8598  if (currentParentPos == this) {
8599  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
8600  << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship"
8601  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
8602  return false;
8603  }
8604  currentParent = currentParentPos->parentAnchorX();
8605  } else {
8606  // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent
8607  // items aren't the
8608  // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself
8609  // depends on the position,
8610  // because they're both on the same item:
8611  if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem) {
8612  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which "
8613  "itself depends on this position"
8614  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
8615  return false;
8616  }
8617  break;
8618  }
8619  }
8620 
8621  // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to
8622  // ptAbsolute:
8623  if (!mParentAnchorX && mPositionTypeX == ptPlotCoords)
8624  setTypeX(ptAbsolute);
8625 
8626  // save pixel position:
8627  QPointF pixelP;
8628  if (keepPixelPosition)
8629  pixelP = pixelPoint();
8630  // unregister at current parent anchor:
8631  if (mParentAnchorX)
8632  mParentAnchorX->removeChildX(this);
8633  // register at new parent anchor:
8634  if (parentAnchor)
8635  parentAnchor->addChildX(this);
8636  mParentAnchorX = parentAnchor;
8637  // restore pixel position under new parent:
8638  if (keepPixelPosition)
8639  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
8640  else
8641  setCoords(0, coords().y());
8642  return true;
8643 }
8644 
8653 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchorY(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor,
8654  bool keepPixelPosition) {
8655  // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
8656  if (parentAnchor == this) {
8657  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor"
8658  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
8659  return false;
8660  }
8661  // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
8662  QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
8663  while (currentParent) {
8664  if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos =
8665  currentParent->toQCPItemPosition()) {
8666  // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
8667  if (currentParentPos == this) {
8668  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
8669  << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship"
8670  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
8671  return false;
8672  }
8673  currentParent = currentParentPos->parentAnchorY();
8674  } else {
8675  // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent
8676  // items aren't the
8677  // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself
8678  // depends on the position,
8679  // because they're both on the same item:
8680  if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem) {
8681  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which "
8682  "itself depends on this position"
8683  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
8684  return false;
8685  }
8686  break;
8687  }
8688  }
8689 
8690  // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to
8691  // ptAbsolute:
8692  if (!mParentAnchorY && mPositionTypeY == ptPlotCoords)
8693  setTypeY(ptAbsolute);
8694 
8695  // save pixel position:
8696  QPointF pixelP;
8697  if (keepPixelPosition)
8698  pixelP = pixelPoint();
8699  // unregister at current parent anchor:
8700  if (mParentAnchorY)
8701  mParentAnchorY->removeChildY(this);
8702  // register at new parent anchor:
8703  if (parentAnchor)
8704  parentAnchor->addChildY(this);
8705  mParentAnchorY = parentAnchor;
8706  // restore pixel position under new parent:
8707  if (keepPixelPosition)
8708  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
8709  else
8710  setCoords(coords().x(), 0);
8711  return true;
8712 }
8713 
8739 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(double key, double value) {
8740  mKey = key;
8741  mValue = value;
8742 }
8743 
8750 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(const QPointF &pos) {
8751  setCoords(pos.x(), pos.y());
8752 }
8753 
8762 QPointF QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint() const {
8763  QPointF result;
8764 
8765  // determine X:
8766  switch (mPositionTypeX) {
8767  case ptAbsolute: {
8768  result.rx() = mKey;
8769  if (mParentAnchorX)
8770  result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8771  break;
8772  }
8773  case ptViewportRatio: {
8774  result.rx() = mKey * mParentPlot->viewport().width();
8775  if (mParentAnchorX)
8776  result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8777  else
8778  result.rx() += mParentPlot->viewport().left();
8779  break;
8780  }
8781  case ptAxisRectRatio: {
8782  if (mAxisRect) {
8783  result.rx() = mKey * mAxisRect.data()->width();
8784  if (mParentAnchorX)
8785  result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8786  else
8787  result.rx() += mAxisRect.data()->left();
8788  } else
8789  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptAxisRectRatio, but "
8790  "no axis rect was defined";
8791  break;
8792  }
8793  case ptPlotCoords: {
8794  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
8795  result.rx() = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
8796  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
8797  result.rx() = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
8798  else
8799  qDebug()
8800  << Q_FUNC_INFO
8801  << "Item position type x is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
8802  break;
8803  }
8804  }
8805 
8806  // determine Y:
8807  switch (mPositionTypeY) {
8808  case ptAbsolute: {
8809  result.ry() = mValue;
8810  if (mParentAnchorY)
8811  result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8812  break;
8813  }
8814  case ptViewportRatio: {
8815  result.ry() = mValue * mParentPlot->viewport().height();
8816  if (mParentAnchorY)
8817  result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8818  else
8819  result.ry() += mParentPlot->viewport().top();
8820  break;
8821  }
8822  case ptAxisRectRatio: {
8823  if (mAxisRect) {
8824  result.ry() = mValue * mAxisRect.data()->height();
8825  if (mParentAnchorY)
8826  result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8827  else
8828  result.ry() += mAxisRect.data()->top();
8829  } else
8830  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptAxisRectRatio, but "
8831  "no axis rect was defined";
8832  break;
8833  }
8834  case ptPlotCoords: {
8835  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
8836  result.ry() = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
8837  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
8838  result.ry() = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
8839  else
8840  qDebug()
8841  << Q_FUNC_INFO
8842  << "Item position type y is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
8843  break;
8844  }
8845  }
8846 
8847  return result;
8848 }
8849 
8857 void QCPItemPosition::setAxes(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) {
8858  mKeyAxis = keyAxis;
8859  mValueAxis = valueAxis;
8860 }
8861 
8869 void QCPItemPosition::setAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *axisRect) {
8870  mAxisRect = axisRect;
8871 }
8872 
8887 void QCPItemPosition::setPixelPoint(const QPointF &pixelPoint) {
8888  double x = pixelPoint.x();
8889  double y = pixelPoint.y();
8890 
8891  switch (mPositionTypeX) {
8892  case ptAbsolute: {
8893  if (mParentAnchorX)
8894  x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8895  break;
8896  }
8897  case ptViewportRatio: {
8898  if (mParentAnchorX)
8899  x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8900  else
8901  x -= mParentPlot->viewport().left();
8902  x /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().width();
8903  break;
8904  }
8905  case ptAxisRectRatio: {
8906  if (mAxisRect) {
8907  if (mParentAnchorX)
8908  x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPoint().x();
8909  else
8910  x -= mAxisRect.data()->left();
8911  x /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->width();
8912  } else
8913  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptAxisRectRatio, but "
8914  "no axis rect was defined";
8915  break;
8916  }
8917  case ptPlotCoords: {
8918  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
8919  x = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(x);
8920  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
8921  y = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(x);
8922  else
8923  qDebug()
8924  << Q_FUNC_INFO
8925  << "Item position type x is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
8926  break;
8927  }
8928  }
8929 
8930  switch (mPositionTypeY) {
8931  case ptAbsolute: {
8932  if (mParentAnchorY)
8933  y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8934  break;
8935  }
8936  case ptViewportRatio: {
8937  if (mParentAnchorY)
8938  y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8939  else
8940  y -= mParentPlot->viewport().top();
8941  y /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().height();
8942  break;
8943  }
8944  case ptAxisRectRatio: {
8945  if (mAxisRect) {
8946  if (mParentAnchorY)
8947  y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPoint().y();
8948  else
8949  y -= mAxisRect.data()->top();
8950  y /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->height();
8951  } else
8952  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptAxisRectRatio, but "
8953  "no axis rect was defined";
8954  break;
8955  }
8956  case ptPlotCoords: {
8957  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
8958  x = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(y);
8959  else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
8960  y = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(y);
8961  else
8962  qDebug()
8963  << Q_FUNC_INFO
8964  << "Item position type y is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
8965  break;
8966  }
8967  }
8968 
8969  setCoords(x, y);
8970 }
8971 
8975 
9148 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
9149 
9166 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
9167 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
9168 
9181 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
9182 /* start documentation of signals */
9183 
9190 /* end documentation of signals */
9191 
9195 QCPAbstractItem::QCPAbstractItem(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
9196  : QCPLayerable(parentPlot), mClipToAxisRect(false), mSelectable(true),
9197  mSelected(false) {
9198  QList<QCPAxisRect *> rects = parentPlot->axisRects();
9199  if (rects.size() > 0) {
9200  setClipToAxisRect(true);
9201  setClipAxisRect(rects.first());
9202  }
9203 }
9204 
9205 QCPAbstractItem::~QCPAbstractItem() {
9206  // don't delete mPositions because every position is also an anchor and thus
9207  // in mAnchors
9208  qDeleteAll(mAnchors);
9209 }
9210 
9211 /* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with
9212  * forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
9213 QCPAxisRect *QCPAbstractItem::clipAxisRect() const {
9214  return mClipAxisRect.data();
9215 }
9216 
9224 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipToAxisRect(bool clip) {
9225  mClipToAxisRect = clip;
9226  if (mClipToAxisRect)
9227  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
9228 }
9229 
9237 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *rect) {
9238  mClipAxisRect = rect;
9239  if (mClipToAxisRect)
9240  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
9241 }
9242 
9254 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelectable(bool selectable) {
