9255  if (mSelectable != selectable) {
9256  mSelectable = selectable;
9257  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
9258  }
9259 }
9260 
9279 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelected(bool selected) {
9280  if (mSelected != selected) {
9281  mSelected = selected;
9282  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
9283  }
9284 }
9285 
9299 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::position(const QString &name) const {
9300  for (int i = 0; i < mPositions.size(); ++i) {
9301  if (mPositions.at(i)->name() == name)
9302  return mPositions.at(i);
9303  }
9304  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "position with name not found:" << name;
9305  return 0;
9306 }
9307 
9321 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::anchor(const QString &name) const {
9322  for (int i = 0; i < mAnchors.size(); ++i) {
9323  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
9324  return mAnchors.at(i);
9325  }
9326  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor with name not found:" << name;
9327  return 0;
9328 }
9329 
9339 bool QCPAbstractItem::hasAnchor(const QString &name) const {
9340  for (int i = 0; i < mAnchors.size(); ++i) {
9341  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
9342  return true;
9343  }
9344  return false;
9345 }
9346 
9359 QRect QCPAbstractItem::clipRect() const {
9360  if (mClipToAxisRect && mClipAxisRect)
9361  return mClipAxisRect.data()->rect();
9362  else
9363  return mParentPlot->viewport();
9364 }
9365 
9382 void QCPAbstractItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const {
9383  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeItems);
9384 }
9385 
9400 double QCPAbstractItem::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end,
9401  const QPointF &point) const {
9402  QVector2D a(start);
9403  QVector2D b(end);
9404  QVector2D p(point);
9405  QVector2D v(b - a);
9406 
9407  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
9408  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr)) {
9409  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p - a, v) / vLengthSqr;
9410  if (mu < 0)
9411  return (a - p).lengthSquared();
9412  else if (mu > 1)
9413  return (b - p).lengthSquared();
9414  else
9415  return ((a + mu * v) - p).lengthSquared();
9416  } else
9417  return (a - p).lengthSquared();
9418 }
9419 
9440 double QCPAbstractItem::rectSelectTest(const QRectF &rect, const QPointF &pos,
9441  bool filledRect) const {
9442  double result = -1;
9443 
9444  // distance to border:
9445  QList<QLineF> lines;
9446  lines << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.topRight())
9447  << QLineF(rect.bottomLeft(), rect.bottomRight())
9448  << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.bottomLeft())
9449  << QLineF(rect.topRight(), rect.bottomRight());
9450  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
9451  for (int i = 0; i < lines.size(); ++i) {
9452  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(lines.at(i).p1(), lines.at(i).p2(), pos);
9453  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
9454  minDistSqr = distSqr;
9455  }
9456  result = qSqrt(minDistSqr);
9457 
9458  // filled rect, allow click inside to count as hit:
9459  if (filledRect && result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99) {
9460  if (rect.contains(pos))
9461  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
9462  }
9463  return result;
9464 }
9465 
9478 QPointF QCPAbstractItem::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const {
9479  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called on item which shouldn't have any anchors "
9480  "(this method not reimplemented). anchorId"
9481  << anchorId;
9482  return QPointF();
9483 }
9484 
9505 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::createPosition(const QString &name) {
9506  if (hasAnchor(name))
9507  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
9508  << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
9509  QCPItemPosition *newPosition = new QCPItemPosition(mParentPlot, this, name);
9510  mPositions.append(newPosition);
9511  mAnchors.append(newPosition); // every position is also an anchor
9512  newPosition->setAxes(mParentPlot->xAxis, mParentPlot->yAxis);
9513  newPosition->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
9514  if (mParentPlot->axisRect())
9515  newPosition->setAxisRect(mParentPlot->axisRect());
9516  newPosition->setCoords(0, 0);
9517  return newPosition;
9518 }
9519 
9548 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::createAnchor(const QString &name,
9549  int anchorId) {
9550  if (hasAnchor(name))
9551  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
9552  << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
9553  QCPItemAnchor *newAnchor =
9554  new QCPItemAnchor(mParentPlot, this, name, anchorId);
9555  mAnchors.append(newAnchor);
9556  return newAnchor;
9557 }
9558 
9559 /* inherits documentation from base class */
9560 void QCPAbstractItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive,
9561  const QVariant &details,
9562  bool *selectionStateChanged) {
9563  Q_UNUSED(event)
9564  Q_UNUSED(details)
9565  if (mSelectable) {
9566  bool selBefore = mSelected;
9567  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
9568  if (selectionStateChanged)
9569  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
9570  }
9571 }
9572 
9573 /* inherits documentation from base class */
9574 void QCPAbstractItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged) {
9575  if (mSelectable) {
9576  bool selBefore = mSelected;
9577  setSelected(false);
9578  if (selectionStateChanged)
9579  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
9580  }
9581 }
9582 
9583 /* inherits documentation from base class */
9584 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractItem::selectionCategory() const {
9585  return QCP::iSelectItems;
9586 }

9604 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
9605 
9636 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
9637 /* start of documentation of signals */
9638 
9870 /* end of documentation of signals */
9871 /* start of documentation of public members */
9872 
9978 /* end of documentation of public members */
9979 
9983 QCustomPlot::QCustomPlot(QWidget *parent)
9984  : QWidget(parent), xAxis(0), yAxis(0), xAxis2(0), yAxis2(0), legend(0),
9985  mPlotLayout(0), mAutoAddPlottableToLegend(true),
9986  mAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone), mNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
9987  mInteractions(0), mSelectionTolerance(8), mNoAntialiasingOnDrag(false),
9988  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::white, Qt::SolidPattern), mBackgroundScaled(true),
9989  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding), mCurrentLayer(0),
9990  mPlottingHints(QCP::phCacheLabels | QCP::phForceRepaint),
9991  mMultiSelectModifier(Qt::ControlModifier), mPaintBuffer(size()),
9992  mMouseEventElement(0), mReplotting(false) {
9993  setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoMousePropagation);
9994  setAttribute(Qt::WA_OpaquePaintEvent);
9995  setMouseTracking(true);
9996  QLocale currentLocale = locale();
9997  currentLocale.setNumberOptions(QLocale::OmitGroupSeparator);
9998  setLocale(currentLocale);
9999 
10000  // create initial layers:
10001  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("background")));
10002  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("grid")));
10003  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("main")));
10004  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("axes")));
10005  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("legend")));
10006  updateLayerIndices();
10007  setCurrentLayer(QLatin1String("main"));
10008 
10009  // create initial layout, axis rect and legend:
10010  mPlotLayout = new QCPLayoutGrid;
10011  mPlotLayout->initializeParentPlot(this);
10012  mPlotLayout->setParent(this); // important because if parent is QWidget,
10013  // QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged will call
10014  // QWidget::updateGeometry
10015  mPlotLayout->setLayer(QLatin1String("main"));
10016  QCPAxisRect *defaultAxisRect = new QCPAxisRect(this, true);
10017  mPlotLayout->addElement(0, 0, defaultAxisRect);
10018  xAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
10019  yAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
10020  xAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
10021  yAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
10022  legend = new QCPLegend;
10023  legend->setVisible(false);
10024  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->addElement(legend,
10025  Qt::AlignRight | Qt::AlignTop);
10026  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->setMargins(QMargins(12, 12, 12, 12));
10027 
10028  defaultAxisRect->setLayer(QLatin1String("background"));
10029  xAxis->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
10030  yAxis->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
10031  xAxis2->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
10032  yAxis2->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
10033  xAxis->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
10034  yAxis->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
10035  xAxis2->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
10036  yAxis2->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
10037  legend->setLayer(QLatin1String("legend"));
10038 
10039  setViewport(rect()); // needs to be called after mPlotLayout has been created
10040 
10041  replot();
10042 }
10043 
10044 QCustomPlot::~QCustomPlot() {
10045  clearPlottables();
10046  clearItems();
10047 
10048  if (mPlotLayout) {
10049  delete mPlotLayout;
10050  mPlotLayout = 0;
10051  }
10052 
10053  mCurrentLayer = 0;
10054  qDeleteAll(mLayers); // don't use removeLayer, because it would prevent the
10055  // last layer to be removed
10056  mLayers.clear();
10057 }
10058 
10083 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElements(
10084  const QCP::AntialiasedElements &antialiasedElements) {
10085  mAntialiasedElements = antialiasedElements;
10086 
10087  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and
10088  // mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
10089  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
10090  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
10091 }
10092 
10101 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElement(
10102  QCP::AntialiasedElement antialiasedElement, bool enabled) {
10103  if (!enabled && mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
10104  mAntialiasedElements &= ~antialiasedElement;
10105  else if (enabled && !mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
10106  mAntialiasedElements |= antialiasedElement;
10107 
10108  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and
10109  // mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
10110  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
10111  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
10112 }
10113 
10139 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElements(
10140  const QCP::AntialiasedElements &notAntialiasedElements) {
10141  mNotAntialiasedElements = notAntialiasedElements;
10142 
10143  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and
10144  // mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
10145  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
10146  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
10147 }
10148 
10157 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElement(
10158  QCP::AntialiasedElement notAntialiasedElement, bool enabled) {
10159  if (!enabled && mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
10160  mNotAntialiasedElements &= ~notAntialiasedElement;
10161  else if (enabled && !mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
10162  mNotAntialiasedElements |= notAntialiasedElement;
10163 
10164  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and
10165  // mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
10166  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
10167  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
10168 }
10169 
10177 void QCustomPlot::setAutoAddPlottableToLegend(bool on) {
10178  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend = on;
10179 }
10180 
10266 void QCustomPlot::setInteractions(const QCP::Interactions &interactions) {
10267  mInteractions = interactions;
10268 }
10269 
10277 void QCustomPlot::setInteraction(const QCP::Interaction &interaction,
10278  bool enabled) {
10279  if (!enabled && mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
10280  mInteractions &= ~interaction;
10281  else if (enabled && !mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
10282  mInteractions |= interaction;
10283 }

10322  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag = enabled;
10323 }

10331 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHints(const QCP::PlottingHints &hints) {
10332  mPlottingHints = hints;
10333 }
10334 
10340 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHint(QCP::PlottingHint hint, bool enabled) {
10341  QCP::PlottingHints newHints = mPlottingHints;
10342  if (!enabled)
10343  newHints &= ~hint;
10344  else
10345  newHints |= hint;
10346 
10347  if (newHints != mPlottingHints)
10348  setPlottingHints(newHints);
10349 }

10363  mMultiSelectModifier = modifier;
10364 }
10365 
10376 void QCustomPlot::setViewport(const QRect &rect) {
10377  mViewport = rect;
10378  if (mPlotLayout)
10379  mPlotLayout->setOuterRect(mViewport);
10380 }

10439 void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled,

10441  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;

10443  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
10444  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;

10475 }
10476 
10486 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable(int index) {
10487  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size()) {
10488  return mPlottables.at(index);
10489  } else {
10490  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
10491  return 0;
10492  }
10493 }
10494 
10503 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable() {
10504  if (!mPlottables.isEmpty()) {
10505  return mPlottables.last();
10506  } else
10507  return 0;
10508 }
10509 
10524 bool QCustomPlot::addPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) {
10525  if (mPlottables.contains(plottable)) {
10526  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable already added to this QCustomPlot:"
10527  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
10528  return false;
10529  }
10530  if (plottable->parentPlot() != this) {
10531  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
10532  << "plottable not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:"
10533  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
10534  return false;
10535  }
10536 
10537  mPlottables.append(plottable);
10538  // possibly add plottable to legend:
10539  if (mAutoAddPlottableToLegend)
10540  plottable->addToLegend();
10541  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
10542  if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph *>(plottable))
10543  mGraphs.append(graph);
10544  if (!plottable->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the
10545  // constructor of the plottable (via QCPLayerable
10546  // constructor)
10547  plottable->setLayer(currentLayer());
10548  return true;
10549 }
10550 
10559 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) {
10560  if (!mPlottables.contains(plottable)) {
10561  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not in list:"
10562  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
10563  return false;
10564  }
10565 
10566  // remove plottable from legend:
10567  plottable->removeFromLegend();
10568  // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
10569  if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph *>(plottable))
10570  mGraphs.removeOne(graph);
10571  // remove plottable:
10572  delete plottable;
10573  mPlottables.removeOne(plottable);
10574  return true;
10575 }
10576 
10581 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(int index) {
10582  if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
10583  return removePlottable(mPlottables[index]);
10584  else {
10585  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
10586  return false;
10587  }
10588 }
10589 
10598 int QCustomPlot::clearPlottables() {
10599  int c = mPlottables.size();
10600  for (int i = c - 1; i >= 0; --i)
10601  removePlottable(mPlottables[i]);
10602  return c;
10603 }
10604 
10610 int QCustomPlot::plottableCount() const { return mPlottables.size(); }
10611 
10622 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable *> QCustomPlot::selectedPlottables() const {
10623  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable *> result;
10624  foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mPlottables) {
10625  if (plottable->selected())
10626  result.append(plottable);
10627  }
10628  return result;
10629 }
10630 
10645 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottableAt(const QPointF &pos,
10646  bool onlySelectable) const {
10647  QCPAbstractPlottable *resultPlottable = 0;
10648  double resultDistance =
10649  mSelectionTolerance; // only regard clicks with distances smaller than
10650  // mSelectionTolerance as selections, so initialize
10651  // with that value
10652 
10653  foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mPlottables) {
10654  if (onlySelectable &&
10655  !plottable->selectable()) // we could have also passed onlySelectable to
10656  // the selectTest function, but checking here
10657  // is faster, because we have access to
10658  // QCPabstractPlottable::selectable
10659  continue;
10660  if ((plottable->keyAxis()->axisRect()->rect() &
10661  plottable->valueAxis()->axisRect()->rect())
10662  .contains(pos.toPoint())) // only consider clicks inside the rect
10663  // that is spanned by the plottable's
10664  // key/value axes
10665  {
10666  double currentDistance = plottable->selectTest(pos, false);
10667  if (currentDistance >= 0 && currentDistance < resultDistance) {
10668  resultPlottable = plottable;
10669  resultDistance = currentDistance;
10670  }
10671  }
10672  }
10673 
10674  return resultPlottable;
10675 }
10676 
10682 bool QCustomPlot::hasPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const {
10683  return mPlottables.contains(plottable);
10684 }
10685 
10695 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph(int index) const {
10696  if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size()) {
10697  return mGraphs.at(index);
10698  } else {
10699  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
10700  return 0;
10701  }
10702 }
10703 
10712 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph() const {
10713  if (!mGraphs.isEmpty()) {
10714  return mGraphs.last();
10715  } else
10716  return 0;
10717 }
10718 
10734 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::addGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) {
10735  if (!keyAxis)
10736  keyAxis = xAxis;
10737  if (!valueAxis)
10738  valueAxis = yAxis;
10739  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
10740  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't use default QCustomPlot xAxis or yAxis, "
10741  "because at least one is invalid (has been "
10742  "deleted)";
10743  return 0;
10744  }
10745  if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != this || valueAxis->parentPlot() != this) {
10746  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed keyAxis or valueAxis doesn't have this "
10747  "QCustomPlot as parent";
10748  return 0;
10749  }
10750 
10751  QCPGraph *newGraph = new QCPGraph(keyAxis, valueAxis);
10752  if (addPlottable(newGraph)) {
10753  newGraph->setName(QLatin1String("Graph ") +
10754  QString::number(mGraphs.size()));
10755  return newGraph;
10756  } else {
10757  delete newGraph;
10758  return 0;
10759  }
10760 }
10761 
10773 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(QCPGraph *graph) {
10774  return removePlottable(graph);
10775 }
10776 
10781 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(int index) {
10782  if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
10783  return removeGraph(mGraphs[index]);
10784  else
10785  return false;
10786 }
10787 
10795 int QCustomPlot::clearGraphs() {
10796  int c = mGraphs.size();
10797  for (int i = c - 1; i >= 0; --i)
10798  removeGraph(mGraphs[i]);
10799  return c;
10800 }
10801 
10807 int QCustomPlot::graphCount() const { return mGraphs.size(); }
10808 
10820 QList<QCPGraph *> QCustomPlot::selectedGraphs() const {
10821  QList<QCPGraph *> result;
10822  foreach (QCPGraph *graph, mGraphs) {
10823  if (graph->selected())
10824  result.append(graph);
10825  }
10826  return result;
10827 }
10828 
10838 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item(int index) const {
10839  if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size()) {
10840  return mItems.at(index);
10841  } else {
10842  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
10843  return 0;
10844  }
10845 }
10846 
10855 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item() const {
10856  if (!mItems.isEmpty()) {
10857  return mItems.last();
10858  } else
10859  return 0;
10860 }
10861 
10871 bool QCustomPlot::addItem(QCPAbstractItem *item) {
10872  if (!mItems.contains(item) && item->parentPlot() == this) {
10873  mItems.append(item);
10874  return true;
10875  } else {
10876  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
10877  << "item either already in list or not created with this "
10878  "QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
10879  return false;
10880  }
10881 }
10882 
10890 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(QCPAbstractItem *item) {
10891  if (mItems.contains(item)) {
10892  delete item;
10893  mItems.removeOne(item);
10894  return true;
10895  } else {
10896  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
10897  << "item not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
10898  return false;
10899  }
10900 }
10901 
10906 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(int index) {
10907  if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
10908  return removeItem(mItems[index]);
10909  else {
10910  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
10911  return false;
10912  }
10913 }
10914 
10922 int QCustomPlot::clearItems() {
10923  int c = mItems.size();
10924  for (int i = c - 1; i >= 0; --i)
10925  removeItem(mItems[i]);
10926  return c;
10927 }
10928 
10934 int QCustomPlot::itemCount() const { return mItems.size(); }
10935 
10943 QList<QCPAbstractItem *> QCustomPlot::selectedItems() const {
10944  QList<QCPAbstractItem *> result;
10945  foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mItems) {
10946  if (item->selected())
10947  result.append(item);
10948  }
10949  return result;
10950 }
10951 
10968 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::itemAt(const QPointF &pos,
10969  bool onlySelectable) const {
10970  QCPAbstractItem *resultItem = 0;
10971  double resultDistance =
10972  mSelectionTolerance; // only regard clicks with distances smaller than
10973  // mSelectionTolerance as selections, so initialize
10974  // with that value
10975 
10976  foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mItems) {
10977  if (onlySelectable && !item->selectable()) // we could have also passed
10978  // onlySelectable to the
10979  // selectTest function, but
10980  // checking here is faster,
10981  // because we have access to
10982  // QCPAbstractItem::selectable
10983  continue;
10984  if (!item->clipToAxisRect() ||
10985  item->clipRect().contains(pos.toPoint())) // only consider clicks inside
10986  // axis cliprect of the item
10987  // if actually clipped to it
10988  {
10989  double currentDistance = item->selectTest(pos, false);
10990  if (currentDistance >= 0 && currentDistance < resultDistance) {
10991  resultItem = item;
10992  resultDistance = currentDistance;
10993  }
10994  }
10995  }
10996 
10997  return resultItem;
10998 }
10999 
11005 bool QCustomPlot::hasItem(QCPAbstractItem *item) const {
11006  return mItems.contains(item);
11007 }
11008 
11018 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(const QString &name) const {
11019  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers) {
11020  if (layer->name() == name)
11021  return layer;
11022  }
11023  return 0;
11024 }
11025 
11032 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(int index) const {
11033  if (index >= 0 && index < mLayers.size()) {
11034  return mLayers.at(index);
11035  } else {
11036  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
11037  return 0;
11038  }
11039 }
11040 
11044 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::currentLayer() const { return mCurrentLayer; }
11045 
11058 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(const QString &name) {
11059  if (QCPLayer *newCurrentLayer = layer(name)) {
11060  return setCurrentLayer(newCurrentLayer);
11061  } else {
11062  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer with name doesn't exist:" << name;
11063  return false;
11064  }
11065 }
11066 
11076 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(QCPLayer *layer) {
11077  if (!mLayers.contains(layer)) {
11078  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:"
11079  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
11080  return false;
11081  }
11082 
11083  mCurrentLayer = layer;
11084  return true;
11085 }
11086 
11092 int QCustomPlot::layerCount() const { return mLayers.size(); }
11093 
11111 bool QCustomPlot::addLayer(const QString &name, QCPLayer *otherLayer,
11112  QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode) {
11113  if (!otherLayer)
11114  otherLayer = mLayers.last();
11115  if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer)) {
11116  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:"
11117  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
11118  return false;
11119  }
11120  if (layer(name)) {
11121  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "A layer exists already with the name" << name;
11122  return false;
11123  }
11124 
11125  QCPLayer *newLayer = new QCPLayer(this, name);
11126  mLayers.insert(otherLayer->index() + (insertMode == limAbove ? 1 : 0),
11127  newLayer);
11128  updateLayerIndices();
11129  return true;
11130 }
11131 
11150 bool QCustomPlot::removeLayer(QCPLayer *layer) {
11151  if (!mLayers.contains(layer)) {
11152  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:"
11153  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
11154  return false;
11155  }
11156  if (mLayers.size() < 2) {
11157  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't remove last layer";
11158  return false;
11159  }
11160 
11161  // append all children of this layer to layer below (if this is lowest layer,
11162  // prepend to layer above)
11163  int removedIndex = layer->index();
11164  bool isFirstLayer = removedIndex == 0;
11165  QCPLayer *targetLayer = isFirstLayer ? mLayers.at(removedIndex + 1)
11166  : mLayers.at(removedIndex - 1);
11167  QList<QCPLayerable *> children = layer->children();
11168  if (isFirstLayer) // prepend in reverse order (so order relative to each other
11169  // stays the same)
11170  {
11171  for (int i = children.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i)
11172  children.at(i)->moveToLayer(targetLayer, true);
11173  } else // append normally
11174  {
11175  for (int i = 0; i < children.size(); ++i)
11176  children.at(i)->moveToLayer(targetLayer, false);
11177  }
11178  // if removed layer is current layer, change current layer to layer
11179  // below/above:
11180  if (layer == mCurrentLayer)
11181  setCurrentLayer(targetLayer);
11182  // remove layer:
11183  delete layer;
11184  mLayers.removeOne(layer);
11185  updateLayerIndices();
11186  return true;
11187 }
11188 
11200 bool QCustomPlot::moveLayer(QCPLayer *layer, QCPLayer *otherLayer,
11201  QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode) {
11202  if (!mLayers.contains(layer)) {
11203  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:"
11204  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
11205  return false;
11206  }
11207  if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer)) {
11208  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:"
11209  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
11210  return false;
11211  }
11212 
11213  mLayers.move(layer->index(),
11214  otherLayer->index() + (insertMode == limAbove ? 1 : 0));
11215  updateLayerIndices();
11216  return true;
11217 }
11218 
11228 int QCustomPlot::axisRectCount() const { return axisRects().size(); }
11229 
11242 QCPAxisRect *QCustomPlot::axisRect(int index) const {
11243  const QList<QCPAxisRect *> rectList = axisRects();
11244  if (index >= 0 && index < rectList.size()) {
11245  return rectList.at(index);
11246  } else {
11247  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis rect index" << index;
11248  return 0;
11249  }
11250 }
11251 
11257 QList<QCPAxisRect *> QCustomPlot::axisRects() const {
11258  QList<QCPAxisRect *> result;
11259  QStack<QCPLayoutElement *> elementStack;
11260  if (mPlotLayout)
11261  elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
11262 
11263  while (!elementStack.isEmpty()) {
11264  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *element, elementStack.pop()->elements(false)) {
11265  if (element) {
11266  elementStack.push(element);
11267  if (QCPAxisRect *ar = qobject_cast<QCPAxisRect *>(element))
11268  result.append(ar);
11269  }
11270  }
11271  }
11272 
11273  return result;
11274 }
11275 
11287 QCPLayoutElement *QCustomPlot::layoutElementAt(const QPointF &pos) const {
11288  QCPLayoutElement *currentElement = mPlotLayout;
11289  bool searchSubElements = true;
11290  while (searchSubElements && currentElement) {
11291  searchSubElements = false;
11292  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, currentElement->elements(false)) {
11293  if (subElement && subElement->realVisibility() &&
11294  subElement->selectTest(pos, false) >= 0) {
11295  currentElement = subElement;
11296  searchSubElements = true;
11297  break;
11298  }
11299  }
11300  }
11301  return currentElement;
11302 }
11303 
11313 QList<QCPAxis *> QCustomPlot::selectedAxes() const {
11314  QList<QCPAxis *> result, allAxes;
11315  foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
11316  allAxes << rect->axes();
11317 
11318  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes) {
11319  if (axis->selectedParts() != QCPAxis::spNone)
11320  result.append(axis);
11321  }
11322 
11323  return result;
11324 }
11325 
11335 QList<QCPLegend *> QCustomPlot::selectedLegends() const {
11336  QList<QCPLegend *> result;
11337 
11338  QStack<QCPLayoutElement *> elementStack;
11339  if (mPlotLayout)
11340  elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
11341 
11342  while (!elementStack.isEmpty()) {
11343  foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement,
11344  elementStack.pop()->elements(false)) {
11345  if (subElement) {
11346  elementStack.push(subElement);
11347  if (QCPLegend *leg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend *>(subElement)) {
11348  if (leg->selectedParts() != QCPLegend::spNone)
11349  result.append(leg);
11350  }
11351  }
11352  }
11353  }
11354 
11355  return result;
11356 }
11357 
11371 void QCustomPlot::deselectAll() {
11372  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers) {
11373  foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
11374  layerable->deselectEvent(0);
11375  }
11376 }
11377 
11398 void QCustomPlot::replot(QCustomPlot::RefreshPriority refreshPriority) {
11399  if (mReplotting) // incase signals loop back to replot slot
11400  return;
11401  mReplotting = true;
11402  emit beforeReplot();
11403 
11404  mPaintBuffer.fill(mBackgroundBrush.style() == Qt::SolidPattern
11405  ? mBackgroundBrush.color()
11406  : Qt::transparent);
11407  QCPPainter painter;
11408  painter.begin(&mPaintBuffer);
11409  if (painter.isActive()) {
11410  painter.setRenderHint(
11411  QPainter::HighQualityAntialiasing); // to make Antialiasing look good if
11412  // using the OpenGL graphicssystem
11413  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::SolidPattern &&
11414  mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
11415  painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
11416  draw(&painter);
11417  painter.end();
11418  if ((refreshPriority == rpHint &&
11419  mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phForceRepaint)) ||
11420  refreshPriority == rpImmediate)
11421  repaint();
11422  else
11423  update();
11424  } else // might happen if QCustomPlot has width or height zero
11425  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't activate painter on buffer. This "
11426  "usually happens because QCustomPlot has width "
11427  "or height zero.";
11428 
11429  emit afterReplot();
11430  mReplotting = false;
11431 }
11432 
11443 void QCustomPlot::rescaleAxes(bool onlyVisiblePlottables) {
11444  QList<QCPAxis *> allAxes;
11445  foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
11446  allAxes << rect->axes();
11447 
11448  foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes)
11449  axis->rescale(onlyVisiblePlottables);
11450 }
11451 
11509 bool QCustomPlot::savePdf(const QString &fileName, bool noCosmeticPen,
11510  int width, int height, const QString &pdfCreator,
11511  const QString &pdfTitle) {
11512  bool success = false;
11513 #ifdef QT_NO_PRINTER
11514  Q_UNUSED(fileName)
11515  Q_UNUSED(noCosmeticPen)
11516  Q_UNUSED(width)
11517  Q_UNUSED(height)
11518  Q_UNUSED(pdfCreator)
11519  Q_UNUSED(pdfTitle)
11520  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Qt was built without printer support "
11521  "(QT_NO_PRINTER). PDF not created.";
11522 #else
11523  int newWidth, newHeight;
11524  if (width == 0 || height == 0) {
11525  newWidth = this->width();
11526  newHeight = this->height();
11527  } else {
11528  newWidth = width;
11529  newHeight = height;
11530  }
11531 
11532  QPrinter printer(QPrinter::ScreenResolution);
11533  printer.setOutputFileName(fileName);
11534  printer.setOutputFormat(QPrinter::PdfFormat);
11535  printer.setColorMode(QPrinter::Color);
11536  printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_Creator, pdfCreator);
11537  printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_DocumentName, pdfTitle);
11538  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
11539  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
11540 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 3, 0)
11541  printer.setFullPage(true);
11542  printer.setPaperSize(viewport().size(), QPrinter::DevicePixel);
11543 #else
11544  QPageLayout pageLayout;
11545  pageLayout.setMode(QPageLayout::FullPageMode);
11546  pageLayout.setOrientation(QPageLayout::Portrait);
11547  pageLayout.setMargins(QMarginsF(0, 0, 0, 0));
11548  pageLayout.setPageSize(QPageSize(viewport().size(), QPageSize::Point,
11549  QString(), QPageSize::ExactMatch));
11550  printer.setPageLayout(pageLayout);
11551 #endif
11552  QCPPainter printpainter;
11553  if (printpainter.begin(&printer)) {
11554  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmVectorized);
11555  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
11556  printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic, noCosmeticPen);
11557  printpainter.setWindow(mViewport);
11558  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush &&
11559  mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::white &&
11560  mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::transparent &&
11561  mBackgroundBrush.color().alpha() >
11562  0) // draw pdf background color if not white/transparent
11563  printpainter.fillRect(viewport(), mBackgroundBrush);
11564  draw(&printpainter);
11565  printpainter.end();
11566  success = true;
11567  }
11568  setViewport(oldViewport);
11569 #endif // QT_NO_PRINTER
11570  return success;
11571 }
11572 
11630 bool QCustomPlot::savePng(const QString &fileName, int width, int height,
11631  double scale, int quality) {
11632  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "PNG", quality);
11633 }
11634 
11687 bool QCustomPlot::saveJpg(const QString &fileName, int width, int height,
11688  double scale, int quality) {
11689  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "JPG", quality);
11690 }
11691 
11740 bool QCustomPlot::saveBmp(const QString &fileName, int width, int height,
11741  double scale) {
11742  return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "BMP");
11743 }
11744 
11757 QSize QCustomPlot::minimumSizeHint() const {
11758  return mPlotLayout->minimumSizeHint();
11759 }
11760 
11766 QSize QCustomPlot::sizeHint() const { return mPlotLayout->minimumSizeHint(); }
11767 
11774 void QCustomPlot::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event) {
11775  Q_UNUSED(event);
11776  QPainter painter(this);
11777  painter.drawPixmap(0, 0, mPaintBuffer);
11778 }
11779 
11788 void QCustomPlot::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event) {
11789  // resize and repaint the buffer:
11790  mPaintBuffer = QPixmap(event->size());
11791  setViewport(rect());
11792  replot(rpQueued); // queued update is important here, to prevent painting
11793  // issues in some contexts
11794 }
11795 
11808 void QCustomPlot::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
11809  emit mouseDoubleClick(event);
11810 
11811  QVariant details;
11812  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable = layerableAt(event->pos(), false, &details);
11813 
11814  // emit specialized object double click signals:
11815  if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap =
11816  qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable *>(clickedLayerable))
11817  emit plottableDoubleClick(ap, event);
11818  else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis *>(clickedLayerable))
11819  emit axisDoubleClick(ax, details.value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
11820  else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai =
11821  qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem *>(clickedLayerable))
11822  emit itemDoubleClick(ai, event);
11823  else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend *>(clickedLayerable))
11824  emit legendDoubleClick(lg, 0, event);
11825  else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li =
11826  qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem *>(clickedLayerable))
11827  emit legendDoubleClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
11828  else if (QCPPlotTitle *pt = qobject_cast<QCPPlotTitle *>(clickedLayerable))
11829  emit titleDoubleClick(event, pt);
11830 
11831  // call double click event of affected layout element:
11832  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = layoutElementAt(event->pos()))
11833  el->mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
11834 
11835  // call release event of affected layout element (as in mouseReleaseEvent,
11836  // since the mouseDoubleClick replaces the second release event in double
11837  // click case):
11838  if (mMouseEventElement) {
11839  mMouseEventElement->mouseReleaseEvent(event);
11840  mMouseEventElement = 0;
11841  }
11842 
11843  // QWidget::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event); don't call base class implementation
11844  // because it would just cause a mousePress/ReleaseEvent, which we don't want.
11845 }
11846 
11855 void QCustomPlot::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
11856  emit mousePress(event);
11857  mMousePressPos = event->pos(); // need this to determine in releaseEvent
11858  // whether it was a click (no position change
11859  // between press and release)
11860 
11861  // call event of affected layout element:
11862  mMouseEventElement = layoutElementAt(event->pos());
11863  if (mMouseEventElement)
11864  mMouseEventElement->mousePressEvent(event);
11865 
11866  QWidget::mousePressEvent(event);
11867 }
11868 
11879 void QCustomPlot::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
11880  emit mouseMove(event);
11881 
11882  // call event of affected layout element:
11883  if (mMouseEventElement)
11884  mMouseEventElement->mouseMoveEvent(event);
11885 
11886  QWidget::mouseMoveEvent(event);
11887 }
11888 
11908 void QCustomPlot::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
11909  emit mouseRelease(event);
11910  bool doReplot = false;
11911 
11912  if ((mMousePressPos - event->pos()).manhattanLength() <
11913  5) // determine whether it was a click operation
11914  {
11915  if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton) {
11916  // handle selection mechanism:
11917  QVariant details;
11918  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable =
11919  layerableAt(event->pos(), true, &details);
11920  bool selectionStateChanged = false;
11921  bool additive = mInteractions.testFlag(QCP::iMultiSelect) &&
11922  event->modifiers().testFlag(mMultiSelectModifier);
11923  // deselect all other layerables if not additive selection:
11924  if (!additive) {
11925  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers) {
11926  foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children()) {
11927  if (layerable != clickedLayerable &&
11928  mInteractions.testFlag(layerable->selectionCategory())) {
11929  bool selChanged = false;
11930  layerable->deselectEvent(&selChanged);
11931  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
11932  }
11933  }
11934  }
11935  }
11936  if (clickedLayerable &&
11937  mInteractions.testFlag(clickedLayerable->selectionCategory())) {
11938  // a layerable was actually clicked, call its selectEvent:
11939  bool selChanged = false;
11940  clickedLayerable->selectEvent(event, additive, details, &selChanged);
11941  selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
11942  }
11943  if (selectionStateChanged) {
11944  doReplot = true;
11945  emit selectionChangedByUser();
11946  }
11947  }
11948 
11949  // emit specialized object click signals:
11950  QVariant details;
11951  QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable =
11952  layerableAt(event->pos(), false, &details); // for these signals,
11953  // selectability is ignored,
11954  // that's why we call this
11955  // again with onlySelectable
11956  // set to false
11957  if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap =
11958  qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable *>(clickedLayerable))
11959  emit plottableClick(ap, event);
11960  else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis *>(clickedLayerable))
11961  emit axisClick(ax, details.value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
11962  else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai =
11963  qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem *>(clickedLayerable))
11964  emit itemClick(ai, event);
11965  else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend *>(clickedLayerable))
11966  emit legendClick(lg, 0, event);
11967  else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li =
11968  qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem *>(clickedLayerable))
11969  emit legendClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
11970  else if (QCPPlotTitle *pt = qobject_cast<QCPPlotTitle *>(clickedLayerable))
11971  emit titleClick(event, pt);
11972  }
11973 
11974  // call event of affected layout element:
11975  if (mMouseEventElement) {
11976  mMouseEventElement->mouseReleaseEvent(event);
11977  mMouseEventElement = 0;
11978  }
11979 
11980  if (doReplot || noAntialiasingOnDrag())
11981  replot();
11982 
11983  QWidget::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
11984 }
11985 
11993 void QCustomPlot::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event) {
11994  emit mouseWheel(event);
11995 
11996  // call event of affected layout element:
11997  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = layoutElementAt(event->pos()))
11998  el->wheelEvent(event);
11999 
12000  QWidget::wheelEvent(event);
12001 }
12002 
12014 void QCustomPlot::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
12015  // run through layout phases:
12016  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upPreparation);
12017  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upMargins);
12018  mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upLayout);
12019 
12020  // draw viewport background pixmap:
12021  drawBackground(painter);
12022 
12023  // draw all layered objects (grid, axes, plottables, items, legend,...):
12024  foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers) {
12025  foreach (QCPLayerable *child, layer->children()) {
12026  if (child->realVisibility()) {
12027  painter->save();
12028  painter->setClipRect(child->clipRect().translated(0, -1));
12029  child->applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
12030  child->draw(painter);
12031  painter->restore();
12032  }
12033  }
12034  }
12035 
12036  /* Debug code to draw all layout element rects
12037  foreach (QCPLayoutElement* el, findChildren<QCPLayoutElement*>())
12038  {
12039  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
12040  painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(0, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
12041  painter->drawRect(el->rect());
12042  painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(255, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
12043  painter->drawRect(el->outerRect());
12044  }
12045  */
12046 }
12047 
12071 void QCustomPlot::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter) {
12072  // Note: background color is handled in individual replot/save functions
12073 
12074  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
12075  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull()) {
12076  if (mBackgroundScaled) {
12077  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
12078  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
12079  scaledSize.scale(mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
12080  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
12081  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(
12082  mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
12083  painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mScaledBackgroundPixmap,
12084  QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()) &
12085  mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
12086  } else {
12087  painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mBackgroundPixmap,
12088  QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()));
12089  }
12090  }
12091 }
12092 
12100 void QCustomPlot::axisRemoved(QCPAxis *axis) {
12101  if (xAxis == axis)
12102  xAxis = 0;
12103  if (xAxis2 == axis)
12104  xAxis2 = 0;
12105  if (yAxis == axis)
12106  yAxis = 0;
12107  if (yAxis2 == axis)
12108  yAxis2 = 0;
12109 
12110  // Note: No need to take care of range drag axes and range zoom axes, because
12111  // they are stored in smart pointers
12112 }
12113 
12120 void QCustomPlot::legendRemoved(QCPLegend *legend) {
12121  if (this->legend == legend)
12122  this->legend = 0;
12123 }
12124 
12133 void QCustomPlot::updateLayerIndices() const {
12134  for (int i = 0; i < mLayers.size(); ++i)
12135  mLayers.at(i)->mIndex = i;
12136 }
12137 
12156 QCPLayerable *QCustomPlot::layerableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
12157  QVariant *selectionDetails) const {
12158  for (int layerIndex = mLayers.size() - 1; layerIndex >= 0; --layerIndex) {
12159  const QList<QCPLayerable *> layerables = mLayers.at(layerIndex)->children();
12160  double minimumDistance = selectionTolerance() * 1.1;
12161  QCPLayerable *minimumDistanceLayerable = 0;
12162  for (int i = layerables.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
12163  if (!layerables.at(i)->realVisibility())
12164  continue;
12165  QVariant details;
12166  double dist = layerables.at(i)->selectTest(pos, onlySelectable, &details);
12167  if (dist >= 0 && dist < minimumDistance) {
12168  minimumDistance = dist;
12169  minimumDistanceLayerable = layerables.at(i);
12170  if (selectionDetails)
12171  *selectionDetails = details;
12172  }
12173  }
12174  if (minimumDistance < selectionTolerance())
12175  return minimumDistanceLayerable;
12176  }
12177  return 0;
12178 }
12179 
12195 bool QCustomPlot::saveRastered(const QString &fileName, int width, int height,
12196  double scale, const char *format, int quality) {
12197  QPixmap buffer = toPixmap(width, height, scale);
12198  if (!buffer.isNull())
12199  return buffer.save(fileName, format, quality);
12200  else
12201  return false;
12202 }
12203 
12213 QPixmap QCustomPlot::toPixmap(int width, int height, double scale) {
12214  // this method is somewhat similar to toPainter. Change something here, and a
12215  // change in toPainter might be necessary, too.
12216  int newWidth, newHeight;
12217  if (width == 0 || height == 0) {
12218  newWidth = this->width();
12219  newHeight = this->height();
12220  } else {
12221  newWidth = width;
12222  newHeight = height;
12223  }
12224  int scaledWidth = qRound(scale * newWidth);
12225  int scaledHeight = qRound(scale * newHeight);
12226 
12227  QPixmap result(scaledWidth, scaledHeight);
12228  result.fill(mBackgroundBrush.style() == Qt::SolidPattern
12229  ? mBackgroundBrush.color()
12230  : Qt::transparent); // if using non-solid pattern, make
12231  // transparent now and draw brush pattern
12232  // later
12233  QCPPainter painter;
12234  painter.begin(&result);
12235  if (painter.isActive()) {
12236  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
12237  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
12238  painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
12239  if (!qFuzzyCompare(scale, 1.0)) {
12240  if (scale > 1.0) // for scale < 1 we always want cosmetic pens where
12241  // possible, because else lines might disappear for very
12242  // small scales
12243  painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic);
12244  painter.scale(scale, scale);
12245  }
12246  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::SolidPattern &&
12247  mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush) // solid fills were done a few
12248  // lines above with
12249  // QPixmap::fill
12250  painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
12251  draw(&painter);
12252  setViewport(oldViewport);
12253  painter.end();
12254  } else // might happen if pixmap has width or height zero
12255  {
12256  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't activate painter on pixmap";
12257  return QPixmap();
12258  }
12259  return result;
12260 }
12261 
12278 void QCustomPlot::toPainter(QCPPainter *painter, int width, int height) {
12279  // this method is somewhat similar to toPixmap. Change something here, and a
12280  // change in toPixmap might be necessary, too.
12281  int newWidth, newHeight;
12282  if (width == 0 || height == 0) {
12283  newWidth = this->width();
12284  newHeight = this->height();
12285  } else {
12286  newWidth = width;
12287  newHeight = height;
12288  }
12289 
12290  if (painter->isActive()) {
12291  QRect oldViewport = viewport();
12292  setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
12293  painter->setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
12294  if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush) // unlike in toPixmap, we can't
12295  // do QPixmap::fill for
12296  // Qt::SolidPattern brush
12297  // style, so we also draw solid
12298  // fills with fillRect here
12299  painter->fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
12300  draw(painter);
12301  setViewport(oldViewport);
12302  } else
12303  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed painter is not active";
12304 }
12305 
12309 
12352 QCPColorGradient::QCPColorGradient(GradientPreset preset)
12353  : mLevelCount(350), mColorInterpolation(ciRGB), mPeriodic(false),
12354  mColorBufferInvalidated(true) {
12355  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0), mLevelCount);
12356  loadPreset(preset);
12357 }
12358 
12359 /* undocumented operator */
12360 bool QCPColorGradient::operator==(const QCPColorGradient &other) const {
12361  return ((other.mLevelCount == this->mLevelCount) &&
12362  (other.mColorInterpolation == this->mColorInterpolation) &&
12363  (other.mPeriodic == this->mPeriodic) &&
12364  (other.mColorStops == this->mColorStops));
12365 }
12366 
12374 void QCPColorGradient::setLevelCount(int n) {
12375  if (n < 2) {
12376  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "n must be greater or equal 2 but was" << n;
12377  n = 2;
12378  }
12379  if (n != mLevelCount) {
12380  mLevelCount = n;
12381  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
12382  }
12383 }
12384 
12398 void QCPColorGradient::setColorStops(const QMap<double, QColor> &colorStops) {
12399  mColorStops = colorStops;
12400  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
12401 }
12402 
12411 void QCPColorGradient::setColorStopAt(double position, const QColor &color) {
12412  mColorStops.insert(position, color);
12413  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
12414 }
12415 
12425 void QCPColorGradient::setColorInterpolation(
12426  QCPColorGradient::ColorInterpolation interpolation) {
12427  if (interpolation != mColorInterpolation) {
12428  mColorInterpolation = interpolation;
12429  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
12430  }
12431 }
12432 
12454 void QCPColorGradient::setPeriodic(bool enabled) { mPeriodic = enabled; }
12455 
12475 void QCPColorGradient::colorize(const double *data, const QCPRange &range,
12476  QRgb *scanLine, int n, int dataIndexFactor,
12477  bool logarithmic) {
12478  // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt ::color()
12479  if (!data) {
12480  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as data";
12481  return;
12482  }
12483  if (!scanLine) {
12484  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as scanLine";
12485  return;
12486  }
12487  if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
12488  updateColorBuffer();
12489 
12490  if (!logarithmic) {
12491  const double posToIndexFactor = (mLevelCount - 1) / range.size();
12492  if (mPeriodic) {
12493  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
12494  int index = (int)((data[dataIndexFactor * i] - range.lower) *
12495  posToIndexFactor) %
12496  mLevelCount;
12497  if (index < 0)
12498  index += mLevelCount;
12499  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
12500  }
12501  } else {
12502  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
12503  int index =
12504  (data[dataIndexFactor * i] - range.lower) * posToIndexFactor;
12505  if (index < 0)
12506  index = 0;
12507  else if (index >= mLevelCount)
12508  index = mLevelCount - 1;
12509  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
12510  }
12511  }
12512  } else // logarithmic == true
12513  {
12514  if (mPeriodic) {
12515  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
12516  int index = (int)(qLn(data[dataIndexFactor * i] / range.lower) /
12517  qLn(range.upper / range.lower) * (mLevelCount - 1)) %
12518  mLevelCount;
12519  if (index < 0)
12520  index += mLevelCount;
12521  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
12522  }
12523  } else {
12524  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
12525  int index = qLn(data[dataIndexFactor * i] / range.lower) /
12526  qLn(range.upper / range.lower) * (mLevelCount - 1);
12527  if (index < 0)
12528  index = 0;
12529  else if (index >= mLevelCount)
12530  index = mLevelCount - 1;
12531  scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
12532  }
12533  }
12534  }
12535 }
12536 
12550 QRgb QCPColorGradient::color(double position, const QCPRange &range,
12551  bool logarithmic) {
12552  // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt ::colorize()
12553  if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
12554  updateColorBuffer();
12555  int index = 0;
12556  if (!logarithmic)
12557  index = (position - range.lower) * (mLevelCount - 1) / range.size();
12558  else
12559  index = qLn(position / range.lower) / qLn(range.upper / range.lower) *
12560  (mLevelCount - 1);
12561  if (mPeriodic) {
12562  index = index % mLevelCount;
12563  if (index < 0)
12564  index += mLevelCount;
12565  } else {
12566  if (index < 0)
12567  index = 0;
12568  else if (index >= mLevelCount)
12569  index = mLevelCount - 1;
12570  }
12571  return mColorBuffer.at(index);
12572 }
12573 
12582 void QCPColorGradient::loadPreset(GradientPreset preset) {
12583  clearColorStops();
12584  switch (preset) {
12585  case gpGrayscale:
12586  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
12587  setColorStopAt(0, Qt::black);
12588  setColorStopAt(1, Qt::white);
12589  break;
12590  case gpHot:
12591  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
12592  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 0));
12593  setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(180, 10, 0));
12594  setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(245, 50, 0));
12595  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 150, 10));
12596  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(255, 255, 50));
12597  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
12598  break;
12599  case gpCold:
12600  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
12601  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
12602  setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(0, 10, 180));
12603  setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(0, 50, 245));
12604  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(10, 150, 255));
12605  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(50, 255, 255));
12606  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
12607  break;
12608  case gpNight:
12609  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
12610  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(10, 20, 30));
12611  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(250, 255, 250));
12612  break;
12613  case gpCandy:
12614  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
12615  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
12616  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 250, 250));
12617  break;
12618  case gpGeography:
12619  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
12620  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(70, 170, 210));
12621  setColorStopAt(0.20, QColor(90, 160, 180));
12622  setColorStopAt(0.25, QColor(45, 130, 175));
12623  setColorStopAt(0.30, QColor(100, 140, 125));
12624  setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(100, 140, 100));
12625  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(130, 145, 120));
12626  setColorStopAt(0.7, QColor(140, 130, 120));
12627  setColorStopAt(0.9, QColor(180, 190, 190));
12628  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(210, 210, 230));
12629  break;
12630  case gpIon:
12631  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
12632  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 10, 10));
12633  setColorStopAt(0.45, QColor(0, 0, 255));
12634  setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(0, 255, 255));
12635  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(0, 255, 0));
12636  break;
12637  case gpThermal:
12638  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
12639  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
12640  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(20, 0, 120));
12641  setColorStopAt(0.33, QColor(200, 30, 140));
12642  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 100, 0));
12643  setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 255, 40));
12644  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
12645  break;
12646  case gpPolar:
12647  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
12648  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 255, 255));
12649  setColorStopAt(0.18, QColor(10, 70, 255));
12650  setColorStopAt(0.28, QColor(10, 10, 190));
12651  setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(0, 0, 0));
12652  setColorStopAt(0.72, QColor(190, 10, 10));
12653  setColorStopAt(0.82, QColor(255, 70, 10));
12654  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 50));
12655  break;
12656  case gpSpectrum:
12657  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
12658  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 50));
12659  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 0, 255));
12660  setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
12661  setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 255, 0));
12662  setColorStopAt(0.75, QColor(255, 30, 0));
12663  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(50, 0, 0));
12664  break;
12665  case gpJet:
12666  setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
12667  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 100));
12668  setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 50, 255));
12669  setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
12670  setColorStopAt(0.65, QColor(255, 255, 0));
12671  setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 30, 0));
12672  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(100, 0, 0));
12673  break;
12674  case gpHues:
12675  setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
12676  setColorStopAt(0, QColor(255, 0, 0));
12677  setColorStopAt(1.0 / 3.0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
12678  setColorStopAt(2.0 / 3.0, QColor(0, 255, 0));
12679  setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 0, 0));
12680  break;
12681  }
12682 }
12683 
12689 void QCPColorGradient::clearColorStops() {
12690  mColorStops.clear();
12691  mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
12692 }
12693 
12701 QCPColorGradient QCPColorGradient::inverted() const {
12702  QCPColorGradient result(*this);
12703  result.clearColorStops();
12704  for (QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it = mColorStops.constBegin();
12705  it != mColorStops.constEnd(); ++it)
12706  result.setColorStopAt(1.0 - it.key(), it.value());
12707  return result;
12708 }
12709 
12717 void QCPColorGradient::updateColorBuffer() {
12718  if (mColorBuffer.size() != mLevelCount)
12719  mColorBuffer.resize(mLevelCount);
12720  if (mColorStops.size() > 1) {
12721  double indexToPosFactor = 1.0 / (double)(mLevelCount - 1);
12722  for (int i = 0; i < mLevelCount; ++i) {
12723  double position = i * indexToPosFactor;
12724  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it =
12725  mColorStops.lowerBound(position);
12726  if (it == mColorStops.constEnd()) // position is on or after last stop,
12727  // use color of last stop
12728  {
12729  mColorBuffer[i] = (it - 1).value().rgb();
12730  } else if (it == mColorStops.constBegin()) // position is on or before
12731  // first stop, use color of
12732  // first stop
12733  {
12734  mColorBuffer[i] = it.value().rgb();
12735  } else // position is in between stops (or on an intermediate stop),
12736  // interpolate color
12737  {
12738  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator high = it;
12739  QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator low = it - 1;
12740  double t = (position - low.key()) /
12741  (high.key() - low.key()); // interpolation factor 0..1
12742  switch (mColorInterpolation) {
12743  case ciRGB: {
12744  mColorBuffer[i] =
12745  qRgb((1 - t) * low.value().red() + t * high.value().red(),
12746  (1 - t) * low.value().green() + t * high.value().green(),
12747  (1 - t) * low.value().blue() + t * high.value().blue());
12748  break;
12749  }
12750  case ciHSV: {
12751  QColor lowHsv = low.value().toHsv();
12752  QColor highHsv = high.value().toHsv();
12753  double hue = 0;
12754  double hueDiff = highHsv.hueF() - lowHsv.hueF();
12755  if (hueDiff > 0.5)
12756  hue = lowHsv.hueF() - t * (1.0 - hueDiff);
12757  else if (hueDiff < -0.5)
12758  hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t * (1.0 + hueDiff);
12759  else
12760  hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t * hueDiff;
12761  if (hue < 0)
12762  hue += 1.0;
12763  else if (hue >= 1.0)
12764  hue -= 1.0;
12765  mColorBuffer[i] =
12766  QColor::fromHsvF(
12767  hue,
12768  (1 - t) * lowHsv.saturationF() + t * highHsv.saturationF(),
12769  (1 - t) * lowHsv.valueF() + t * highHsv.valueF()).rgb();
12770  break;
12771  }
12772  }
12773  }
12774  }
12775  } else if (mColorStops.size() == 1) {
12776  mColorBuffer.fill(mColorStops.constBegin().value().rgb());
12777  } else // mColorStops is empty, fill color buffer with black
12778  {
12779  mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0));
12780  }
12781  mColorBufferInvalidated = false;
12782 }
12783 
12787 
12843 /* start documentation of inline functions */
12844 
12938 /* end documentation of inline functions */
12939 
12945 QCPAxisRect::QCPAxisRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, bool setupDefaultAxes)
12946  : QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot), mBackgroundBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
12947  mBackgroundScaled(true),
12948  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
12949  mInsetLayout(new QCPLayoutInset),
12950  mRangeDrag(Qt::Horizontal | Qt::Vertical),
12951  mRangeZoom(Qt::Horizontal | Qt::Vertical), mRangeZoomFactorHorz(0.85),
12952  mRangeZoomFactorVert(0.85), mDragging(false) {
12953  mInsetLayout->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
12954  mInsetLayout->setParentLayerable(this);
12955  mInsetLayout->setParent(this);
12956 
12957  setMinimumSize(50, 50);
12958  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(15, 15, 15, 15));
12959  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atLeft, QList<QCPAxis *>());
12960  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atRight, QList<QCPAxis *>());
12961  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atTop, QList<QCPAxis *>());
12962  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atBottom, QList<QCPAxis *>());
12963 
12964  if (setupDefaultAxes) {
12965  QCPAxis *xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
12966  QCPAxis *yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
12967  QCPAxis *xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
12968  QCPAxis *yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
12969  setRangeDragAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
12970  setRangeZoomAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
12971  xAxis2->setVisible(false);
12972  yAxis2->setVisible(false);
12973  xAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
12974  yAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
12975  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
12976  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
12977  xAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
12978  yAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
12979  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
12980  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
12981  }
12982 }
12983 
12984 QCPAxisRect::~QCPAxisRect() {
12985  delete mInsetLayout;
12986  mInsetLayout = 0;
12987 
12988  QList<QCPAxis *> axesList = axes();
12989  for (int i = 0; i < axesList.size(); ++i)
12990  removeAxis(axesList.at(i));
12991 }
12992 
12998 int QCPAxisRect::axisCount(QCPAxis::AxisType type) const {
12999  return mAxes.value(type).size();
13000 }
13001 
13008 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::axis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, int index) const {
13009  QList<QCPAxis *> ax(mAxes.value(type));
13010  if (index >= 0 && index < ax.size()) {
13011  return ax.at(index);
13012  } else {
13013  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis index out of bounds:" << index;
13014  return 0;
13015  }
13016 }
13017 
13027 QList<QCPAxis *> QCPAxisRect::axes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types) const {
13028  QList<QCPAxis *> result;
13029  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
13030  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atLeft);
13031  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
13032  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atRight);
13033  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
13034  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atTop);
13035  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
13036  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atBottom);
13037  return result;
13038 }
13039 
13044 QList<QCPAxis *> QCPAxisRect::axes() const {
13045  QList<QCPAxis *> result;
13046  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis *>> it(mAxes);
13047  while (it.hasNext()) {
13048  it.next();
13049  result << it.value();
13050  }
13051  return result;
13052 }
13053 
13082 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::addAxis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, QCPAxis *axis) {
13083  QCPAxis *newAxis = axis;
13084  if (!newAxis) {
13085  newAxis = new QCPAxis(this, type);
13086  } else // user provided existing axis instance, do some sanity checks
13087  {
13088  if (newAxis->axisType() != type) {
13089  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed axis has different axis type than "
13090  "specified in type parameter";
13091  return 0;
13092  }
13093  if (newAxis->axisRect() != this) {
13094  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
13095  << "passed axis doesn't have this axis rect as parent axis rect";
13096  return 0;
13097  }
13098  if (axes().contains(newAxis)) {
13099  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
13100  << "passed axis is already owned by this axis rect";
13101  return 0;
13102  }
13103  }
13104  if (mAxes[type].size() > 0) // multiple axes on one side, add half-bar axis
13105  // ending to additional axes with offset
13106  {
13107  bool invert = (type == QCPAxis::atRight) || (type == QCPAxis::atBottom);
13108  newAxis->setLowerEnding(
13109  QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, !invert));
13110  newAxis->setUpperEnding(
13111  QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, invert));
13112  }
13113  mAxes[type].append(newAxis);
13114  return newAxis;
13115 }
13116 
13127 QList<QCPAxis *> QCPAxisRect::addAxes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types) {
13128  QList<QCPAxis *> result;
13129  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
13130  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
13131  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
13132  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
13133  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
13134  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
13135  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
13136  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
13137  return result;
13138 }
13139 
13147 bool QCPAxisRect::removeAxis(QCPAxis *axis) {
13148  // don't access axis->axisType() to provide safety when axis is an invalid
13149  // pointer, rather go through all axis containers:
13150  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis *>> it(mAxes);
13151  while (it.hasNext()) {
13152  it.next();
13153  if (it.value().contains(axis)) {
13154  mAxes[it.key()].removeOne(axis);
13155  if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot *>(
13156  parentPlot())) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor
13157  // when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens
13158  // when the axis rect is not in any layout and thus
13159  // QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
13160  parentPlot()->axisRemoved(axis);
13161  delete axis;
13162  return true;
13163  }
13164  }
13165  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
13166  << "Axis isn't in axis rect:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(axis);
13167  return false;
13168 }
13169 
13201 void QCPAxisRect::setupFullAxesBox(bool connectRanges) {
13202  QCPAxis *xAxis, *yAxis, *xAxis2, *yAxis2;
13203  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atBottom) == 0)
13204  xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
13205  else
13206  xAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
13207 
13208  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atLeft) == 0)
13209  yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
13210  else
13211  yAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
13212 
13213  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atTop) == 0)
13214  xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
13215  else
13216  xAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
13217 
13218  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atRight) == 0)
13219  yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
13220  else
13221  yAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
13222 
13223  xAxis->setVisible(true);
13224  yAxis->setVisible(true);
13225  xAxis2->setVisible(true);
13226  yAxis2->setVisible(true);
13227  xAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
13228  yAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
13229 
13230  xAxis2->setRange(xAxis->range());
13231  xAxis2->setRangeReversed(xAxis->rangeReversed());
13232  xAxis2->setScaleType(xAxis->scaleType());
13233  xAxis2->setScaleLogBase(xAxis->scaleLogBase());
13234  xAxis2->setTicks(xAxis->ticks());
13235  xAxis2->setAutoTickCount(xAxis->autoTickCount());
13236  xAxis2->setSubTickCount(xAxis->subTickCount());
13237  xAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(xAxis->autoSubTicks());
13238  xAxis2->setTickStep(xAxis->tickStep());
13239  xAxis2->setAutoTickStep(xAxis->autoTickStep());
13240  xAxis2->setNumberFormat(xAxis->numberFormat());
13241  xAxis2->setNumberPrecision(xAxis->numberPrecision());
13242  xAxis2->setTickLabelType(xAxis->tickLabelType());
13243  xAxis2->setDateTimeFormat(xAxis->dateTimeFormat());
13244  xAxis2->setDateTimeSpec(xAxis->dateTimeSpec());
13245 
13246  yAxis2->setRange(yAxis->range());
13247  yAxis2->setRangeReversed(yAxis->rangeReversed());
13248  yAxis2->setScaleType(yAxis->scaleType());
13249  yAxis2->setScaleLogBase(yAxis->scaleLogBase());
13250  yAxis2->setTicks(yAxis->ticks());
13251  yAxis2->setAutoTickCount(yAxis->autoTickCount());
13252  yAxis2->setSubTickCount(yAxis->subTickCount());
13253  yAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(yAxis->autoSubTicks());
13254  yAxis2->setTickStep(yAxis->tickStep());
13255  yAxis2->setAutoTickStep(yAxis->autoTickStep());
13256  yAxis2->setNumberFormat(yAxis->numberFormat());
13257  yAxis2->setNumberPrecision(yAxis->numberPrecision());
13258  yAxis2->setTickLabelType(yAxis->tickLabelType());
13259  yAxis2->setDateTimeFormat(yAxis->dateTimeFormat());
13260  yAxis2->setDateTimeSpec(yAxis->dateTimeSpec());
13261 
13262  if (connectRanges) {
13263  connect(xAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), xAxis2,
13264  SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
13265  connect(yAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), yAxis2,
13266  SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
13267  }
13268 }
13269 
13279 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable *> QCPAxisRect::plottables() const {
13280  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::plottables() into a list, because we might
13281  // get duplicate entries
13282  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable *> result;
13283  for (int i = 0; i < mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i) {
13284  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||
13285  mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
13286  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
13287  }
13288  return result;
13289 }
13290 
13300 QList<QCPGraph *> QCPAxisRect::graphs() const {
13301  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::graphs() into a list, because we might get
13302  // duplicate entries
13303  QList<QCPGraph *> result;
13304  for (int i = 0; i < mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i) {
13305  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||
13306  mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
13307  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
13308  }
13309  return result;
13310 }
13311 
13324 QList<QCPAbstractItem *> QCPAxisRect::items() const {
13325  // Note: don't just append all QCPAxis::items() into a list, because we might
13326  // get duplicate entries
13327  // and miss those items that have this axis rect as clipAxisRect.
13328  QList<QCPAbstractItem *> result;
13329  for (int itemId = 0; itemId < mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId) {
13330  if (mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->clipAxisRect() == this) {
13331  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
13332  continue;
13333  }
13334  QList<QCPItemPosition *> positions =
13335  mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
13336  for (int posId = 0; posId < positions.size(); ++posId) {
13337  if (positions.at(posId)->axisRect() == this ||
13338  positions.at(posId)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||
13339  positions.at(posId)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this) {
13340  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
13341  break;
13342  }
13343  }
13344  }
13345  return result;
13346 }
13347 
13359 void QCPAxisRect::update(UpdatePhase phase) {
13360  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
13361 
13362  switch (phase) {
13363  case upPreparation: {
13364  QList<QCPAxis *> allAxes = axes();
13365  for (int i = 0; i < allAxes.size(); ++i)
13366  allAxes.at(i)->setupTickVectors();
13367  break;
13368  }
13369  case upLayout: {
13370  mInsetLayout->setOuterRect(rect());
13371  break;
13372  }
13373  default:
13374  break;
13375  }
13376 
13377  // pass update call on to inset layout (doesn't happen automatically, because
13378  // QCPAxisRect doesn't derive from QCPLayout):
13379  mInsetLayout->update(phase);
13380 }
13381 
13382 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13383 QList<QCPLayoutElement *> QCPAxisRect::elements(bool recursive) const {
13384  QList<QCPLayoutElement *> result;
13385  if (mInsetLayout) {
13386  result << mInsetLayout;
13387  if (recursive)
13388  result << mInsetLayout->elements(recursive);
13389  }
13390  return result;
13391 }
13392 
13393 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13394 void QCPAxisRect::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const {
13395  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
13396 }
13397 
13398 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13399 void QCPAxisRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter) { drawBackground(painter); }
13400 
13423 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm) {
13424  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
13425  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
13426 }
13427 
13444 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QBrush &brush) {
13445  mBackgroundBrush = brush;
13446 }
13447 
13457 void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled,
13458  Qt::AspectRatioMode mode) {
13459  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
13460  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
13461  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
13462  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
13463 }

13480  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
13481 }

13490 void QCPAxisRect::setBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::AspectRatioMode mode) {
13491  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
13492 }
13493 
13499 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeDragAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation) {
13500  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeDragHorzAxis.data()
13501  : mRangeDragVertAxis.data());
13502 }
13503 
13509 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation) {
13510  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()
13511  : mRangeZoomVertAxis.data());
13512 }

13519 double QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomFactor(Qt::Orientation orientation) {
13520  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomFactorHorz
13521  : mRangeZoomFactorVert);
13522 }

13545  mRangeDrag = orientations;
13546 }

13569 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoom(Qt::Orientations orientations) {
13570  mRangeZoom = orientations;
13571 }
13572 
13580 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical) {
13581  mRangeDragHorzAxis = horizontal;
13582  mRangeDragVertAxis = vertical;
13583 }
13584 
13595 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical) {
13596  mRangeZoomHorzAxis = horizontal;
13597  mRangeZoomVertAxis = vertical;
13598 }

13615 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double horizontalFactor,
13616  double verticalFactor) {
13617  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = horizontalFactor;
13618  mRangeZoomFactorVert = verticalFactor;
13619 }
