13626  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = factor;
13627  mRangeZoomFactorVert = factor;
13628 }
13629 
13655 void QCPAxisRect::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter) {
13656  // draw background fill:
13657  if (mBackgroundBrush != Qt::NoBrush)
13658  painter->fillRect(mRect, mBackgroundBrush);
13659 
13660  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
13661  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull()) {
13662  if (mBackgroundScaled) {
13663  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
13664  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
13665  scaledSize.scale(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
13666  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
13667  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(
13668  mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
13669  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft() + QPoint(0, -1),
13670  mScaledBackgroundPixmap,
13671  QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()) &
13672  mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
13673  } else {
13674  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft() + QPoint(0, -1), mBackgroundPixmap,
13675  QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()));
13676  }
13677  }
13678 }
13679 
13693 void QCPAxisRect::updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::AxisType type) {
13694  const QList<QCPAxis *> axesList = mAxes.value(type);
13695  if (axesList.isEmpty())
13696  return;
13697 
13698  bool isFirstVisible =
13699  !axesList.first()->visible(); // if the first axis is visible, the second
13700  // axis (which is where the loop starts)
13701  // isn't the first visible axis, so
13702  // initialize with false
13703  for (int i = 1; i < axesList.size(); ++i) {
13704  int offset =
13705  axesList.at(i - 1)->offset() + axesList.at(i - 1)->calculateMargin();
13706  if (axesList.at(i)->visible()) // only add inner tick length to offset if
13707  // this axis is visible and it's not the
13708  // first visible one (might happen if true
13709  // first axis is invisible)
13710  {
13711  if (!isFirstVisible)
13712  offset += axesList.at(i)->tickLengthIn();
13713  isFirstVisible = false;
13714  }
13715  axesList.at(i)->setOffset(offset);
13716  }
13717 }
13718 
13719 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13720 int QCPAxisRect::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side) {
13721  if (!mAutoMargins.testFlag(side))
13722  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
13723  << "Called with side that isn't specified as auto margin";
13724 
13725  updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
13726 
13727  // note: only need to look at the last (outer most) axis to determine the
13728  // total margin, due to updateAxisOffset call
13729  const QList<QCPAxis *> axesList =
13730  mAxes.value(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
13731  if (axesList.size() > 0)
13732  return axesList.last()->offset() + axesList.last()->calculateMargin();
13733  else
13734  return 0;
13735 }
13736 
13751 void QCPAxisRect::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
13752  mDragStart = event->pos(); // need this even when not LeftButton is pressed,
13753  // to determine in releaseEvent whether it was a
13754  // full click (no position change between press and
13755  // release)
13756  if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton) {
13757  mDragging = true;
13758  // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
13759  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag()) {
13760  mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
13761  mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
13762  }
13763  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
13764  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag)) {
13765  if (mRangeDragHorzAxis)
13766  mDragStartHorzRange = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data()->range();
13767  if (mRangeDragVertAxis)
13768  mDragStartVertRange = mRangeDragVertAxis.data()->range();
13769  }
13770  }
13771 }
13772 
13781 void QCPAxisRect::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
13782  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
13783  if (mDragging && mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag)) {
13784  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal)) {
13785  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragHorzAxis = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data()) {
13786  if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear) {
13787  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) -
13788  rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
13789  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower + diff,
13790  mDragStartHorzRange.upper + diff);
13791  } else if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic) {
13792  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) /
13793  rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
13794  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower * diff,
13795  mDragStartHorzRange.upper * diff);
13796  }
13797  }
13798  }
13799  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Vertical)) {
13800  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragVertAxis = mRangeDragVertAxis.data()) {
13801  if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear) {
13802  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) -
13803  rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
13804  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower + diff,
13805  mDragStartVertRange.upper + diff);
13806  } else if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic) {
13807  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) /
13808  rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
13809  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower * diff,
13810  mDragStartVertRange.upper * diff);
13811  }
13812  }
13813  }
13814  if (mRangeDrag !=
13815  0) // if either vertical or horizontal drag was enabled, do a replot
13816  {
13817  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
13818  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
13819  mParentPlot->replot();
13820  }
13821  }
13822 }
13823 
13824 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13825 void QCPAxisRect::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
13826  Q_UNUSED(event)
13827  mDragging = false;
13828  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag()) {
13829  mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
13830  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
13831  }
13832 }
13833 
13857 void QCPAxisRect::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event) {
13858  // Mouse range zooming interaction:
13859  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom)) {
13860  if (mRangeZoom != 0) {
13861  double factor;
13862  double wheelSteps =
13863  event->delta() / 120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
13864  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal)) {
13865  factor = qPow(mRangeZoomFactorHorz, wheelSteps);
13866  if (mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data())
13867  mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->scaleRange(
13868  factor,
13869  mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x()));
13870  }
13871  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Vertical)) {
13872  factor = qPow(mRangeZoomFactorVert, wheelSteps);
13873  if (mRangeZoomVertAxis.data())
13874  mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->scaleRange(
13875  factor,
13876  mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y()));
13877  }
13878  mParentPlot->replot();
13879  }
13880  }
13881 }
13882 
13886 
13914 /* start of documentation of signals */
13915 
13923 /* end of documentation of signals */
13924 
13931 QCPAbstractLegendItem::QCPAbstractLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent)
13932  : QCPLayoutElement(parent->parentPlot()), mParentLegend(parent),
13933  mFont(parent->font()), mTextColor(parent->textColor()),
13934  mSelectedFont(parent->selectedFont()),
13935  mSelectedTextColor(parent->selectedTextColor()), mSelectable(true),
13936  mSelected(false) {
13937  setLayer(QLatin1String("legend"));
13938  setMargins(QMargins(8, 2, 8, 2));
13939 }
13940 
13946 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setFont(const QFont &font) { mFont = font; }
13947 
13953 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setTextColor(const QColor &color) {
13954  mTextColor = color;
13955 }
13956 
13964 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font) {
13965  mSelectedFont = font;
13966 }

13975 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color) {
13976  mSelectedTextColor = color;
13977 }
13978 
13984 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectable(bool selectable) {
13985  if (mSelectable != selectable) {
13986  mSelectable = selectable;
13987  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
13988  }
13989 }
13990 
14000 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelected(bool selected) {
14001  if (mSelected != selected) {
14002  mSelected = selected;
14003  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
14004  }
14005 }
14006 
14007 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14008 double QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectTest(const QPointF &pos,
14009  bool onlySelectable,
14010  QVariant *details) const {
14011  Q_UNUSED(details)
14012  if (!mParentPlot)
14013  return -1;
14014  if (onlySelectable &&
14015  (!mSelectable ||
14016  !mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems)))
14017  return -1;
14018 
14019  if (mRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
14020  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
14021  else
14022  return -1;
14023 }
14024 
14025 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14026 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(
14027  QCPPainter *painter) const {
14028  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegendItems);
14029 }
14030 
14031 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14032 QRect QCPAbstractLegendItem::clipRect() const { return mOuterRect; }
14033 
14034 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14035 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive,
14036  const QVariant &details,
14037  bool *selectionStateChanged) {
14038  Q_UNUSED(event)
14039  Q_UNUSED(details)
14040  if (mSelectable &&
14041  mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems)) {
14042  bool selBefore = mSelected;
14043  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
14044  if (selectionStateChanged)
14045  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
14046  }
14047 }
14048 
14049 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14050 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged) {
14051  if (mSelectable &&
14052  mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems)) {
14053  bool selBefore = mSelected;
14054  setSelected(false);
14055  if (selectionStateChanged)
14056  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
14057  }
14058 }
14059 
14063 
14112 QCPPlottableLegendItem::QCPPlottableLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent,
14113  QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
14114  : QCPAbstractLegendItem(parent), mPlottable(plottable) {}
14115 
14122 QPen QCPPlottableLegendItem::getIconBorderPen() const {
14123  return mSelected ? mParentLegend->selectedIconBorderPen()
14124  : mParentLegend->iconBorderPen();
14125 }
14126 
14133 QColor QCPPlottableLegendItem::getTextColor() const {
14134  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
14135 }
14136 
14143 QFont QCPPlottableLegendItem::getFont() const {
14144  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
14145 }
14146 
14155 void QCPPlottableLegendItem::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
14156  if (!mPlottable)
14157  return;
14158  painter->setFont(getFont());
14159  painter->setPen(QPen(getTextColor()));
14160  QSizeF iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
14161  QRectF textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(
14162  0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
14163  QRectF iconRect(mRect.topLeft(), iconSize);
14164  int textHeight = qMax(textRect.height(),
14165  iconSize.height()); // if text has smaller height than
14166  // icon, center text vertically in
14167  // icon height, else align tops
14168  painter->drawText(mRect.x() + iconSize.width() +
14169  mParentLegend->iconTextPadding(),
14170  mRect.y(), textRect.width(), textHeight, Qt::TextDontClip,
14171  mPlottable->name());
14172  // draw icon:
14173  painter->save();
14174  painter->setClipRect(iconRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
14175  mPlottable->drawLegendIcon(painter, iconRect);
14176  painter->restore();
14177  // draw icon border:
14178  if (getIconBorderPen().style() != Qt::NoPen) {
14179  painter->setPen(getIconBorderPen());
14180  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
14181  painter->drawRect(iconRect);
14182  }
14183 }
14184 
14191 QSize QCPPlottableLegendItem::minimumSizeHint() const {
14192  if (!mPlottable)
14193  return QSize();
14194  QSize result(0, 0);
14195  QRect textRect;
14196  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(getFont());
14197  QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
14198  textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(),
14199  Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
14200  result.setWidth(iconSize.width() + mParentLegend->iconTextPadding() +
14201  textRect.width() + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right());
14202  result.setHeight(qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()) + mMargins.top() +
14203  mMargins.bottom());
14204  return result;
14205 }
14206 
14210 
14249 /* start of documentation of signals */
14250 
14258 /* end of documentation of signals */
14259 
14268 QCPLegend::QCPLegend() {
14269  setRowSpacing(0);
14270  setColumnSpacing(10);
14271  setMargins(QMargins(2, 3, 2, 2));
14272  setAntialiased(false);
14273  setIconSize(32, 18);
14274 
14275  setIconTextPadding(7);
14276 
14277  setSelectableParts(spLegendBox | spItems);
14278  setSelectedParts(spNone);
14279 
14280  setBorderPen(QPen(Qt::black));
14281  setSelectedBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
14282  setIconBorderPen(Qt::NoPen);
14283  setSelectedIconBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
14284  setBrush(Qt::white);
14285  setSelectedBrush(Qt::white);
14286  setTextColor(Qt::black);
14287  setSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue);
14288 }
14289 
14290 QCPLegend::~QCPLegend() {
14291  clearItems();
14292  if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot *>(mParentPlot)) // make sure this isn't called
14293  // from QObject dtor when
14294  // QCustomPlot is already
14295  // destructed (happens when the
14296  // legend is not in any layout
14297  // and thus QObject-child of
14298  // QCustomPlot)
14299  mParentPlot->legendRemoved(this);
14300 }
14301 
14302 /* no doc for getter, see setSelectedParts */
14303 QCPLegend::SelectableParts QCPLegend::selectedParts() const {
14304  // check whether any legend elements selected, if yes, add spItems to return
14305  // value
14306  bool hasSelectedItems = false;
14307  for (int i = 0; i < itemCount(); ++i) {
14308  if (item(i) && item(i)->selected()) {
14309  hasSelectedItems = true;
14310  break;
14311  }
14312  }
14313  if (hasSelectedItems)
14314  return mSelectedParts | spItems;
14315  else
14316  return mSelectedParts & ~spItems;
14317 }
14318 
14322 void QCPLegend::setBorderPen(const QPen &pen) { mBorderPen = pen; }
14323 
14327 void QCPLegend::setBrush(const QBrush &brush) { mBrush = brush; }
14328 
14340 void QCPLegend::setFont(const QFont &font) {
14341  mFont = font;
14342  for (int i = 0; i < itemCount(); ++i) {
14343  if (item(i))
14344  item(i)->setFont(mFont);
14345  }
14346 }
14347 
14359 void QCPLegend::setTextColor(const QColor &color) {
14360  mTextColor = color;
14361  for (int i = 0; i < itemCount(); ++i) {
14362  if (item(i))
14363  item(i)->setTextColor(color);
14364  }
14365 }

14376  mIconSize.setWidth(width);
14377  mIconSize.setHeight(height);
14378 }
14379 
14387 void QCPLegend::setIconTextPadding(int padding) { mIconTextPadding = padding; }
14388 
14396 void QCPLegend::setIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen) { mIconBorderPen = pen; }
14397 
14411 void QCPLegend::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable) {
14412  if (mSelectableParts != selectable) {
14413  mSelectableParts = selectable;
14414  emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
14415  }
14416 }
14417 
14449 void QCPLegend::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected) {
14450  SelectableParts newSelected = selected;
14451  mSelectedParts = this->selectedParts(); // update mSelectedParts in case item
14452  // selection changed
14453 
14454  if (mSelectedParts != newSelected) {
14455  if (!mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) &&
14456  newSelected.testFlag(
14457  spItems)) // attempt to set spItems flag (can't do that)
14458  {
14459  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "spItems flag can not be set, it can only be "
14460  "unset with this function";
14461  newSelected &= ~spItems;
14462  }
14463  if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) &&
14464  !newSelected.testFlag(
14465  spItems)) // spItems flag was unset, so clear item selection
14466  {
14467  for (int i = 0; i < itemCount(); ++i) {
14468  if (item(i))
14469  item(i)->setSelected(false);
14470  }
14471  }
14472  mSelectedParts = newSelected;
14473  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
14474  }
14475 }
14476 
14484 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBorderPen(const QPen &pen) {
14485  mSelectedBorderPen = pen;
14486 }
14487 
14494 void QCPLegend::setSelectedIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen) {
14495  mSelectedIconBorderPen = pen;
14496 }
14497 
14505 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush) {
14506  mSelectedBrush = brush;
14507 }
14508 
14516 void QCPLegend::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font) {
14517  mSelectedFont = font;
14518  for (int i = 0; i < itemCount(); ++i) {
14519  if (item(i))
14520  item(i)->setSelectedFont(font);
14521  }
14522 }
14523 
14532 void QCPLegend::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color) {
14533  mSelectedTextColor = color;
14534  for (int i = 0; i < itemCount(); ++i) {
14535  if (item(i))
14536  item(i)->setSelectedTextColor(color);
14537  }
14538 }
14539 
14545 QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::item(int index) const {
14546  return qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem *>(elementAt(index));
14547 }
14548 
14556 QCPPlottableLegendItem *
14557 QCPLegend::itemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const {
14558  for (int i = 0; i < itemCount(); ++i) {
14559  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *pli =
14560  qobject_cast<QCPPlottableLegendItem *>(item(i))) {
14561  if (pli->plottable() == plottable)
14562  return pli;
14563  }
14564  }
14565  return 0;
14566 }
14567 
14572 int QCPLegend::itemCount() const { return elementCount(); }
14573 
14577 bool QCPLegend::hasItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) const {
14578  for (int i = 0; i < itemCount(); ++i) {
14579  if (item == this->item(i))
14580  return true;
14581  }
14582  return false;
14583 }
14584 
14592 bool QCPLegend::hasItemWithPlottable(
14593  const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const {
14594  return itemWithPlottable(plottable);
14595 }
14596 
14605 bool QCPLegend::addItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) {
14606  if (!hasItem(item)) {
14607  return addElement(rowCount(), 0, item);
14608  } else
14609  return false;
14610 }
14611 
14619 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(int index) {
14620  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(index)) {
14621  bool success = remove(ali);
14622  simplify();
14623  return success;
14624  } else
14625  return false;
14626 }
14627 
14636 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) {
14637  bool success = remove(item);
14638  simplify();
14639  return success;
14640 }
14641 
14645 void QCPLegend::clearItems() {
14646  for (int i = itemCount() - 1; i >= 0; --i)
14647  removeItem(i);
14648 }
14649 
14657 QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> QCPLegend::selectedItems() const {
14658  QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> result;
14659  for (int i = 0; i < itemCount(); ++i) {
14660  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(i)) {
14661  if (ali->selected())
14662  result.append(ali);
14663  }
14664  }
14665  return result;
14666 }
14667 
14684 void QCPLegend::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const {
14685  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegend);
14686 }
14687 
14694 QPen QCPLegend::getBorderPen() const {
14695  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBorderPen : mBorderPen;
14696 }
14697 
14704 QBrush QCPLegend::getBrush() const {
14705  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
14706 }
14707 
14714 void QCPLegend::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
14715  // draw background rect:
14716  painter->setBrush(getBrush());
14717  painter->setPen(getBorderPen());
14718  painter->drawRect(mOuterRect);
14719 }
14720 
14721 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14722 double QCPLegend::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
14723  QVariant *details) const {
14724  if (!mParentPlot)
14725  return -1;
14726  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
14727  return -1;
14728 
14729  if (mOuterRect.contains(pos.toPoint())) {
14730  if (details)
14731  details->setValue(spLegendBox);
14732  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
14733  }
14734  return -1;
14735 }
14736 
14737 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14738 void QCPLegend::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive,
14739  const QVariant &details,
14740  bool *selectionStateChanged) {
14741  Q_UNUSED(event)
14742  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
14743  if (details.value<SelectablePart>() == spLegendBox &&
14744  mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox)) {
14745  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
14746  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts ^ spLegendBox
14747  : mSelectedParts |
14748  spLegendBox); // no need to unset spItems in
14749  // !additive case, because
14750  // they will be deselected by
14751  // QCustomPlot (they're normal
14752  // QCPLayerables with own
14753  // deselectEvent)
14754  if (selectionStateChanged)
14755  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
14756  }
14757 }
14758 
14759 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14760 void QCPLegend::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged) {
14761  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
14762  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox)) {
14763  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
14764  setSelectedParts(selectedParts() & ~spLegendBox);
14765  if (selectionStateChanged)
14766  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
14767  }
14768 }
14769 
14770 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14771 QCP::Interaction QCPLegend::selectionCategory() const {
14772  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
14773 }
14774 
14775 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14776 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectionCategory() const {
14777  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
14778 }
14779 
14780 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14781 void QCPLegend::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) {
14782  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
14783 }
14784 
14788 
14807 /* start documentation of signals */
14808 
14818 /* end documentation of signals */
14819 
14827 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
14828  : QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
14829  mFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 13 * 1.5, QFont::Bold)),
14830  mTextColor(Qt::black),
14831  mSelectedFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 13 * 1.6, QFont::Bold)),
14832  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue), mSelectable(false), mSelected(false) {
14833  if (parentPlot) {
14834  setLayer(parentPlot->currentLayer());
14835  mFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(),
14836  parentPlot->font().pointSize() * 1.5, QFont::Bold);
14837  mSelectedFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(),
14838  parentPlot->font().pointSize() * 1.6, QFont::Bold);
14839  }
14840  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
14841 }
14842 
14848 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &text)
14849  : QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot), mText(text),
14850  mFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(),
14851  parentPlot->font().pointSize() * 1.5, QFont::Bold)),
14852  mTextColor(Qt::black),
14853  mSelectedFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(),
14854  parentPlot->font().pointSize() * 1.6, QFont::Bold)),
14855  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue), mSelectable(false), mSelected(false) {
14856  setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
14857  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
14858 }

14898 }

14909  mSelectable = selectable;

14911  }

14925  mSelected = selected;
14926  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
14927  }
14928 }

14936 void QCPPlotTitle::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {

14938  painter->setPen(QPen(mainTextColor()));
14939  painter->drawText(mRect, Qt::AlignCenter, mText, &mTextBoundingRect);
14940 }
14941 
14942 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14943 QSize QCPPlotTitle::minimumSizeHint() const {
14944  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
14945  QSize result =
14946  metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
14947  result.rwidth() += mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
14948  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
14949  return result;
14950 }
14951 
14952 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14953 QSize QCPPlotTitle::maximumSizeHint() const {
14954  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
14955  QSize result =
14956  metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
14957  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
14958  result.setWidth(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
14959  return result;
14960 }
14961 
14962 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14963 void QCPPlotTitle::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive,
14964  const QVariant &details,
14965  bool *selectionStateChanged) {
14966  Q_UNUSED(event)
14967  Q_UNUSED(details)
14968  if (mSelectable) {
14969  bool selBefore = mSelected;
14970  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
14971  if (selectionStateChanged)
14972  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
14973  }
14974 }
14975 
14976 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14977 void QCPPlotTitle::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged) {
14978  if (mSelectable) {
14979  bool selBefore = mSelected;
14980  setSelected(false);
14981  if (selectionStateChanged)
14982  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
14983  }
14984 }
14985 
14986 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14987 double QCPPlotTitle::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
14988  QVariant *details) const {
14989  Q_UNUSED(details)
14990  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
14991  return -1;
14992 
14993  if (mTextBoundingRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
14994  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
14995  else
14996  return -1;
14997 }
14998 
15005 QFont QCPPlotTitle::mainFont() const {
15006  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
15007 }
15008 
15015 QColor QCPPlotTitle::mainTextColor() const {
15016  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
15017 }
15018 
15022 
15081 /* start documentation of inline functions */
15082 
15103 /* end documentation of signals */
15104 /* start documentation of signals */
15105 
15127 /* end documentation of signals */
15128 
15132 QCPColorScale::QCPColorScale(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
15133  : QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
15134  mType(QCPAxis::atTop), // set to atTop such that setType(QCPAxis::atRight)
15135  // below doesn't skip work because it thinks it's
15136  // already atRight
15137  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear), mBarWidth(20),
15138  mAxisRect(new QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(this)) {
15139  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 6, 0, 6)); // for default right color scale
15140  // types, keep some room at bottom
15141  // and top (important if no margin
15142  // group is used)
15143  setType(QCPAxis::atRight);
15144  setDataRange(QCPRange(0, 6));
15145 }
15146 
15147 QCPColorScale::~QCPColorScale() { delete mAxisRect; }
15148 
15149 /* undocumented getter */
15150 QString QCPColorScale::label() const {
15151  if (!mColorAxis) {
15152  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal color axis undefined";
15153  return QString();
15154  }
15155 
15156  return mColorAxis.data()->label();
15157 }
15158 
15159 /* undocumented getter */
15160 bool QCPColorScale::rangeDrag() const {
15161  if (!mAxisRect) {
15162  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
15163  return false;
15164  }
15165 
15166  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeDrag().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
15167  mAxisRect.data()->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
15168  mAxisRect.data()
15169  ->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))
15170  ->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
15171 }
15172 
15173 /* undocumented getter */
15174 bool QCPColorScale::rangeZoom() const {
15175  if (!mAxisRect) {
15176  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
15177  return false;
15178  }
15179 
15180  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoom().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
15181  mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
15182  mAxisRect.data()
15183  ->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))
15184  ->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
15185 }
15186 
15197 void QCPColorScale::setType(QCPAxis::AxisType type) {
15198  if (!mAxisRect) {
15199  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
15200  return;
15201  }
15202  if (mType != type) {
15203  mType = type;
15204  QCPRange rangeTransfer(0, 6);
15205  double logBaseTransfer = 10;
15206  QString labelTransfer;
15207  // revert some settings on old axis:
15208  if (mColorAxis) {
15209  rangeTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->range();
15210  labelTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->label();
15211  logBaseTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->scaleLogBase();
15212  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(QString());
15213  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this,
15214  SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
15215  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(),
15216  SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this,
15217  SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
15218  }
15219  QList<QCPAxis::AxisType> allAxisTypes =
15220  QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight
15221  << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop;
15222  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType atype, allAxisTypes) {
15223  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTicks(atype == mType);
15224  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTickLabels(atype == mType);
15225  }
15226  // set new mColorAxis pointer:
15227  mColorAxis = mAxisRect.data()->axis(mType);
15228  // transfer settings to new axis:
15229  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(rangeTransfer); // transfer range of old axis to
15230  // new one (necessary if axis
15231  // changes from vertical to
15232  // horizontal or vice versa)
15233  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(labelTransfer);
15234  mColorAxis.data()->setScaleLogBase(
15235  logBaseTransfer); // scaleType is synchronized among axes in realtime
15236  // via signals (connected in QCPColorScale ctor), so
15237  // we only need to take care of log base here
15238  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this,
15239  SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
15240  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)),
15241  this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
15242  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDragAxes(
15243  QCPAxis::orientation(mType) == Qt::Horizontal ? mColorAxis.data() : 0,
15244  QCPAxis::orientation(mType) == Qt::Vertical ? mColorAxis.data() : 0);
15245  }
15246 }
15247 
15260 void QCPColorScale::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange) {
15261  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower ||
15262  mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper) {
15263  mDataRange = dataRange;
15264  if (mColorAxis)
15265  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(mDataRange);
15266  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
15267  }
15268 }
15269 
15283 void QCPColorScale::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType) {
15284  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType) {
15285  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
15286  if (mColorAxis)
15287  mColorAxis.data()->setScaleType(mDataScaleType);
15288  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
15289  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
15290  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
15291  }
15292 }
15293 
15302 void QCPColorScale::setGradient(const QCPColorGradient &gradient) {
15303  if (mGradient != gradient) {
15304  mGradient = gradient;
15305  if (mAxisRect)
15306  mAxisRect.data()->mGradientImageInvalidated = true;
15307  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
15308  }
15309 }
15310 
15316 void QCPColorScale::setLabel(const QString &str) {
15317  if (!mColorAxis) {
15318  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal color axis undefined";
15319  return;
15320  }
15321 
15322  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(str);
15323 }
15324 
15330 void QCPColorScale::setBarWidth(int width) { mBarWidth = width; }
15331 
15338 void QCPColorScale::setRangeDrag(bool enabled) {
15339  if (!mAxisRect) {
15340  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
15341  return;
15342  }
15343 
15344  if (enabled)
15345  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType));
15346  else
15347  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(0);
15348 }
15349 
15357 void QCPColorScale::setRangeZoom(bool enabled) {
15358  if (!mAxisRect) {
15359  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
15360  return;
15361  }
15362 
15363  if (enabled)
15364  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeZoom(QCPAxis::orientation(mType));
15365  else
15366  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeZoom(0);
15367 }
15368 
15372 QList<QCPColorMap *> QCPColorScale::colorMaps() const {
15373  QList<QCPColorMap *> result;
15374  for (int i = 0; i < mParentPlot->plottableCount(); ++i) {
15375  if (QCPColorMap *cm =
15376  qobject_cast<QCPColorMap *>(mParentPlot->plottable(i)))
15377  if (cm->colorScale() == this)
15378  result.append(cm);
15379  }
15380  return result;
15381 }
15382 
15390 void QCPColorScale::rescaleDataRange(bool onlyVisibleMaps) {
15391  QList<QCPColorMap *> maps = colorMaps();
15392  QCPRange newRange;
15393  bool haveRange = false;
15394  int sign = 0; // TODO: should change this to QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain
15395  // later (currently is protected, maybe move to QCP namespace)
15396  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
15397  sign = (mDataRange.upper < 0 ? -1 : 1);
15398  for (int i = 0; i < maps.size(); ++i) {
15399  if (!maps.at(i)->realVisibility() && onlyVisibleMaps)
15400  continue;
15401  QCPRange mapRange;
15402  if (maps.at(i)->colorScale() == this) {
15403  bool currentFoundRange = true;
15404  mapRange = maps.at(i)->data()->dataBounds();
15405  if (sign == 1) {
15406  if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper > 0)
15407  mapRange.lower = mapRange.upper * 1e-3;
15408  else if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper <= 0)
15409  currentFoundRange = false;
15410  } else if (sign == -1) {
15411  if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower < 0)
15412  mapRange.upper = mapRange.lower * 1e-3;
15413  else if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower >= 0)
15414  currentFoundRange = false;
15415  }
15416  if (currentFoundRange) {
15417  if (!haveRange)
15418  newRange = mapRange;
15419  else
15420  newRange.expand(mapRange);
15421  haveRange = true;
15422  }
15423  }
15424  }
15425  if (haveRange) {
15426  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero
15427  // (plottable has only constant data in
15428  // this dimension), shift current range
15429  // to at least center the data
15430  {
15431  double center = (newRange.lower + newRange.upper) *
15432  0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just
15433  // to make sure, incase validRange returned false for
15434  // other reason
15435  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear) {
15436  newRange.lower = center - mDataRange.size() / 2.0;
15437  newRange.upper = center + mDataRange.size() / 2.0;
15438  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
15439  {
15440  newRange.lower = center / qSqrt(mDataRange.upper / mDataRange.lower);
15441  newRange.upper = center * qSqrt(mDataRange.upper / mDataRange.lower);
15442  }
15443  }
15444  setDataRange(newRange);
15445  }
15446 }
15447 
15448 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15449 void QCPColorScale::update(UpdatePhase phase) {
15450  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
15451  if (!mAxisRect) {
15452  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
15453  return;
15454  }
15455 
15456  mAxisRect.data()->update(phase);
15457 
15458  switch (phase) {
15459  case upMargins: {
15460  if (mType == QCPAxis::atBottom || mType == QCPAxis::atTop) {
15461  setMaximumSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, mBarWidth +
15462  mAxisRect.data()->margins().top() +
15463  mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom() +
15464  margins().top() + margins().bottom());
15465  setMinimumSize(0, mBarWidth + mAxisRect.data()->margins().top() +
15466  mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom() +
15467  margins().top() + margins().bottom());
15468  } else {
15469  setMaximumSize(mBarWidth + mAxisRect.data()->margins().left() +
15470  mAxisRect.data()->margins().right() +
15471  margins().left() + margins().right(),
15472  QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
15473  setMinimumSize(mBarWidth + mAxisRect.data()->margins().left() +
15474  mAxisRect.data()->margins().right() +
15475  margins().left() + margins().right(),
15476  0);
15477  }
15478  break;
15479  }
15480  case upLayout: {
15481  mAxisRect.data()->setOuterRect(rect());
15482  break;
15483  }
15484  default:
15485  break;
15486  }
15487 }
15488 
15489 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15490 void QCPColorScale::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const {
15491  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
15492 }
15493

15497  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
15498  return;
15499  }
15500  mAxisRect.data()->mousePressEvent(event);
15501 }

15506  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";

15509  mAxisRect.data()->mouseMoveEvent(event);
15510 }

15515  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";

15518  mAxisRect.data()->mouseReleaseEvent(event);

15529 
15533 
15547 QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(
15548  QCPColorScale *parentColorScale)
15549  : QCPAxisRect(parentColorScale->parentPlot(), true),
15550  mParentColorScale(parentColorScale), mGradientImageInvalidated(true) {
15551  setParentLayerable(parentColorScale);
15552  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 0, 0, 0));
15553  QList<QCPAxis::AxisType> allAxisTypes =
15554  QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop
15555  << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight;
15556  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, allAxisTypes) {
15557  axis(type)->setVisible(true);
15558  axis(type)->grid()->setVisible(false);
15559  axis(type)->setPadding(0);
15560  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)),
15561  this, SLOT(axisSelectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
15562  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)),
15563  this, SLOT(axisSelectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
15564  }
15565 
15566  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)),
15567  axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
15568  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)),
15569  axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
15570  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)),
15571  axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
15572  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)),
15573  axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
15574  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)),
15575  axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
15576  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)),
15577  axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
15578  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)),
15579  axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
15580  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)),
15581  axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
15582 
15583  // make layer transfers of color scale transfer to axis rect and axes
15584  // the axes must be set after axis rect, such that they appear above color
15585  // gradient drawn by axis rect:
15586  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer *)), this,
15587  SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer *)));
15588  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, allAxisTypes)
15589  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer *)), axis(type),
15590  SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer *)));
15591 }
15592 
15599 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
15600  if (mGradientImageInvalidated)
15601  updateGradientImage();
15602 
15603  bool mirrorHorz = false;
15604  bool mirrorVert = false;
15605  if (mParentColorScale->mColorAxis) {
15606  mirrorHorz = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
15607  (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atBottom ||
15608  mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atTop);
15609  mirrorVert = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
15610  (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atLeft ||
15611  mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atRight);
15612  }
15613 
15614  painter->drawImage(rect().adjusted(0, -1, 0, -1),
15615  mGradientImage.mirrored(mirrorHorz, mirrorVert));
15616  QCPAxisRect::draw(painter);
15617 }
15618 
15626 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::updateGradientImage() {
15627  if (rect().isEmpty())
15628  return;
15629 
15630  int n = mParentColorScale->mGradient.levelCount();
15631  int w, h;
15632  QVector<double> data(n);
15633  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
15634  data[i] = i;
15635  if (mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atBottom ||
15636  mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atTop) {
15637  w = n;
15638  h = rect().height();
15639  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, QImage::Format_RGB32);
15640  QVector<QRgb *> pixels;
15641  for (int y = 0; y < h; ++y)
15642  pixels.append(reinterpret_cast<QRgb *>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y)));
15643  mParentColorScale->mGradient.colorize(data.constData(), QCPRange(0, n - 1),
15644  pixels.first(), n);
15645  for (int y = 1; y < h; ++y)
15646  memcpy(pixels.at(y), pixels.first(), n * sizeof(QRgb));
15647  } else {
15648  w = rect().width();
15649  h = n;
15650  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, QImage::Format_RGB32);
15651  for (int y = 0; y < h; ++y) {
15652  QRgb *pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb *>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y));
15653  const QRgb lineColor = mParentColorScale->mGradient.color(
15654  data[h - 1 - y], QCPRange(0, n - 1));
15655  for (int x = 0; x < w; ++x)
15656  pixels[x] = lineColor;
15657  }
15658  }
15659  mGradientImageInvalidated = false;
15660 }
15661 
15668 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectionChanged(
15669  QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectedParts) {
15670  // axis bases of four axes shall always (de-)selected synchronously:
15671  QList<QCPAxis::AxisType> allAxisTypes =
15672  QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop
15673  << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight;
15674  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, allAxisTypes) {
15675  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis *>(sender()))
15676  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
15677  continue;
15678 
15679  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis)) {
15680  if (selectedParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
15681  axis(type)
15682  ->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() | QCPAxis::spAxis);
15683  else
15684  axis(type)
15685  ->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() & ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
15686  }
15687  }
15688 }
15689 
15696 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectableChanged(
15697  QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectableParts) {
15698  // synchronize axis base selectability:
15699  QList<QCPAxis::AxisType> allAxisTypes =
15700  QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop
15701  << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight;
15702  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, allAxisTypes) {
15703  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis *>(sender()))
15704  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
15705  continue;
15706 
15707  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis)) {
15708  if (selectableParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
15709  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() |
15710  QCPAxis::spAxis);
15711  else
15712  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() &
15713  ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
15714  }
15715  }
15716 }
15717 
15721 
15741 QCPData::QCPData()
15742  : key(0), value(0), keyErrorPlus(0), keyErrorMinus(0), valueErrorPlus(0),
15743  valueErrorMinus(0) {}
15744 
15749 QCPData::QCPData(double key, double value)
15750  : key(key), value(value), keyErrorPlus(0), keyErrorMinus(0),
15751  valueErrorPlus(0), valueErrorMinus(0) {}
15752 
15756 
15808 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
15809 
15819 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
15820 
15837 QCPGraph::QCPGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
15838  : QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis) {
15839  mData = new QCPDataMap;
15840 
15841  setPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 0));
15842  setErrorPen(QPen(Qt::black));
15843  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15844  setSelectedPen(QPen(QColor(80, 80, 255), 2.5));
15845  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15846 
15847  setLineStyle(lsLine);
15848  setErrorType(etNone);
15849  setErrorBarSize(6);
15850  setErrorBarSkipSymbol(true);
15851  setChannelFillGraph(0);
15852  setAdaptiveSampling(true);
15853 }
15854 
15855 QCPGraph::~QCPGraph() { delete mData; }
15856 
15870 void QCPGraph::setData(QCPDataMap *data, bool copy) {
15871  if (mData == data) {
15872  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
15873  << "The data pointer is already in (and owned by) this plottable"
15874  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(data);
15875  return;
15876  }
15877  if (copy) {
15878  *mData = *data;
15879  } else {
15880  delete mData;
15881  mData = data;
15882  }
15883 }
15884 
15893 void QCPGraph::setData(const QVector<double> &key,
15894  const QVector<double> &value) {
15895  mData->clear();
15896  int n = key.size();
15897  n = qMin(n, value.size());
15898  QCPData newData;
15899  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
15900  newData.key = key[i];
15901  newData.value = value[i];
15902  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
15903  }
15904 }
15905 
15919 void QCPGraph::setDataValueError(const QVector<double> &key,
15920  const QVector<double> &value,
15921  const QVector<double> &valueError) {
15922  mData->clear();
15923  int n = key.size();
15924  n = qMin(n, value.size());
15925  n = qMin(n, valueError.size());
15926  QCPData newData;
15927  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
15928  newData.key = key[i];
15929  newData.value = value[i];
15930  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueError[i];
15931  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueError[i];
15932  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
15933  }
15934 }
15935 
15948 void QCPGraph::setDataValueError(const QVector<double> &key,
15949  const QVector<double> &value,
15950  const QVector<double> &valueErrorMinus,
15951  const QVector<double> &valueErrorPlus) {
15952  mData->clear();
15953  int n = key.size();
15954  n = qMin(n, value.size());
15955  n = qMin(n, valueErrorMinus.size());
15956  n = qMin(n, valueErrorPlus.size());
15957  QCPData newData;
15958  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
15959  newData.key = key[i];
15960  newData.value = value[i];
15961  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueErrorMinus[i];
15962  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueErrorPlus[i];
15963  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
15964  }
15965 }
15966 
15979 void QCPGraph::setDataKeyError(const QVector<double> &key,
15980  const QVector<double> &value,
15981  const QVector<double> &keyError) {
15982  mData->clear();
15983  int n = key.size();
15984  n = qMin(n, value.size());
15985  n = qMin(n, keyError.size());
15986  QCPData newData;
15987  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
15988  newData.key = key[i];
15989  newData.value = value[i];
15990  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyError[i];
15991  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyError[i];
15992  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
15993  }
15994 }
15995 
16008 void QCPGraph::setDataKeyError(const QVector<double> &key,
16009  const QVector<double> &value,
16010  const QVector<double> &keyErrorMinus,
16011  const QVector<double> &keyErrorPlus) {
16012  mData->clear();
16013  int n = key.size();
16014  n = qMin(n, value.size());
16015  n = qMin(n, keyErrorMinus.size());
16016  n = qMin(n, keyErrorPlus.size());
16017  QCPData newData;
16018  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
16019  newData.key = key[i];
16020  newData.value = value[i];
16021  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyErrorMinus[i];
16022  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyErrorPlus[i];
16023  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
16024  }
16025 }
16026 
16040 void QCPGraph::setDataBothError(const QVector<double> &key,
16041  const QVector<double> &value,
16042  const QVector<double> &keyError,
16043  const QVector<double> &valueError) {
16044  mData->clear();
16045  int n = key.size();
16046  n = qMin(n, value.size());
16047  n = qMin(n, valueError.size());
16048  n = qMin(n, keyError.size());
16049  QCPData newData;
16050  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
16051  newData.key = key[i];
16052  newData.value = value[i];
16053  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyError[i];
16054  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyError[i];
16055  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueError[i];
16056  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueError[i];
16057  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
16058  }
16059 }
16060 
16074 void QCPGraph::setDataBothError(const QVector<double> &key,
16075  const QVector<double> &value,
16076  const QVector<double> &keyErrorMinus,
16077  const QVector<double> &keyErrorPlus,
16078  const QVector<double> &valueErrorMinus,
16079  const QVector<double> &valueErrorPlus) {
16080  mData->clear();
16081  int n = key.size();
16082  n = qMin(n, value.size());
16083  n = qMin(n, valueErrorMinus.size());
16084  n = qMin(n, valueErrorPlus.size());
16085  n = qMin(n, keyErrorMinus.size());
16086  n = qMin(n, keyErrorPlus.size());
16087  QCPData newData;
16088  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
16089  newData.key = key[i];
16090  newData.value = value[i];
16091  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyErrorMinus[i];
16092  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyErrorPlus[i];
16093  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueErrorMinus[i];
16094  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueErrorPlus[i];
16095  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
16096  }
16097 }
16098 
16106 void QCPGraph::setLineStyle(LineStyle ls) { mLineStyle = ls; }
16107 
16115 void QCPGraph::setScatterStyle(const QCPScatterStyle &style) {
16116  mScatterStyle = style;
16117 }
16118 
16130 void QCPGraph::setErrorType(ErrorType errorType) { mErrorType = errorType; }
16131 
16136 void QCPGraph::setErrorPen(const QPen &pen) { mErrorPen = pen; }
16137 
16141 void QCPGraph::setErrorBarSize(double size) { mErrorBarSize = size; }
16142 
16157 void QCPGraph::setErrorBarSkipSymbol(bool enabled) {
16158  mErrorBarSkipSymbol = enabled;
16159 }
16160 
16172 void QCPGraph::setChannelFillGraph(QCPGraph *targetGraph) {
16173  // prevent setting channel target to this graph itself:
16174  if (targetGraph == this) {
16175  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "targetGraph is this graph itself";
16176  mChannelFillGraph = 0;
16177  return;
16178  }
16179  // prevent setting channel target to a graph not in the plot:
16180  if (targetGraph && targetGraph->mParentPlot != mParentPlot) {
16181  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "targetGraph not in same plot";
16182  mChannelFillGraph = 0;
16183  return;
16184  }
16185 
16186  mChannelFillGraph = targetGraph;
16187 }
16188 
16240 void QCPGraph::setAdaptiveSampling(bool enabled) {
16241  mAdaptiveSampling = enabled;
16242 }
16243 
16253 void QCPGraph::addData(const QCPDataMap &dataMap) { mData->unite(dataMap); }
16254 
16264 void QCPGraph::addData(const QCPData &data) {
16265  mData->insertMulti(data.key, data);
16266 }
16267 
16278 void QCPGraph::addData(double key, double value) {
16279  QCPData newData;
16280  newData.key = key;
16281  newData.value = value;
16282  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
16283 }
16284 
16295 void QCPGraph::addData(const QVector<double> &keys,
16296  const QVector<double> &values) {
16297  int n = qMin(keys.size(), values.size());
16298  QCPData newData;
16299  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
16300  newData.key = keys[i];
16301  newData.value = values[i];
16302  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
16303  }
16304 }
16305 
16310 void QCPGraph::removeDataBefore(double key) {
16311  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
16312  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
16313  it = mData->erase(it);
16314 }
16315 
16320 void QCPGraph::removeDataAfter(double key) {
16321  if (mData->isEmpty())
16322  return;
16323  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
16324  while (it != mData->end())
16325  it = mData->erase(it);
16326 }
16327 
16336 void QCPGraph::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey) {
16337  if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty())
16338  return;
16339  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
16340  QCPDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
16341  while (it != itEnd)
16342  it = mData->erase(it);
16343 }
16344 
16355 void QCPGraph::removeData(double key) { mData->remove(key); }
16356 
16361 void QCPGraph::clearData() { mData->clear(); }
16362 
16363 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16364 double QCPGraph::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
16365  QVariant *details) const {
16366  Q_UNUSED(details)
16367  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectable) || mData->isEmpty())
16368  return -1;
16369  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) {
16370  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
16371  return -1;
16372  }
16373 
16374  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
16375  return pointDistance(pos);
16376  else
16377  return -1;
16378 }
16379 
16389 void QCPGraph::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const {
16390  rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge, includeErrorBars);
16391  rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge, includeErrorBars);
16392 }
16393 
16402 void QCPGraph::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const {
16403  // this code is a copy of QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis with the only
16404  // change
16405  // that getKeyRange is passed the includeErrorBars value.
16406  if (mData->isEmpty())
16407  return;
16408 
16409  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16410  if (!keyAxis) {
16411  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis";
16412  return;
16413  }
16414 
16415  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
16416  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
16417  signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
16418 
16419  bool foundRange;
16420  QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(foundRange, signDomain, includeErrorBars);
16421 
16422  if (foundRange) {
16423  if (onlyEnlarge) {
16424  if (keyAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
16425  newRange.lower = keyAxis->range().lower;
16426  if (keyAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
16427  newRange.upper = keyAxis->range().upper;
16428  }
16429  keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
16430  }
16431 }
16432 
16441 void QCPGraph::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const {
16442  // this code is a copy of QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis with the only
16443  // change
16444  // is that getValueRange is passed the includeErrorBars value.
16445  if (mData->isEmpty())
16446  return;
16447 
16448  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16449  if (!valueAxis) {
16450  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid value axis";
16451  return;
16452  }
16453 
16454  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
16455  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
16456  signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
16457 
16458  bool foundRange;
16459  QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(foundRange, signDomain, includeErrorBars);
16460 
16461  if (foundRange) {
16462  if (onlyEnlarge) {
16463  if (valueAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
16464  newRange.lower = valueAxis->range().lower;
16465  if (valueAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
16466  newRange.upper = valueAxis->range().upper;
16467  }
16468  valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
16469  }
16470 }
16471 
16472 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16473 void QCPGraph::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
16474  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) {
16475  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
16476  return;
16477  }
16478  if (mKeyAxis.data()->range().size() <= 0 || mData->isEmpty())
16479  return;
16480  if (mLineStyle == lsNone && mScatterStyle.isNone())
16481  return;
16482 
16483  // allocate line and (if necessary) point vectors:
16484  QVector<QPointF> *lineData = new QVector<QPointF>;
16485  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData = 0;
16486  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
16487  scatterData = new QVector<QCPData>;
16488 
16489  // fill vectors with data appropriate to plot style:
16490  getPlotData(lineData, scatterData);
16491 
16492 // check data validity if flag set:
16493 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
16494  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it;
16495  for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it) {
16496  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().key, it.value().value) ||
16497  QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().keyErrorPlus, it.value().keyErrorMinus) ||
16498  QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().valueErrorPlus,
16499  it.value().valueErrorPlus))
16500  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << it.key() << "invalid."
16501  << "Plottable name:" << name();
16502  }
16503 #endif
16504 
16505  // draw fill of graph:
16506  drawFill(painter, lineData);
16507 
16508  // draw line:
16509  if (mLineStyle == lsImpulse)
16510  drawImpulsePlot(painter, lineData);
16511  else if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
16512  drawLinePlot(painter,
16513  lineData); // also step plots can be drawn as a line plot
16514 
16515  // draw scatters:
16516  if (scatterData)
16517  drawScatterPlot(painter, scatterData);
16518 
16519  // free allocated line and point vectors:
16520  delete lineData;
16521  if (scatterData)
16522  delete scatterData;
16523 }
16524 
16525 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16526 void QCPGraph::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const {
16527  // draw fill:
16528  if (mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush) {
16529  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
16530  painter->fillRect(QRectF(rect.left(), rect.top() + rect.height() / 2.0,
16531  rect.width(), rect.height() / 3.0),
16532  mBrush);
16533  }
16534  // draw line vertically centered:
16535  if (mLineStyle != lsNone) {
16536  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
16537  painter->setPen(mPen);
16538  painter->drawLine(
16539  QLineF(rect.left(), rect.top() + rect.height() / 2.0, rect.right() + 5,
16540  rect.top() + rect.height() / 2.0)); // +5 on x2 else last segment
16541  // is missing from
16542  // dashed/dotted pens
16543  }
16544  // draw scatter symbol:
16545  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone()) {
16546  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
16547  // scale scatter pixmap if it's too large to fit in legend icon rect:
16548  if (mScatterStyle.shape() == QCPScatterStyle::ssPixmap &&
16549  (mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().width() > rect.width() ||
16550  mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().height() > rect.height())) {
16551  QCPScatterStyle scaledStyle(mScatterStyle);
16552  scaledStyle.setPixmap(scaledStyle.pixmap().scaled(
16553  rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation));
16554  scaledStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
16555  scaledStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
16556  } else {
16557  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
16558  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
16559  }
16560  }
16561 }
16562 
16590 void QCPGraph::getPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *lineData,
16591  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const {
16592  switch (mLineStyle) {
16593  case lsNone:
16594  getScatterPlotData(scatterData);
16595  break;
16596  case lsLine:
16597  getLinePlotData(lineData, scatterData);
16598  break;
16599  case lsStepLeft:
16600  getStepLeftPlotData(lineData, scatterData);
16601  break;
16602  case lsStepRight:
16603  getStepRightPlotData(lineData, scatterData);
16604  break;
16605  case lsStepCenter:
16606  getStepCenterPlotData(lineData, scatterData);
16607  break;
16608  case lsImpulse:
16609  getImpulsePlotData(lineData, scatterData);
16610  break;
16611  }
16612 }
16613 
16629 void QCPGraph::getScatterPlotData(QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const {
16630  getPreparedData(0, scatterData);
16631 }
16632 
16648 void QCPGraph::getLinePlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData,
16649  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const {
16650  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16651  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16652  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
16653  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
16654  return;
16655  }
16656  if (!linePixelData) {
16657  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as linePixelData";
16658  return;
16659  }
16660 
16661  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
16662  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
16663  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size() + 2); // added 2 to reserve memory for
16664  // lower/upper fill base points
16665  // that might be needed for fill
16666  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size());
16667 
16668  // transform lineData points to pixels:
16669  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
16670  for (int i = 0; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16671  (*linePixelData)[i].setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
16672  (*linePixelData)[i].setY(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key));
16673  }
16674  } else // key axis is horizontal
16675  {
16676  for (int i = 0; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16677  (*linePixelData)[i].setX(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key));
16678  (*linePixelData)[i].setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
16679  }
16680  }
16681 }
16682 
16698 void QCPGraph::getStepLeftPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData,
16699  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const {
16700  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16701  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16702  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
16703  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
16704  return;
16705  }
16706  if (!linePixelData) {
16707  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData";
16708  return;
16709  }
16710 
16711  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
16712  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
16713  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size() * 2 + 2); // added 2 to reserve memory
16714  // for lower/upper fill base
16715  // points that might be
16716  // needed for fill
16717  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size() * 2);
16718 
16719  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
16720  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
16721  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
16722  double key;
16723  for (int i = 0; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16724  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
16725  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setX(lastValue);
16726  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setY(key);
16727  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
16728  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setX(lastValue);
16729  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setY(key);
16730  }
16731  } else // key axis is horizontal
16732  {
16733  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
16734  double key;
16735  for (int i = 0; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16736  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
16737  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setX(key);
16738  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setY(lastValue);
16739  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
16740  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setX(key);
16741  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setY(lastValue);
16742  }
16743  }
16744 }
16745 
16761 void QCPGraph::getStepRightPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData,
16762  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const {
16763  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16764  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16765  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
16766  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
16767  return;
16768  }
16769  if (!linePixelData) {
16770  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData";
16771  return;
16772  }
16773 
16774  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
16775  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
16776  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size() * 2 + 2); // added 2 to reserve memory
16777  // for lower/upper fill base
16778  // points that might be
16779  // needed for fill
16780  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size() * 2);
16781 
16782  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
16783  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
16784  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
16785  double value;
16786  for (int i = 0; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16787  value = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
16788  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setX(value);
16789  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setY(lastKey);
16790  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
16791  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setX(value);
16792  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setY(lastKey);
16793  }
16794  } else // key axis is horizontal
16795  {
16796  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
16797  double value;
16798  for (int i = 0; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16799  value = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
16800  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setX(lastKey);
16801  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setY(value);
16802  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
16803  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setX(lastKey);
16804  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setY(value);
16805  }
16806  }
16807 }
16808 
16824 void QCPGraph::getStepCenterPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData,
16825  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const {
16826  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16827  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16828  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
16829  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
16830  return;
16831  }
16832  if (!linePixelData) {
16833  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData";
16834  return;
16835  }
16836 
16837  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
16838  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
16839  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size() * 2 + 2); // added 2 to reserve memory
16840  // for lower/upper fill base
16841  // points that might be
16842  // needed for fill
16843  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size() * 2);
16844  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
16845  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
16846  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
16847  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
16848  double key;
16849  (*linePixelData)[0].setX(lastValue);
16850  (*linePixelData)[0].setY(lastKey);
16851  for (int i = 1; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16852  key = (keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key) + lastKey) * 0.5;
16853  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 - 1].setX(lastValue);
16854  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 - 1].setY(key);
16855  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
16856  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
16857  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setX(lastValue);
16858  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setY(key);
16859  }
16860  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size() * 2 - 1].setX(lastValue);
16861  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size() * 2 - 1].setY(lastKey);
16862  } else // key axis is horizontal
16863  {
16864  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
16865  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
16866  double key;
16867  (*linePixelData)[0].setX(lastKey);
16868  (*linePixelData)[0].setY(lastValue);
16869  for (int i = 1; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16870  key = (keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key) + lastKey) * 0.5;
16871  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 - 1].setX(key);
16872  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 - 1].setY(lastValue);
16873  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
16874  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
16875  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setX(key);
16876  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setY(lastValue);
16877  }
16878  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size() * 2 - 1].setX(lastKey);
16879  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size() * 2 - 1].setY(lastValue);
16880  }
16881 }
16882 
16897 void QCPGraph::getImpulsePlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData,
16898  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const {
16899  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16900  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16901  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
16902  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
16903  return;
16904  }
16905  if (!linePixelData) {
16906  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as linePixelData";
16907  return;
16908  }
16909 
16910  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
16911  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
16912  linePixelData->resize(
16913  lineData.size() *
16914  2); // no need to reserve 2 extra points because impulse plot has no fill
16915 
16916  // transform lineData points to pixels:
16917  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
16918  double zeroPointX = valueAxis->coordToPixel(0);
16919  double key;
16920  for (int i = 0; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16921  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
16922  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setX(zeroPointX);
16923  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setY(key);
16924  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setX(
16925  valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
16926  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setY(key);
16927  }
16928  } else // key axis is horizontal
16929  {
16930  double zeroPointY = valueAxis->coordToPixel(0);
16931  double key;
16932  for (int i = 0; i < lineData.size(); ++i) {
16933  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
16934  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setX(key);
16935  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 0].setY(zeroPointY);
16936  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setX(key);
16937  (*linePixelData)[i * 2 + 1].setY(
16938  valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
16939  }
16940  }
16941 }
16942 
16960 void QCPGraph::drawFill(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const {
16961  if (mLineStyle == lsImpulse)
16962  return; // fill doesn't make sense for impulse plot
16963  if (mainBrush().style() == Qt::NoBrush || mainBrush().color().alpha() == 0)
16964  return;
16965 
16966  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
16967  if (!mChannelFillGraph) {
16968  // draw base fill under graph, fill goes all the way to the zero-value-line:
16969  addFillBasePoints(lineData);
16970  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
16971  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
16972  painter->drawPolygon(QPolygonF(*lineData));
16973  removeFillBasePoints(lineData);
16974  } else {
16975  // draw channel fill between this graph and mChannelFillGraph:
16976  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
16977  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
16978  painter->drawPolygon(getChannelFillPolygon(lineData));
16979  }
16980 }
16981 
16994 void QCPGraph::drawScatterPlot(QCPPainter *painter,
16995  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const {
16996  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16997  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16998  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
16999  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
17000  return;
17001  }
17002 
17003  // draw error bars:
17004  if (mErrorType != etNone) {
17005  applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(painter);
17006  painter->setPen(mErrorPen);
17007  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
17008  for (int i = 0; i < scatterData->size(); ++i)
17009  drawError(painter, valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value),
17010  keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key),
17011  scatterData->at(i));
17012  } else {
17013  for (int i = 0; i < scatterData->size(); ++i)
17014  drawError(painter, keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key),
17015  valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value),
17016  scatterData->at(i));
17017  }
17018  }
17019 
17020  // draw scatter point symbols:
17021  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
17022  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
17023  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
17024  for (int i = 0; i < scatterData->size(); ++i)
17025  if (!qIsNaN(scatterData->at(i).value))
17026  mScatterStyle.drawShape(
17027  painter, valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value),
17028  keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key));
17029  } else {
17030  for (int i = 0; i < scatterData->size(); ++i)
17031  if (!qIsNaN(scatterData->at(i).value))
17032  mScatterStyle.drawShape(
17033  painter, keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key),
17034  valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value));
17035  }
17036 }
17037 
17051 void QCPGraph::drawLinePlot(QCPPainter *painter,
17052  QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const {
17053  // draw line of graph:
17054  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0) {
17055  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
17056  painter->setPen(mainPen());
17057  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
17058 
17059  /* Draws polyline in batches, currently not used:
17060  int p = 0;
17061  while (p < lineData->size())
17062  {
17063  int batch = qMin(25, lineData->size()-p);
17064  if (p != 0)
17065  {
17066  ++batch;
17067  --p; // to draw the connection lines between two batches
17068  }
17069  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData()+p, batch);
17070  p += batch;
17071  }
17072  */
17073 
17074  // if drawing solid line and not in PDF, use much faster line drawing
17075  // instead of polyline:
17076  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phFastPolylines) &&
17077  painter->pen().style() == Qt::SolidLine &&
17078  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmVectorized) &&
17079  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching)) {
17080  int i = 0;
17081  bool lastIsNan = false;
17082  const int lineDataSize = lineData->size();
17083  while (i < lineDataSize &&
17084  (qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).y()) ||
17085  qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).x()))) // make sure first point is not NaN
17086  ++i;
17087  ++i; // because drawing works in 1 point retrospect
17088  while (i < lineDataSize) {
17089  if (!qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).y()) &&
17090  !qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).x())) // NaNs create a gap in the line
17091  {
17092  if (!lastIsNan)
17093  painter->drawLine(lineData->at(i - 1), lineData->at(i));
17094  else
17095  lastIsNan = false;
17096  } else
17097  lastIsNan = true;
17098  ++i;
17099  }
17100  } else {
17101  int segmentStart = 0;
17102  int i = 0;
17103  const int lineDataSize = lineData->size();
17104  while (i < lineDataSize) {
17105  if (qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).y()) ||
17106  qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).x())) // NaNs create a gap in the line
17107  {
17108  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData() + segmentStart,
17109  i - segmentStart); // i, because we don't want
17110  // to include the current NaN
17111  // point
17112  segmentStart = i + 1;
17113  }
17114  ++i;
17115  }
17116  // draw last segment:
17117  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData() + segmentStart,
17118  lineDataSize - segmentStart);
17119  }
17120  }
17121 }
17122 
17131 void QCPGraph::drawImpulsePlot(QCPPainter *painter,
17132  QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const {
17133  // draw impulses:
17134  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0) {
17135  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
17136  QPen pen = mainPen();
17137  pen.setCapStyle(
17138  Qt::FlatCap); // so impulse line doesn't reach beyond zero-line
17139  painter->setPen(pen);
17140  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
17141  painter->drawLines(*lineData);
17142  }
17143 }
17144 
17162 void QCPGraph::getPreparedData(QVector<QCPData> *lineData,
17163  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const {
17164  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
17165  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
17166  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
17167  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
17168  return;
17169  }
17170  // get visible data range:
17171  QCPDataMap::const_iterator lower, upper; // note that upper is the actual
17172  // upper point, and not 1 step after
17173  // the upper point
17174  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
17175  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
17176  return;
17177 
17178  // count points in visible range, taking into account that we only need to
17179  // count to the limit maxCount if using adaptive sampling:
17180  int maxCount = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
17181  if (mAdaptiveSampling) {
17182  int keyPixelSpan = qAbs(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key()) -
17183  keyAxis->coordToPixel(upper.key()));
17184  maxCount = 2 * keyPixelSpan + 2;
17185  }
17186  int dataCount = countDataInBounds(lower, upper, maxCount);
17187 
17188  if (mAdaptiveSampling && dataCount >= maxCount) // use adaptive sampling only
17189  // if there are at least two
17190  // points per pixel on average
17191  {
17192  if (lineData) {
17193  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
17194  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper + 1;
17195  double minValue = it.value().value;
17196  double maxValue = it.value().value;
17197  QCPDataMap::const_iterator currentIntervalFirstPoint = it;
17198  int reversedFactor =
17199  keyAxis->rangeReversed() != (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
17200  ? -1
17201  : 1; // is used to calculate keyEpsilon pixel into the correct
17202  // direction
17203  int reversedRound =
17204  keyAxis->rangeReversed() != (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
17205  ? 1
17206  : 0; // is used to switch between floor (normal) and ceil
17207  // (reversed) rounding of currentIntervalStartKey
17208  double currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(
17209  (int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key()) + reversedRound));
17210  double lastIntervalEndKey = currentIntervalStartKey;
17211  double keyEpsilon = qAbs(
17212  currentIntervalStartKey -
17213  keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey) +
17214  1.0 * reversedFactor)); // interval of one pixel
17215  // on screen when mapped
17216  // to plot key
17217  // coordinates
17218  bool keyEpsilonVariable =
17219  keyAxis->scaleType() ==
17220  QCPAxis::stLogarithmic; // indicates whether keyEpsilon needs to be
17221  // updated after every interval (for log axes)
17222  int intervalDataCount = 1;
17223  ++it; // advance iterator to second data point because adaptive sampling
17224  // works in 1 point retrospect
17225  while (it != upperEnd) {
17226  if (it.key() < currentIntervalStartKey +
17227  keyEpsilon) // data point is still within same pixel,
17228  // so skip it and expand value span of
17229  // this cluster if necessary
17230  {
17231  if (it.value().value < minValue)
17232  minValue = it.value().value;
17233  else if (it.value().value > maxValue)
17234  maxValue = it.value().value;
17235  ++intervalDataCount;
17236  } else // new pixel interval started
17237  {
17238  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points,
17239  // consolidate them to a cluster
17240  {
17241  if (lastIntervalEndKey <
17242  currentIntervalStartKey - keyEpsilon) // last point is further
17243  // away, so first point of
17244  // this cluster must be at
17245  // a real data point
17246  lineData->append(
17247  QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey + keyEpsilon * 0.2,
17248  currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
17249  lineData->append(
17250  QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey + keyEpsilon * 0.25, minValue));
17251  lineData->append(
17252  QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey + keyEpsilon * 0.75, maxValue));
17253  if (it.key() > currentIntervalStartKey +
17254  keyEpsilon * 2) // new pixel started further away
17255  // from previous cluster, so make
17256  // sure the last point of the
17257  // cluster is at a real data
17258  // point
17259  lineData->append(
17260  QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey + keyEpsilon * 0.8,
17261  (it - 1).value().value));
17262  } else
17263  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalFirstPoint.key(),
17264  currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
17265  lastIntervalEndKey = (it - 1).value().key;
17266  minValue = it.value().value;
17267  maxValue = it.value().value;
17268  currentIntervalFirstPoint = it;
17269  currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(
17270  (int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.key()) + reversedRound));
17271  if (keyEpsilonVariable)
17272  keyEpsilon =
17273  qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey -
17274  keyAxis->pixelToCoord(
17275  keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey) +
17276  1.0 * reversedFactor));
17277  intervalDataCount = 1;
17278  }
17279  ++it;
