20127  (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) ||
20128  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0)) {
20129  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower) {
20130  range.lower = current;
20131  haveLower = true;
20132  }
20133  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper) {
20134  range.upper = current;
20135  haveUpper = true;
20136  }
20137  }
20138  }
20139  ++it;
20140  }
20141 
20142  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
20143  return range;
20144 }

20226 QCPBarsGroup::QCPBarsGroup(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
20227  : QObject(parentPlot), mParentPlot(parentPlot), mSpacingType(stAbsolute),
20228  mSpacing(4) {}
20229 
20230 QCPBarsGroup::~QCPBarsGroup() { clear(); }
20231 
20240 void QCPBarsGroup::setSpacingType(SpacingType spacingType) {
20241  mSpacingType = spacingType;
20242 }
20243 
20252 void QCPBarsGroup::setSpacing(double spacing) { mSpacing = spacing; }
20253 
20261 QCPBars *QCPBarsGroup::bars(int index) const {
20262  if (index >= 0 && index < mBars.size()) {
20263  return mBars.at(index);
20264  } else {
20265  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
20266  return 0;
20267  }
20268 }
20269 
20275 void QCPBarsGroup::clear() {
20276  foreach (
20277  QCPBars *bars,
20278  mBars) // since foreach takes a copy, removing bars in the loop is okay
20279  bars->setBarsGroup(0); // removes itself via removeBars
20280 }
20281 
20289 void QCPBarsGroup::append(QCPBars *bars) {
20290  if (!bars) {
20291  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "bars is 0";
20292  return;
20293  }
20294 
20295  if (!mBars.contains(bars))
20296  bars->setBarsGroup(this);
20297  else
20298  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "bars plottable is already in this bars group:"
20299  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(bars);
20300 }
20301 
20313 void QCPBarsGroup::insert(int i, QCPBars *bars) {
20314  if (!bars) {
20315  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "bars is 0";
20316  return;
20317  }
20318 
20319  // first append to bars list normally:
20320  if (!mBars.contains(bars))
20321  bars->setBarsGroup(this);
20322  // then move to according position:
20323  mBars.move(mBars.indexOf(bars), qBound(0, i, mBars.size() - 1));
20324 }
20325 
20331 void QCPBarsGroup::remove(QCPBars *bars) {
20332  if (!bars) {
20333  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "bars is 0";
20334  return;
20335  }
20336 
20337  if (mBars.contains(bars))
20338  bars->setBarsGroup(0);
20339  else
20340  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "bars plottable is not in this bars group:"
20341  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(bars);
20342 }
20343 
20352 void QCPBarsGroup::registerBars(QCPBars *bars) {
20353  if (!mBars.contains(bars))
20354  mBars.append(bars);
20355 }
20356 
20365 void QCPBarsGroup::unregisterBars(QCPBars *bars) { mBars.removeOne(bars); }
20366 
20375 double QCPBarsGroup::keyPixelOffset(const QCPBars *bars, double keyCoord) {
20376  // find list of all base bars in case some mBars are stacked:
20377  QList<const QCPBars *> baseBars;
20378  foreach (const QCPBars *b, mBars) {
20379  while (b->barBelow())
20380  b = b->barBelow();
20381  if (!baseBars.contains(b))
20382  baseBars.append(b);
20383  }
20384  // find base bar this "bars" is stacked on:
20385  const QCPBars *thisBase = bars;
20386  while (thisBase->barBelow())
20387  thisBase = thisBase->barBelow();
20388 
20389  // determine key pixel offset of this base bars considering all other base
20390  // bars in this barsgroup:
20391  double result = 0;
20392  int index = baseBars.indexOf(thisBase);
20393  if (index >= 0) {
20394  int startIndex;
20395  double lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth;
20396  if (baseBars.size() % 2 == 1 &&
20397  index ==
20398  (baseBars.size() - 1) /
20399  2) // is center bar (int division on purpose)
20400  {
20401  return result;
20402  } else if (index <
20403  (baseBars.size() - 1) / 2.0) // bar is to the left of center
20404  {
20405  if (baseBars.size() % 2 == 0) // even number of bars
20406  {
20407  startIndex = baseBars.size() / 2 - 1;
20408  result -= getPixelSpacing(baseBars.at(startIndex), keyCoord) *
20409  0.5; // half of middle spacing
20410  } else // uneven number of bars
20411  {
20412  startIndex = (baseBars.size() - 1) / 2 - 1;
20413  baseBars.at((baseBars.size() - 1) / 2)
20414  ->getPixelWidth(keyCoord, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
20415  result -=
20416  qAbs(upperPixelWidth - lowerPixelWidth) * 0.5; // half of center bar
20417  result -= getPixelSpacing(baseBars.at((baseBars.size() - 1) / 2),
20418  keyCoord); // center bar spacing
20419  }
20420  for (
20421  int i = startIndex; i > index;
20422  --i) // add widths and spacings of bars in between center and our bars
20423  {
20424  baseBars.at(i)
20425  ->getPixelWidth(keyCoord, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
20426  result -= qAbs(upperPixelWidth - lowerPixelWidth);
20427  result -= getPixelSpacing(baseBars.at(i), keyCoord);
20428  }
20429  // finally half of our bars width:
20430  baseBars.at(index)
20431  ->getPixelWidth(keyCoord, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
20432  result -= qAbs(upperPixelWidth - lowerPixelWidth) * 0.5;
20433  } else // bar is to the right of center
20434  {
20435  if (baseBars.size() % 2 == 0) // even number of bars
20436  {
20437  startIndex = baseBars.size() / 2;
20438  result += getPixelSpacing(baseBars.at(startIndex), keyCoord) *
20439  0.5; // half of middle spacing
20440  } else // uneven number of bars
20441  {
20442  startIndex = (baseBars.size() - 1) / 2 + 1;
20443  baseBars.at((baseBars.size() - 1) / 2)
20444  ->getPixelWidth(keyCoord, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
20445  result +=
20446  qAbs(upperPixelWidth - lowerPixelWidth) * 0.5; // half of center bar
20447  result += getPixelSpacing(baseBars.at((baseBars.size() - 1) / 2),
20448  keyCoord); // center bar spacing
20449  }
20450  for (
20451  int i = startIndex; i < index;
20452  ++i) // add widths and spacings of bars in between center and our bars
20453  {
20454  baseBars.at(i)
20455  ->getPixelWidth(keyCoord, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
20456  result += qAbs(upperPixelWidth - lowerPixelWidth);
20457  result += getPixelSpacing(baseBars.at(i), keyCoord);
20458  }
20459  // finally half of our bars width:
20460  baseBars.at(index)
20461  ->getPixelWidth(keyCoord, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
20462  result += qAbs(upperPixelWidth - lowerPixelWidth) * 0.5;
20463  }
20464  }
20465  return result;
20466 }
20467 
20482 double QCPBarsGroup::getPixelSpacing(const QCPBars *bars, double keyCoord) {
20483  switch (mSpacingType) {
20484  case stAbsolute: {
20485  return mSpacing;
20486  }
20487  case stAxisRectRatio: {
20488  if (bars->keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
20489  return bars->keyAxis()->axisRect()->width() * mSpacing;
20490  else
20491  return bars->keyAxis()->axisRect()->height() * mSpacing;
20492  }
20493  case stPlotCoords: {
20494  double keyPixel = bars->keyAxis()->coordToPixel(keyCoord);
20495  return bars->keyAxis()->coordToPixel(keyCoord + mSpacing) - keyPixel;
20496  }
20497  }
20498  return 0;
20499 }
20500 
20504 
20520 QCPBarData::QCPBarData() : key(0), value(0) {}
20521 
20525 QCPBarData::QCPBarData(double key, double value) : key(key), value(value) {}
20526 
20530 
20572 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
20573 
20588 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
20589 
20603 QCPBars::QCPBars(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
20604  : QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis), mData(new QCPBarDataMap),
20605  mWidth(0.75), mWidthType(wtPlotCoords), mBarsGroup(0), mBaseValue(0) {
20606  // modify inherited properties from abstract plottable:
20607  mPen.setColor(Qt::blue);
20608  mPen.setStyle(Qt::SolidLine);
20609  mBrush.setColor(QColor(40, 50, 255, 30));
20610  mBrush.setStyle(Qt::SolidPattern);
20611  mSelectedPen = mPen;
20612  mSelectedPen.setWidthF(2.5);
20613  mSelectedPen.setColor(QColor(80, 80, 255)); // lighter than Qt::blue of mPen
20614  mSelectedBrush = mBrush;
20615 }
20616 
20617 QCPBars::~QCPBars() {
20618  setBarsGroup(0);
20619  if (mBarBelow || mBarAbove)
20620  connectBars(mBarBelow.data(),
20621  mBarAbove.data()); // take this bar out of any stacking
20622  delete mData;
20623 }
20624 
20633 void QCPBars::setWidth(double width) { mWidth = width; }
20634 
20644 void QCPBars::setWidthType(QCPBars::WidthType widthType) {
20645  mWidthType = widthType;
20646 }
20647 
20655 void QCPBars::setBarsGroup(QCPBarsGroup *barsGroup) {
20656  // deregister at old group:
20657  if (mBarsGroup)
20658  mBarsGroup->unregisterBars(this);
20659  mBarsGroup = barsGroup;
20660  // register at new group:
20661  if (mBarsGroup)
20662  mBarsGroup->registerBars(this);
20663 }
20664 
20680 void QCPBars::setBaseValue(double baseValue) { mBaseValue = baseValue; }
20681 
20691 void QCPBars::setData(QCPBarDataMap *data, bool copy) {
20692  if (mData == data) {
20693  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
20694  << "The data pointer is already in (and owned by) this plottable"
20695  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(data);
20696  return;
20697  }
20698  if (copy) {
20699  *mData = *data;
20700  } else {
20701  delete mData;
20702  mData = data;
20703  }
20704 }
20705 
20714 void QCPBars::setData(const QVector<double> &key,
20715  const QVector<double> &value) {
20716  mData->clear();
20717  int n = key.size();
20718  n = qMin(n, value.size());
20719  QCPBarData newData;
20720  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
20721  newData.key = key[i];
20722  newData.value = value[i];
20723  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
20724  }
20725 }
20726 
20746 void QCPBars::moveBelow(QCPBars *bars) {
20747  if (bars == this)
20748  return;
20749  if (bars && (bars->keyAxis() != mKeyAxis.data() ||
20750  bars->valueAxis() != mValueAxis.data())) {
20751  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed QCPBars* doesn't have same key and "
20752  "value axis as this QCPBars";
20753  return;
20754  }
20755  // remove from stacking:
20756  connectBars(
20757  mBarBelow.data(),
20758  mBarAbove.data()); // Note: also works if one (or both) of them is 0
20759  // if new bar given, insert this bar below it:
20760  if (bars) {
20761  if (bars->mBarBelow)
20762  connectBars(bars->mBarBelow.data(), this);
20763  connectBars(this, bars);
20764  }
20765 }
20766 
20786 void QCPBars::moveAbove(QCPBars *bars) {
20787  if (bars == this)
20788  return;
20789  if (bars && (bars->keyAxis() != mKeyAxis.data() ||
20790  bars->valueAxis() != mValueAxis.data())) {
20791  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed QCPBars* doesn't have same key and "
20792  "value axis as this QCPBars";
20793  return;
20794  }
20795  // remove from stacking:
20796  connectBars(
20797  mBarBelow.data(),
20798  mBarAbove.data()); // Note: also works if one (or both) of them is 0
20799  // if new bar given, insert this bar above it:
20800  if (bars) {
20801  if (bars->mBarAbove)
20802  connectBars(this, bars->mBarAbove.data());
20803  connectBars(bars, this);
20804  }
20805 }
20806 
20811 void QCPBars::addData(const QCPBarDataMap &dataMap) { mData->unite(dataMap); }
20812 
20817 void QCPBars::addData(const QCPBarData &data) {
20818  mData->insertMulti(data.key, data);
20819 }
20820 
20826 void QCPBars::addData(double key, double value) {
20827  QCPBarData newData;
20828  newData.key = key;
20829  newData.value = value;
20830  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
20831 }
20832 
20838 void QCPBars::addData(const QVector<double> &keys,
20839  const QVector<double> &values) {
20840  int n = keys.size();
20841  n = qMin(n, values.size());
20842  QCPBarData newData;
20843  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
20844  newData.key = keys[i];
20845  newData.value = values[i];
20846  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
20847  }
20848 }
20849 
20854 void QCPBars::removeDataBefore(double key) {
20855  QCPBarDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
20856  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
20857  it = mData->erase(it);
20858 }
20859 
20864 void QCPBars::removeDataAfter(double key) {
20865  if (mData->isEmpty())
20866  return;
20867  QCPBarDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
20868  while (it != mData->end())
20869  it = mData->erase(it);
20870 }
20871 
20881 void QCPBars::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey) {
20882  if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty())
20883  return;
20884  QCPBarDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
20885  QCPBarDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
20886  while (it != itEnd)
20887  it = mData->erase(it);
20888 }
20889 
20901 void QCPBars::removeData(double key) { mData->remove(key); }
20902 
20907 void QCPBars::clearData() { mData->clear(); }
20908 
20909 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20910 double QCPBars::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
20911  QVariant *details) const {
20912  Q_UNUSED(details)
20913  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
20914  return -1;
20915  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) {
20916  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
20917  return -1;
20918  }
20919 
20920  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint())) {
20921  QCPBarDataMap::ConstIterator it;
20922  for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it) {
20923  if (getBarPolygon(it.value().key, it.value().value)
20924  .boundingRect()
20925  .contains(pos))
20926  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
20927  }
20928  }
20929  return -1;
20930 }
20931 
20932 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20933 void QCPBars::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
20934  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) {
20935  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
20936  return;
20937  }
20938  if (mData->isEmpty())
20939  return;
20940 
20941  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it, lower, upperEnd;
20942  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upperEnd);
20943  for (it = lower; it != upperEnd; ++it) {
20944 // check data validity if flag set:
20945 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
20946  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().key, it.value().value))
20947  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << it.key()
20948  << "of drawn range invalid."
20949  << "Plottable name:" << name();
20950 #endif
20951  QPolygonF barPolygon = getBarPolygon(it.key(), it.value().value);
20952  // draw bar fill:
20953  if (mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush &&
20954  mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0) {
20955  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
20956  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
20957  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
20958  painter->drawPolygon(barPolygon);
20959  }
20960  // draw bar line:
20961  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0) {
20962  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
20963  painter->setPen(mainPen());
20964  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20965  painter->drawPolyline(barPolygon);
20966  }
20967  }
20968 }
20969 
20970 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20971 void QCPBars::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const {
20972  // draw filled rect:
20973  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
20974  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
20975  painter->setPen(mPen);
20976  QRectF r = QRectF(0, 0, rect.width() * 0.67, rect.height() * 0.67);
20977  r.moveCenter(rect.center());
20978  painter->drawRect(r);
20979 }
20980 
21001 void QCPBars::getVisibleDataBounds(
21002  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator &lower,
21003  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator &upperEnd) const {
21004  if (!mKeyAxis) {
21005  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis";
21006  return;
21007  }
21008  if (mData->isEmpty()) {
21009  lower = mData->constEnd();
21010  upperEnd = mData->constEnd();
21011  return;
21012  }
21013 
21014  // get visible data range as QMap iterators
21015  lower = mData->lowerBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower);
21016  upperEnd = mData->upperBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper);
21017  double lowerPixelBound =
21018  mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower);
21019  double upperPixelBound =
21020  mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper);
21021  bool isVisible = false;
21022  // walk left from lbound to find lower bar that actually is completely outside
21023  // visible pixel range:
21024  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
21025  while (it != mData->constBegin()) {
21026  --it;
21027  QRectF barBounds =
21028  getBarPolygon(it.value().key, it.value().value).boundingRect();
21029  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21030  isVisible = ((!mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
21031  barBounds.right() >= lowerPixelBound) ||
21032  (mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
21033  barBounds.left() <= lowerPixelBound));
21034  else // keyaxis is vertical
21035  isVisible = ((!mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
21036  barBounds.top() <= lowerPixelBound) ||
21037  (mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
21038  barBounds.bottom() >= lowerPixelBound));
21039  if (isVisible)
21040  lower = it;
21041  else
21042  break;
21043  }
21044  // walk right from ubound to find upper bar that actually is completely
21045  // outside visible pixel range:
21046  it = upperEnd;
21047  while (it != mData->constEnd()) {
21048  QRectF barBounds = getBarPolygon(upperEnd.value().key,
21049  upperEnd.value().value).boundingRect();
21050  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21051  isVisible = ((!mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
21052  barBounds.left() <= upperPixelBound) ||
21053  (mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
21054  barBounds.right() >= upperPixelBound));
21055  else // keyaxis is vertical
21056  isVisible = ((!mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
21057  barBounds.bottom() >= upperPixelBound) ||
21058  (mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() &&
21059  barBounds.top() <= upperPixelBound));
21060  if (isVisible)
21061  upperEnd = it + 1;
21062  else
21063  break;
21064  ++it;
21065  }
21066 }
21067 
21076 QPolygonF QCPBars::getBarPolygon(double key, double value) const {
21077  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
21078  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
21079  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
21080  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
21081  return QPolygonF();
21082  }
21083 
21084  QPolygonF result;
21085  double lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth;
21086  getPixelWidth(key, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
21087  double base = getStackedBaseValue(key, value >= 0);
21088  double basePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(base);
21089  double valuePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(base + value);
21090  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
21091  if (mBarsGroup)
21092  keyPixel += mBarsGroup->keyPixelOffset(this, key);
21093  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
21094  result << QPointF(keyPixel + lowerPixelWidth, basePixel);
21095  result << QPointF(keyPixel + lowerPixelWidth, valuePixel);
21096  result << QPointF(keyPixel + upperPixelWidth, valuePixel);
21097  result << QPointF(keyPixel + upperPixelWidth, basePixel);
21098  } else {
21099  result << QPointF(basePixel, keyPixel + lowerPixelWidth);
21100  result << QPointF(valuePixel, keyPixel + lowerPixelWidth);
21101  result << QPointF(valuePixel, keyPixel + upperPixelWidth);
21102  result << QPointF(basePixel, keyPixel + upperPixelWidth);
21103  }
21104  return result;
21105 }
21106 
21119 void QCPBars::getPixelWidth(double key, double &lower, double &upper) const {
21120  switch (mWidthType) {
21121  case wtAbsolute: {
21122  upper = mWidth * 0.5;
21123  lower = -upper;
21124  if (mKeyAxis && (mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() ^
21125  (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)))
21126  qSwap(lower, upper);
21127  break;
21128  }
21129  case wtAxisRectRatio: {
21130  if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()) {
21131  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21132  upper = mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->width() * mWidth * 0.5;
21133  else
21134  upper = mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->height() * mWidth * 0.5;
21135  lower = -upper;
21136  if (mKeyAxis && (mKeyAxis.data()->rangeReversed() ^
21137  (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)))
21138  qSwap(lower, upper);
21139  } else
21140  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No key axis or axis rect defined";
21141  break;
21142  }
21143  case wtPlotCoords: {
21144  if (mKeyAxis) {
21145  double keyPixel = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(key);
21146  upper = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(key + mWidth * 0.5) - keyPixel;
21147  lower = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(key - mWidth * 0.5) - keyPixel;
21148  // no need to qSwap(lower, higher) when range reversed, because
21149  // higher/lower are gained by
21150  // coordinate transform which includes range direction
21151  } else
21152  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No key axis defined";
21153  break;
21154  }
21155  }
21156 }
21157 
21170 double QCPBars::getStackedBaseValue(double key, bool positive) const {
21171  if (mBarBelow) {
21172  double max = 0; // don't use mBaseValue here because only base value of
21173  // bottom-most bar has meaning in a bar stack
21174  // find bars of mBarBelow that are approximately at key and find largest
21175  // one:
21176  double epsilon =
21177  qAbs(key) *
21178  1e-6; // should be safe even when changed to use float at some point
21179  if (key == 0)
21180  epsilon = 1e-6;
21181  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it =
21182  mBarBelow.data()->mData->lowerBound(key - epsilon);
21183  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator itEnd =
21184  mBarBelow.data()->mData->upperBound(key + epsilon);
21185  while (it != itEnd) {
21186  if ((positive && it.value().value > max) ||
21187  (!positive && it.value().value < max))
21188  max = it.value().value;
21189  ++it;
21190  }
21191  // recurse down the bar-stack to find the total height:
21192  return max + mBarBelow.data()->getStackedBaseValue(key, positive);
21193  } else
21194  return mBaseValue;
21195 }
21196 
21206 void QCPBars::connectBars(QCPBars *lower, QCPBars *upper) {
21207  if (!lower && !upper)
21208  return;
21209 
21210  if (!lower) // disconnect upper at bottom
21211  {
21212  // disconnect old bar below upper:
21213  if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.data() == upper)
21214  upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove = 0;
21215  upper->mBarBelow = 0;
21216  } else if (!upper) // disconnect lower at top
21217  {
21218  // disconnect old bar above lower:
21219  if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.data() == lower)
21220  lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow = 0;
21221  lower->mBarAbove = 0;
21222  } else // connect lower and upper
21223  {
21224  // disconnect old bar above lower:
21225  if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.data() == lower)
21226  lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow = 0;
21227  // disconnect old bar below upper:
21228  if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.data() == upper)
21229  upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove = 0;
21230  lower->mBarAbove = upper;
21231  upper->mBarBelow = lower;
21232  }
21233 }
21234 
21235 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21236 QCPRange QCPBars::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const {
21237  QCPRange range;
21238  bool haveLower = false;
21239  bool haveUpper = false;
21240 
21241  double current;
21242  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
21243  while (it != mData->constEnd()) {
21244  current = it.value().key;
21245  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) ||
21246  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0)) {
21247  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower) {
21248  range.lower = current;
21249  haveLower = true;
21250  }
21251  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper) {
21252  range.upper = current;
21253  haveUpper = true;
21254  }
21255  }
21256  ++it;
21257  }
21258  // determine exact range of bars by including bar width and barsgroup offset:
21259  if (haveLower && mKeyAxis) {
21260  double lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth, keyPixel;
21261  getPixelWidth(range.lower, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
21262  keyPixel = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(range.lower) + lowerPixelWidth;
21263  if (mBarsGroup)
21264  keyPixel += mBarsGroup->keyPixelOffset(this, range.lower);
21265  range.lower = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(keyPixel);
21266  }
21267  if (haveUpper && mKeyAxis) {
21268  double lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth, keyPixel;
21269  getPixelWidth(range.upper, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
21270  keyPixel = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(range.upper) + upperPixelWidth;
21271  if (mBarsGroup)
21272  keyPixel += mBarsGroup->keyPixelOffset(this, range.upper);
21273  range.upper = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(keyPixel);
21274  }
21275  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
21276  return range;
21277 }
21278 
21279 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21280 QCPRange QCPBars::getValueRange(bool &foundRange,
21281  SignDomain inSignDomain) const {
21282  QCPRange range;
21283  range.lower = mBaseValue;
21284  range.upper = mBaseValue;
21285  bool haveLower = true; // set to true, because baseValue should always be
21286  // visible in bar charts
21287  bool haveUpper = true; // set to true, because baseValue should always be
21288  // visible in bar charts
21289  double current;
21290 
21291  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
21292  while (it != mData->constEnd()) {
21293  current = it.value().value +
21294  getStackedBaseValue(it.value().key, it.value().value >= 0);
21295  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) ||
21296  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0)) {
21297  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower) {
21298  range.lower = current;
21299  haveLower = true;
21300  }
21301  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper) {
21302  range.upper = current;
21303  haveUpper = true;
21304  }
21305  }
21306  ++it;
21307  }
21308 
21309  foundRange =
21310  true; // return true because bar charts always have the 0-line visible
21311  return range;
21312 }
21313 
21317 
21385 QCPStatisticalBox::QCPStatisticalBox(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
21386  : QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis), mKey(0), mMinimum(0),
21387  mLowerQuartile(0), mMedian(0), mUpperQuartile(0), mMaximum(0) {
21388  setOutlierStyle(QCPScatterStyle(QCPScatterStyle::ssCircle, Qt::blue, 6));
21389  setWhiskerWidth(0.2);
21390  setWidth(0.5);
21391 
21392  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
21393  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2.5));
21394  setMedianPen(QPen(Qt::black, 3, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::FlatCap));
21395  setWhiskerPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::DashLine, Qt::FlatCap));
21396  setWhiskerBarPen(QPen(Qt::black));
21397  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
21398  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
21399 }
21400 
21404 void QCPStatisticalBox::setKey(double key) { mKey = key; }
21405 
21414 void QCPStatisticalBox::setMinimum(double value) { mMinimum = value; }
21415 
21425 void QCPStatisticalBox::setLowerQuartile(double value) {
21426  mLowerQuartile = value;
21427 }
21428 
21438 void QCPStatisticalBox::setMedian(double value) { mMedian = value; }
21439 
21449 void QCPStatisticalBox::setUpperQuartile(double value) {
21450  mUpperQuartile = value;
21451 }
21452 
21461 void QCPStatisticalBox::setMaximum(double value) { mMaximum = value; }
21462 
21472 void QCPStatisticalBox::setOutliers(const QVector<double> &values) {
21473  mOutliers = values;
21474 }
21475 
21482 void QCPStatisticalBox::setData(double key, double minimum,
21483  double lowerQuartile, double median,
21484  double upperQuartile, double maximum) {
21485  setKey(key);
21486  setMinimum(minimum);
21487  setLowerQuartile(lowerQuartile);
21488  setMedian(median);
21489  setUpperQuartile(upperQuartile);
21490  setMaximum(maximum);
21491 }
21492 
21498 void QCPStatisticalBox::setWidth(double width) { mWidth = width; }
21499 
21506 void QCPStatisticalBox::setWhiskerWidth(double width) { mWhiskerWidth = width; }
21507 
21518 void QCPStatisticalBox::setWhiskerPen(const QPen &pen) { mWhiskerPen = pen; }
21519 
21527 void QCPStatisticalBox::setWhiskerBarPen(const QPen &pen) {
21528  mWhiskerBarPen = pen;
21529 }
21530 
21535 void QCPStatisticalBox::setMedianPen(const QPen &pen) { mMedianPen = pen; }
21536 
21542 void QCPStatisticalBox::setOutlierStyle(const QCPScatterStyle &style) {
21543  mOutlierStyle = style;
21544 }
21545 
21546 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21547 void QCPStatisticalBox::clearData() {
21548  setOutliers(QVector<double>());
21549  setKey(0);
21550  setMinimum(0);
21551  setLowerQuartile(0);
21552  setMedian(0);
21553  setUpperQuartile(0);
21554  setMaximum(0);
21555 }
21556 
21557 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21558 double QCPStatisticalBox::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
21559  QVariant *details) const {
21560  Q_UNUSED(details)
21561  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
21562  return -1;
21563  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) {
21564  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
21565  return -1;
21566  }
21567 
21568  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint())) {
21569  double posKey, posValue;
21570  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
21571  // quartile box:
21572  QCPRange keyRange(mKey - mWidth * 0.5, mKey + mWidth * 0.5);
21573  QCPRange valueRange(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile);
21574  if (keyRange.contains(posKey) && valueRange.contains(posValue))
21575  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
21576 
21577  // min/max whiskers:
21578  if (QCPRange(mMinimum, mMaximum).contains(posValue))
21579  return qAbs(mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey) -
21580  mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(posKey));
21581  }
21582  return -1;
21583 }
21584 
21585 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21586 void QCPStatisticalBox::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
21587  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) {
21588  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
21589  return;
21590  }
21591 
21592 // check data validity if flag set:
21593 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
21594  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mKey, mMedian) ||
21595  QCP::isInvalidData(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile) ||
21596  QCP::isInvalidData(mMinimum, mMaximum))
21597  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << mKey
21598  << "of drawn range has invalid data."
21599  << "Plottable name:" << name();
21600  for (int i = 0; i < mOutliers.size(); ++i)
21601  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mOutliers.at(i)))
21602  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point outlier at" << mKey
21603  << "of drawn range invalid."
21604  << "Plottable name:" << name();
21605 #endif
21606 
21607  QRectF quartileBox;
21608  drawQuartileBox(painter, &quartileBox);
21609 
21610  painter->save();
21611  painter->setClipRect(quartileBox, Qt::IntersectClip);
21612  drawMedian(painter);
21613  painter->restore();
21614 
21615  drawWhiskers(painter);
21616  drawOutliers(painter);
21617 }
21618 
21619 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21620 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter,
21621  const QRectF &rect) const {
21622  // draw filled rect:
21623  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
21624  painter->setPen(mPen);
21625  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
21626  QRectF r = QRectF(0, 0, rect.width() * 0.67, rect.height() * 0.67);
21627  r.moveCenter(rect.center());
21628  painter->drawRect(r);
21629 }
21630 
21639 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawQuartileBox(QCPPainter *painter,
21640  QRectF *quartileBox) const {
21641  QRectF box;
21642  box.setTopLeft(coordsToPixels(mKey - mWidth * 0.5, mUpperQuartile));
21643  box.setBottomRight(coordsToPixels(mKey + mWidth * 0.5, mLowerQuartile));
21644  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
21645  painter->setPen(mainPen());
21646  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
21647  painter->drawRect(box);
21648  if (quartileBox)
21649  *quartileBox = box;
21650 }
21651 
21656 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawMedian(QCPPainter *painter) const {
21657  QLineF medianLine;
21658  medianLine.setP1(coordsToPixels(mKey - mWidth * 0.5, mMedian));
21659  medianLine.setP2(coordsToPixels(mKey + mWidth * 0.5, mMedian));
21660  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
21661  painter->setPen(mMedianPen);
21662  painter->drawLine(medianLine);
21663 }
21664 
21669 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawWhiskers(QCPPainter *painter) const {
21670  QLineF backboneMin, backboneMax, barMin, barMax;
21671  backboneMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mUpperQuartile),
21672  coordsToPixels(mKey, mMaximum));
21673  backboneMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mLowerQuartile),
21674  coordsToPixels(mKey, mMinimum));
21675  barMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey - mWhiskerWidth * 0.5, mMaximum),
21676  coordsToPixels(mKey + mWhiskerWidth * 0.5, mMaximum));
21677  barMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey - mWhiskerWidth * 0.5, mMinimum),
21678  coordsToPixels(mKey + mWhiskerWidth * 0.5, mMinimum));
21679  applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(painter);
21680  painter->setPen(mWhiskerPen);
21681  painter->drawLine(backboneMin);
21682  painter->drawLine(backboneMax);
21683  painter->setPen(mWhiskerBarPen);
21684  painter->drawLine(barMin);
21685  painter->drawLine(barMax);
21686 }
21687 
21692 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawOutliers(QCPPainter *painter) const {
21693  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
21694  mOutlierStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
21695  for (int i = 0; i < mOutliers.size(); ++i)
21696  mOutlierStyle.drawShape(painter, coordsToPixels(mKey, mOutliers.at(i)));
21697 }
21698 
21699 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21700 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange,
21701  SignDomain inSignDomain) const {
21702  foundRange = true;
21703  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth) {
21704  return QCPRange(mKey - mWidth * 0.5, mKey + mWidth * 0.5);
21705  } else if (inSignDomain == sdNegative) {
21706  if (mKey + mWidth * 0.5 < 0)
21707  return QCPRange(mKey - mWidth * 0.5, mKey + mWidth * 0.5);
21708  else if (mKey < 0)
21709  return QCPRange(mKey - mWidth * 0.5, mKey);
21710  else {
21711  foundRange = false;
21712  return QCPRange();
21713  }
21714  } else if (inSignDomain == sdPositive) {
21715  if (mKey - mWidth * 0.5 > 0)
21716  return QCPRange(mKey - mWidth * 0.5, mKey + mWidth * 0.5);
21717  else if (mKey > 0)
21718  return QCPRange(mKey, mKey + mWidth * 0.5);
21719  else {
21720  foundRange = false;
21721  return QCPRange();
21722  }
21723  }
21724  foundRange = false;
21725  return QCPRange();
21726 }
21727 
21728 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21729 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getValueRange(bool &foundRange,
21730  SignDomain inSignDomain) const {
21731  QVector<double> values; // values that must be considered (i.e. all outliers
21732  // and the five box-parameters)
21733  values.reserve(mOutliers.size() + 5);
21734  values << mMaximum << mUpperQuartile << mMedian << mLowerQuartile << mMinimum;
21735  values << mOutliers;
21736  // go through values and find the ones in legal range:
21737  bool haveUpper = false;
21738  bool haveLower = false;
21739  double upper = 0;
21740  double lower = 0;
21741  for (int i = 0; i < values.size(); ++i) {
21742  if ((inSignDomain == sdNegative && values.at(i) < 0) ||
21743  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && values.at(i) > 0) ||
21744  (inSignDomain == sdBoth)) {
21745  if (values.at(i) > upper || !haveUpper) {
21746  upper = values.at(i);
21747  haveUpper = true;
21748  }
21749  if (values.at(i) < lower || !haveLower) {
21750  lower = values.at(i);
21751  haveLower = true;
21752  }
21753  }
21754  }
21755  // return the bounds if we found some sensible values:
21756  if (haveLower && haveUpper) {
21757  foundRange = true;
21758  return QCPRange(lower, upper);
21759  } else // might happen if all values are in other sign domain
21760  {
21761  foundRange = false;
21762  return QCPRange();
21763  }
21764 }
21765 
21769 
21814 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
21815 
21823 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
21824 
21834 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(int keySize, int valueSize,
21835  const QCPRange &keyRange,
21836  const QCPRange &valueRange)
21837  : mKeySize(0), mValueSize(0), mKeyRange(keyRange), mValueRange(valueRange),
21838  mIsEmpty(true), mData(0), mDataModified(true) {
21839  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
21840  fill(0);
21841 }
21842 
21843 QCPColorMapData::~QCPColorMapData() {
21844  if (mData)
21845  delete[] mData;
21846 }
21847 
21852 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(const QCPColorMapData &other)
21853  : mKeySize(0), mValueSize(0), mIsEmpty(true), mData(0),
21854  mDataModified(true) {
21855  *this = other;
21856 }
21857 
21861 QCPColorMapData &QCPColorMapData::operator=(const QCPColorMapData &other) {
21862  if (&other != this) {
21863  const int keySize = other.keySize();
21864  const int valueSize = other.valueSize();
21865  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
21866  setRange(other.keyRange(), other.valueRange());
21867  if (!mIsEmpty)
21868  memcpy(mData, other.mData, sizeof(mData[0]) * keySize * valueSize);
21869  mDataBounds = other.mDataBounds;
21870  mDataModified = true;
21871  }
21872  return *this;
21873 }
21874 
21875 /* undocumented getter */
21876 double QCPColorMapData::data(double key, double value) {
21877  int keyCell = (key - mKeyRange.lower) / (mKeyRange.upper - mKeyRange.lower) *
21878  (mKeySize - 1) +
21879  0.5;
21880  int valueCell = (value - mValueRange.lower) /
21881  (mValueRange.upper - mValueRange.lower) *
21882  (mValueSize - 1) +
21883  0.5;
21884  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 &&
21885  valueCell < mValueSize)
21886  return mData[valueCell * mKeySize + keyCell];
21887  else
21888  return 0;
21889 }
21890 
21891 /* undocumented getter */
21892 double QCPColorMapData::cell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex) {
21893  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 &&
21894  valueIndex < mValueSize)
21895  return mData[valueIndex * mKeySize + keyIndex];
21896  else
21897  return 0;
21898 }
21899 
21915 void QCPColorMapData::setSize(int keySize, int valueSize) {
21916  if (keySize != mKeySize || valueSize != mValueSize) {
21917  mKeySize = keySize;
21918  mValueSize = valueSize;
21919  if (mData)
21920  delete[] mData;
21921  mIsEmpty = mKeySize == 0 || mValueSize == 0;
21922  if (!mIsEmpty) {
21923 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
21924  try { // 2D arrays get memory intensive fast. So if the allocation fails,
21925  // at least output debug message
21926 #endif
21927  mData = new double[mKeySize * mValueSize];
21928 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
21929  } catch (...) {
21930  mData = 0;
21931  }
21932 #endif
21933  if (mData)
21934  fill(0);
21935  else
21936  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "out of memory for data dimensions "
21937  << mKeySize << "*" << mValueSize;
21938  } else
21939  mData = 0;
21940  mDataModified = true;
21941  }
21942 }
21943 
21956 void QCPColorMapData::setKeySize(int keySize) { setSize(keySize, mValueSize); }
21957 
21970 void QCPColorMapData::setValueSize(int valueSize) {
21971  setSize(mKeySize, valueSize);
21972 }
21973 
21987 void QCPColorMapData::setRange(const QCPRange &keyRange,
21988  const QCPRange &valueRange) {
21989  setKeyRange(keyRange);
21990  setValueRange(valueRange);
21991 }
21992 
22007 void QCPColorMapData::setKeyRange(const QCPRange &keyRange) {
22008  mKeyRange = keyRange;
22009 }
22010 
22025 void QCPColorMapData::setValueRange(const QCPRange &valueRange) {
22026  mValueRange = valueRange;
22027 }
22028 
22045 void QCPColorMapData::setData(double key, double value, double z) {
22046  int keyCell = (key - mKeyRange.lower) / (mKeyRange.upper - mKeyRange.lower) *
22047  (mKeySize - 1) +
22048  0.5;
22049  int valueCell = (value - mValueRange.lower) /
22050  (mValueRange.upper - mValueRange.lower) *
22051  (mValueSize - 1) +
22052  0.5;
22053  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 &&
22054  valueCell < mValueSize) {
22055  mData[valueCell * mKeySize + keyCell] = z;
22056  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
22057  mDataBounds.lower = z;
22058  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
22059  mDataBounds.upper = z;
22060  mDataModified = true;
22061  }
22062 }
22063 
22079 void QCPColorMapData::setCell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double z) {
22080  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 &&
22081  valueIndex < mValueSize) {
22082  mData[valueIndex * mKeySize + keyIndex] = z;
22083  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
22084  mDataBounds.lower = z;
22085  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
22086  mDataBounds.upper = z;
22087  mDataModified = true;
22088  }
22089 }
22090 
22111 void QCPColorMapData::recalculateDataBounds() {
22112  if (mKeySize > 0 && mValueSize > 0) {
22113  double minHeight = mData[0];
22114  double maxHeight = mData[0];
22115  const int dataCount = mValueSize * mKeySize;
22116  for (int i = 0; i < dataCount; ++i) {
22117  if (mData[i] > maxHeight)
22118  maxHeight = mData[i];
22119  if (mData[i] < minHeight)
22120  minHeight = mData[i];
22121  }
22122  mDataBounds.lower = minHeight;
22123  mDataBounds.upper = maxHeight;
22124  }
22125 }
22126 
22132 void QCPColorMapData::clear() { setSize(0, 0); }
22133 
22137 void QCPColorMapData::fill(double z) {
22138  const int dataCount = mValueSize * mKeySize;
22139  for (int i = 0; i < dataCount; ++i)
22140  mData[i] = z;
22141  mDataBounds = QCPRange(z, z);
22142  mDataModified = true;
22143 }
22144 
22169 void QCPColorMapData::coordToCell(double key, double value, int *keyIndex,
22170  int *valueIndex) const {
22171  if (keyIndex)
22172  *keyIndex = (key - mKeyRange.lower) / (mKeyRange.upper - mKeyRange.lower) *
22173  (mKeySize - 1) +
22174  0.5;
22175  if (valueIndex)
22176  *valueIndex = (value - mValueRange.lower) /
22177  (mValueRange.upper - mValueRange.lower) *
22178  (mValueSize - 1) +
22179  0.5;
22180 }
22181 
22203 void QCPColorMapData::cellToCoord(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double *key,
22204  double *value) const {
22205  if (key)
22206  *key = keyIndex / (double)(mKeySize - 1) *
22207  (mKeyRange.upper - mKeyRange.lower) +
22208  mKeyRange.lower;
22209  if (value)
22210  *value = valueIndex / (double)(mValueSize - 1) *
22211  (mValueRange.upper - mValueRange.lower) +
22212  mValueRange.lower;
22213 }
