22301 
22311 /* end documentation of inline functions */
22312 
22313 /* start documentation of signals */
22314 
22336 /* end documentation of signals */
22337 
22345 QCPColorMap::QCPColorMap(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
22346  : QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
22347  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear),
22348  mMapData(new QCPColorMapData(10, 10, QCPRange(0, 5), QCPRange(0, 5))),
22349  mInterpolate(true), mTightBoundary(false), mMapImageInvalidated(true) {}
22350 
22351 QCPColorMap::~QCPColorMap() { delete mMapData; }
22352 
22362 void QCPColorMap::setData(QCPColorMapData *data, bool copy) {
22363  if (mMapData == data) {
22364  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
22365  << "The data pointer is already in (and owned by) this plottable"
22366  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(data);
22367  return;
22368  }
22369  if (copy) {
22370  *mMapData = *data;
22371  } else {
22372  delete mMapData;
22373  mMapData = data;
22374  }
22375  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
22376 }
22377 
22388 void QCPColorMap::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange) {
22389  if (!QCPRange::validRange(dataRange))
22390  return;
22391  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower ||
22392  mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper) {
22393  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
22394  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
22395  else
22396  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
22397  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
22398  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
22399  }
22400 }
22401 
22408 void QCPColorMap::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType) {
22409  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType) {
22410  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
22411  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
22412  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
22413  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
22414  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
22415  }
22416 }
22417 
22433 void QCPColorMap::setGradient(const QCPColorGradient &gradient) {
22434  if (mGradient != gradient) {
22435  mGradient = gradient;
22436  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
22437  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
22438  }
22439 }
22440 
22449 void QCPColorMap::setInterpolate(bool enabled) {
22450  mInterpolate = enabled;
22451  mMapImageInvalidated =
22452  true; // because oversampling factors might need to change
22453 }
22454 
22473 void QCPColorMap::setTightBoundary(bool enabled) { mTightBoundary = enabled; }
22474 
22495 void QCPColorMap::setColorScale(QCPColorScale *colorScale) {
22496  if (mColorScale) // unconnect signals from old color scale
22497  {
22498  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(),
22499  SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
22500  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)),
22501  mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
22502  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)),
22503  mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
22504  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this,
22505  SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
22506  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)),
22507  this, SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
22508  disconnect(mColorScale.data(),
22509  SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this,
22510  SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
22511  }
22512  mColorScale = colorScale;
22513  if (mColorScale) // connect signals to new color scale
22514  {
22515  setGradient(mColorScale.data()->gradient());
22516  setDataRange(mColorScale.data()->dataRange());
22517  setDataScaleType(mColorScale.data()->dataScaleType());
22518  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(),
22519  SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
22520  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)),
22521  mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
22522  connect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), mColorScale.data(),
22523  SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
22524  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this,
22525  SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
22526  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), this,
22527  SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
22528  connect(mColorScale.data(),
22529  SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this,
22530  SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
22531  }
22532 }
22533 
22566 void QCPColorMap::rescaleDataRange(bool recalculateDataBounds) {
22567  if (recalculateDataBounds)
22568  mMapData->recalculateDataBounds();
22569  setDataRange(mMapData->dataBounds());
22570 }
22571 
22592 void QCPColorMap::updateLegendIcon(Qt::TransformationMode transformMode,
22593  const QSize &thumbSize) {
22594  if (mMapImage.isNull() && !data()->isEmpty())
22595  updateMapImage(); // try to update map image if it's null (happens if no
22596  // draw has happened yet)
22597 
22598  if (!mMapImage.isNull()) // might still be null, e.g. if data is empty, so
22599  // check here again
22600  {
22601  bool mirrorX =
22602  (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())
22603  ->rangeReversed();
22604  bool mirrorY =
22605  (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())
22606  ->rangeReversed();
22607  mLegendIcon = QPixmap::fromImage(mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY))
22608  .scaled(thumbSize, Qt::KeepAspectRatio, transformMode);
22609  }
22610 }
22611 
22617 void QCPColorMap::clearData() { mMapData->clear(); }
22618 
22619 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22620 double QCPColorMap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
22621  QVariant *details) const {
22622  Q_UNUSED(details)
22623  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22624  return -1;
22625  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) {
22626  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
22627  return -1;
22628  }
22629 
22630  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint())) {
22631  double posKey, posValue;
22632  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
22633  if (mMapData->keyRange().contains(posKey) &&
22634  mMapData->valueRange().contains(posValue))
22635  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
22636  }
22637  return -1;
22638 }
22639 
22661 void QCPColorMap::updateMapImage() {
22662  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
22663  if (!keyAxis)
22664  return;
22665  if (mMapData->isEmpty())
22666  return;
22667 
22668  const int keySize = mMapData->keySize();
22669  const int valueSize = mMapData->valueSize();
22670  int keyOversamplingFactor =
22671  mInterpolate
22672  ? 1
22673  : (int)(1.0 + 100.0 / (double)keySize); // make mMapImage have at
22674  // least size 100, factor
22675  // becomes 1 if size > 200 or
22676  // interpolation is on
22677  int valueOversamplingFactor =
22678  mInterpolate
22679  ? 1
22680  : (int)(1.0 + 100.0 / (double)valueSize); // make mMapImage have at
22681  // least size 100, factor
22682  // becomes 1 if size > 200
22683  // or interpolation is on
22684 
22685  // resize mMapImage to correct dimensions including possible oversampling
22686  // factors, according to key/value axes orientation:
22687  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal &&
22688  (mMapImage.width() != keySize * keyOversamplingFactor ||
22689  mMapImage.height() != valueSize * valueOversamplingFactor))
22690  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(keySize * keyOversamplingFactor,
22691  valueSize * valueOversamplingFactor),
22692  QImage::Format_RGB32);
22693  else if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical &&
22694  (mMapImage.width() != valueSize * valueOversamplingFactor ||
22695  mMapImage.height() != keySize * keyOversamplingFactor))
22696  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(valueSize * valueOversamplingFactor,
22697  keySize * keyOversamplingFactor),
22698  QImage::Format_RGB32);
22699 
22700  QImage *localMapImage = &mMapImage; // this is the image on which the
22701  // colorization operates. Either the final
22702  // mMapImage, or if we need oversampling,
22703  // mUndersampledMapImage
22704  if (keyOversamplingFactor > 1 || valueOversamplingFactor > 1) {
22705  // resize undersampled map image to actual key/value cell sizes:
22706  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal &&
22707  (mUndersampledMapImage.width() != keySize ||
22708  mUndersampledMapImage.height() != valueSize))
22709  mUndersampledMapImage =
22710  QImage(QSize(keySize, valueSize), QImage::Format_RGB32);
22711  else if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical &&
22712  (mUndersampledMapImage.width() != valueSize ||
22713  mUndersampledMapImage.height() != keySize))
22714  mUndersampledMapImage =
22715  QImage(QSize(valueSize, keySize), QImage::Format_RGB32);
22716  localMapImage = &mUndersampledMapImage; // make the colorization run on the
22717  // undersampled image
22718  } else if (!mUndersampledMapImage.isNull())
22719  mUndersampledMapImage = QImage(); // don't need oversampling mechanism
22720  // anymore (map size has changed) but
22721  // mUndersampledMapImage still has nonzero
22722  // size, free it
22723 
22724  const double *rawData = mMapData->mData;
22725  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
22726  const int lineCount = valueSize;
22727  const int rowCount = keySize;
22728  for (int line = 0; line < lineCount; ++line) {
22729  QRgb *pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb *>(localMapImage->scanLine(
22730  lineCount - 1 - line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts
22731  // scanlines from top, but our vertical index
22732  // counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate
22733  // system)
22734  mGradient.colorize(rawData + line * rowCount, mDataRange, pixels,
22735  rowCount, 1, mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
22736  }
22737  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
22738  {
22739  const int lineCount = keySize;
22740  const int rowCount = valueSize;
22741  for (int line = 0; line < lineCount; ++line) {
22742  QRgb *pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb *>(localMapImage->scanLine(
22743  lineCount - 1 - line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts
22744  // scanlines from top, but our vertical index
22745  // counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate
22746  // system)
22747  mGradient.colorize(rawData + line, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount,
22748  lineCount, mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
22749  }
22750  }
22751 
22752  if (keyOversamplingFactor > 1 || valueOversamplingFactor > 1) {
22753  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
22754  mMapImage = mUndersampledMapImage.scaled(
22755  keySize * keyOversamplingFactor, valueSize * valueOversamplingFactor,
22756  Qt::IgnoreAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
22757  else
22758  mMapImage = mUndersampledMapImage.scaled(
22759  valueSize * valueOversamplingFactor, keySize * keyOversamplingFactor,
22760  Qt::IgnoreAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
22761  }
22762  mMapData->mDataModified = false;
22763  mMapImageInvalidated = false;
22764 }
22765 
22766 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22767 void QCPColorMap::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
22768  if (mMapData->isEmpty())
22769  return;
22770  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
22771  return;
22772  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
22773 
22774  if (mMapData->mDataModified || mMapImageInvalidated)
22775  updateMapImage();
22776 
22777  // use buffer if painting vectorized (PDF):
22778  bool useBuffer = painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmVectorized);
22779  QCPPainter *localPainter = painter; // will be redirected to paint on
22780  // mapBuffer if painting vectorized
22781  QRectF mapBufferTarget; // the rect in absolute widget coordinates where the
22782  // visible map portion/buffer will end up in
22783  QPixmap mapBuffer;
22784  double mapBufferPixelRatio =
22785  3; // factor by which DPI is increased in embedded bitmaps
22786  if (useBuffer) {
22787  mapBufferTarget = painter->clipRegion().boundingRect();
22788  mapBuffer =
22789  QPixmap((mapBufferTarget.size() * mapBufferPixelRatio).toSize());
22790  mapBuffer.fill(Qt::transparent);
22791  localPainter = new QCPPainter(&mapBuffer);
22792  localPainter->scale(mapBufferPixelRatio, mapBufferPixelRatio);
22793  localPainter->translate(-mapBufferTarget.topLeft());
22794  }
22795 
22796  QRectF imageRect =
22797  QRectF(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower,
22798  mMapData->valueRange().lower),
22799  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper,
22800  mMapData->valueRange().upper)).normalized();
22801  // extend imageRect to contain outer halves/quarters of bordering/cornering
22802  // pixels (cells are centered on map range boundary):
22803  double halfCellWidth = 0; // in pixels
22804  double halfCellHeight = 0; // in pixels
22805  if (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
22806  if (mMapData->keySize() > 1)
22807  halfCellWidth =
22808  0.5 * imageRect.width() / (double)(mMapData->keySize() - 1);
22809  if (mMapData->valueSize() > 1)
22810  halfCellHeight =
22811  0.5 * imageRect.height() / (double)(mMapData->valueSize() - 1);
22812  } else // keyAxis orientation is Qt::Vertical
22813  {
22814  if (mMapData->keySize() > 1)
22815  halfCellHeight =
22816  0.5 * imageRect.height() / (double)(mMapData->keySize() - 1);
22817  if (mMapData->valueSize() > 1)
22818  halfCellWidth =
22819  0.5 * imageRect.width() / (double)(mMapData->valueSize() - 1);
22820  }
22821  imageRect.adjust(-halfCellWidth, -halfCellHeight, halfCellWidth,
22822  halfCellHeight);
22823  bool mirrorX =
22824  (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())
22825  ->rangeReversed();
22826  bool mirrorY =
22827  (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())
22828  ->rangeReversed();
22829  bool smoothBackup =
22830  localPainter->renderHints().testFlag(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform);
22831  localPainter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, mInterpolate);
22832  QRegion clipBackup;
22833  if (mTightBoundary) {
22834  clipBackup = localPainter->clipRegion();
22835  QRectF tightClipRect =
22836  QRectF(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower,
22837  mMapData->valueRange().lower),
22838  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper,
22839  mMapData->valueRange().upper)).normalized();
22840  localPainter->setClipRect(tightClipRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
22841  }
22842  localPainter->drawImage(imageRect, mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY));
22843  if (mTightBoundary)
22844  localPainter->setClipRegion(clipBackup);
22845  localPainter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, smoothBackup);
22846 
22847  if (useBuffer) // localPainter painted to mapBuffer, so now draw buffer with
22848  // original painter
22849  {
22850  delete localPainter;
22851  painter->drawPixmap(mapBufferTarget.toRect(), mapBuffer);
22852  }
22853 }
22854 
22855 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22856 void QCPColorMap::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter,
22857  const QRectF &rect) const {
22858  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
22859  // draw map thumbnail:
22860  if (!mLegendIcon.isNull()) {
22861  QPixmap scaledIcon = mLegendIcon.scaled(
22862  rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
22863  QRectF iconRect = QRectF(0, 0, scaledIcon.width(), scaledIcon.height());
22864  iconRect.moveCenter(rect.center());
22865  painter->drawPixmap(iconRect.topLeft(), scaledIcon);
22866  }
22867  /*
22868  // draw frame:
22869  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22870  painter->setPen(Qt::black);
22871  painter->drawRect(rect.adjusted(1, 1, 0, 0));
22872  */
22873 }
22874 
22875 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22876 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange,
22877  SignDomain inSignDomain) const {
22878  foundRange = true;
22879  QCPRange result = mMapData->keyRange();
22880  result.normalize();
22881  if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive) {
22882  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
22883  result.lower = result.upper * 1e-3;
22884  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
22885  foundRange = false;
22886  } else if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative) {
22887  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
22888  result.upper = result.lower * 1e-3;
22889  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
22890  foundRange = false;
22891  }
22892  return result;
22893 }
22894 
22895 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22896 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getValueRange(bool &foundRange,
22897  SignDomain inSignDomain) const {
22898  foundRange = true;
22899  QCPRange result = mMapData->valueRange();
22900  result.normalize();
22901  if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive) {
22902  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
22903  result.lower = result.upper * 1e-3;
22904  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
22905  foundRange = false;
22906  } else if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative) {
22907  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
22908  result.upper = result.lower * 1e-3;
22909  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
22910  foundRange = false;
22911  }
22912  return result;
22913 }
22914 
22918 
22937 QCPFinancialData::QCPFinancialData()
22938  : key(0), open(0), high(0), low(0), close(0) {}
22939 
22943 QCPFinancialData::QCPFinancialData(double key, double open, double high,
22944  double low, double close)
22945  : key(key), open(open), high(high), low(low), close(close) {}
22946 
22950 
22998 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
22999 
23009 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
23010 
23024 QCPFinancial::QCPFinancial(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
23025  : QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis), mData(0), mChartStyle(csOhlc),
23026  mWidth(0.5), mTwoColored(false),
23027  mBrushPositive(QBrush(QColor(210, 210, 255))),
23028  mBrushNegative(QBrush(QColor(255, 210, 210))),
23029  mPenPositive(QPen(QColor(10, 40, 180))),
23030  mPenNegative(QPen(QColor(180, 40, 10))) {
23031  mData = new QCPFinancialDataMap;
23032 
23033  setSelectedPen(QPen(QColor(80, 80, 255), 2.5));
23034  setSelectedBrush(QBrush(QColor(80, 80, 255)));
23035 }
23036 
23037 QCPFinancial::~QCPFinancial() { delete mData; }
23038 
23054 void QCPFinancial::setData(QCPFinancialDataMap *data, bool copy) {
23055  if (mData == data) {
23056  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
23057  << "The data pointer is already in (and owned by) this plottable"
23058  << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(data);
23059  return;
23060  }
23061  if (copy) {
23062  *mData = *data;
23063  } else {
23064  delete mData;
23065  mData = data;
23066  }
23067 }
23068 
23078 void QCPFinancial::setData(const QVector<double> &key,
23079  const QVector<double> &open,
23080  const QVector<double> &high,
23081  const QVector<double> &low,
23082  const QVector<double> &close) {
23083  mData->clear();
23084  int n = key.size();
23085  n = qMin(n, open.size());
23086  n = qMin(n, high.size());
23087  n = qMin(n, low.size());
23088  n = qMin(n, close.size());
23089  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
23090  mData->insertMulti(
23091  key[i], QCPFinancialData(key[i], open[i], high[i], low[i], close[i]));
23092  }
23093 }
23094 
23098 void QCPFinancial::setChartStyle(QCPFinancial::ChartStyle style) {
23099  mChartStyle = style;
23100 }
23101 
23109 void QCPFinancial::setWidth(double width) { mWidth = width; }
23110 
23122 void QCPFinancial::setTwoColored(bool twoColored) { mTwoColored = twoColored; }
23123 
23136 void QCPFinancial::setBrushPositive(const QBrush &brush) {
23137  mBrushPositive = brush;
23138 }
23139 
23152 void QCPFinancial::setBrushNegative(const QBrush &brush) {
23153  mBrushNegative = brush;
23154 }
23155 
23168 void QCPFinancial::setPenPositive(const QPen &pen) { mPenPositive = pen; }
23169 
23182 void QCPFinancial::setPenNegative(const QPen &pen) { mPenNegative = pen; }
23183 
23193 void QCPFinancial::addData(const QCPFinancialDataMap &dataMap) {
23194  mData->unite(dataMap);
23195 }
23196 
23207 void QCPFinancial::addData(const QCPFinancialData &data) {
23208  mData->insertMulti(data.key, data);
23209 }
23210 
23223 void QCPFinancial::addData(double key, double open, double high, double low,
23224  double close) {
23225  mData->insertMulti(key, QCPFinancialData(key, open, high, low, close));
23226 }
23227 
23238 void QCPFinancial::addData(const QVector<double> &key,
23239  const QVector<double> &open,
23240  const QVector<double> &high,
23241  const QVector<double> &low,
23242  const QVector<double> &close) {
23243  int n = key.size();
23244  n = qMin(n, open.size());
23245  n = qMin(n, high.size());
23246  n = qMin(n, low.size());
23247  n = qMin(n, close.size());
23248  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
23249  mData->insertMulti(
23250  key[i], QCPFinancialData(key[i], open[i], high[i], low[i], close[i]));
23251  }
23252 }
23253 
23259 void QCPFinancial::removeDataBefore(double key) {
23260  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
23261  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
23262  it = mData->erase(it);
23263 }
23264 
23270 void QCPFinancial::removeDataAfter(double key) {
23271  if (mData->isEmpty())
23272  return;
23273  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
23274  while (it != mData->end())
23275  it = mData->erase(it);
23276 }
23277 
23287 void QCPFinancial::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey) {
23288  if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty())
23289  return;
23290  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
23291  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
23292  while (it != itEnd)
23293  it = mData->erase(it);
23294 }
23295 
23307 void QCPFinancial::removeData(double key) { mData->remove(key); }
23308 
23314 void QCPFinancial::clearData() { mData->clear(); }
23315 
23316 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23317 double QCPFinancial::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
23318  QVariant *details) const {
23319  Q_UNUSED(details)
23320  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
23321  return -1;
23322  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) {
23323  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
23324  return -1;
23325  }
23326 
23327  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint())) {
23328  // get visible data range:
23329  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator lower,
23330  upper; // note that upper is the actual upper point, and not 1 step
23331  // after the upper point
23332  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
23333  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
23334  return -1;
23335  // perform select test according to configured style:
23336  switch (mChartStyle) {
23337  case QCPFinancial::csOhlc:
23338  return ohlcSelectTest(pos, lower, upper + 1);
23339  break;
23340  case QCPFinancial::csCandlestick:
23341  return candlestickSelectTest(pos, lower, upper + 1);
23342  break;
23343  }
23344  }
23345  return -1;
23346 }
23347 
23367 QCPFinancialDataMap QCPFinancial::timeSeriesToOhlc(const QVector<double> &time,
23368  const QVector<double> &value,
23369  double timeBinSize,
23370  double timeBinOffset) {
23371  QCPFinancialDataMap map;
23372  int count = qMin(time.size(), value.size());
23373  if (count == 0)
23374  return QCPFinancialDataMap();
23375 
23376  QCPFinancialData currentBinData(0, value.first(), value.first(),
23377  value.first(), value.first());
23378  int currentBinIndex =
23379  qFloor((time.first() - timeBinOffset) / timeBinSize + 0.5);
23380  for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
23381  int index = qFloor((time.at(i) - timeBinOffset) / timeBinSize + 0.5);
23382  if (currentBinIndex ==
23383  index) // data point still in current bin, extend high/low:
23384  {
23385  if (value.at(i) < currentBinData.low)
23386  currentBinData.low = value.at(i);
23387  if (value.at(i) > currentBinData.high)
23388  currentBinData.high = value.at(i);
23389  if (i == count - 1) // last data point is in current bin, finalize bin:
23390  {
23391  currentBinData.close = value.at(i);
23392  currentBinData.key = timeBinOffset + (index)*timeBinSize;
23393  map.insert(currentBinData.key, currentBinData);
23394  }
23395  } else // data point not anymore in current bin, set close of old and open
23396  // of new bin, and add old to map:
23397  {
23398  // finalize current bin:
23399  currentBinData.close = value.at(i - 1);
23400  currentBinData.key = timeBinOffset + (index - 1) * timeBinSize;
23401  map.insert(currentBinData.key, currentBinData);
23402  // start next bin:
23403  currentBinIndex = index;
23404  currentBinData.open = value.at(i);
23405  currentBinData.high = value.at(i);
23406  currentBinData.low = value.at(i);
23407  }
23408  }
23409 
23410  return map;
23411 }
23412 
23413 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23414 void QCPFinancial::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
23415  // get visible data range:
23416  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator lower,
23417  upper; // note that upper is the actual upper point, and not 1 step after
23418  // the upper point
23419  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
23420  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
23421  return;
23422 
23423  // draw visible data range according to configured style:
23424  switch (mChartStyle) {
23425  case QCPFinancial::csOhlc:
23426  drawOhlcPlot(painter, lower, upper + 1);
23427  break;
23428  case QCPFinancial::csCandlestick:
23429  drawCandlestickPlot(painter, lower, upper + 1);
23430  break;
23431  }
23432 }
23433 
23434 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23435 void QCPFinancial::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter,
23436  const QRectF &rect) const {
23437  painter->setAntialiasing(false); // legend icon especially of csCandlestick
23438  // looks better without antialiasing
23439  if (mChartStyle == csOhlc) {
23440  if (mTwoColored) {
23441  // draw upper left half icon with positive color:
23442  painter->setBrush(mBrushPositive);
23443  painter->setPen(mPenPositive);
23444  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint()
23445  << rect.topRight().toPoint()
23446  << rect.topLeft().toPoint()));
23447  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height() * 0.5, rect.width(),
23448  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23449  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width() * 0.2, rect.height() * 0.3,
23450  rect.width() * 0.2,
23451  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23452  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width() * 0.8, rect.height() * 0.5,
23453  rect.width() * 0.8,
23454  rect.height() * 0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23455  // draw bottom right hald icon with negative color:
23456  painter->setBrush(mBrushNegative);
23457  painter->setPen(mPenNegative);
23458  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(
23459  QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint()
23460  << rect.bottomRight().toPoint()));
23461  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height() * 0.5, rect.width(),
23462  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23463  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width() * 0.2, rect.height() * 0.3,
23464  rect.width() * 0.2,
23465  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23466  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width() * 0.8, rect.height() * 0.5,
23467  rect.width() * 0.8,
23468  rect.height() * 0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23469  } else {
23470  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
23471  painter->setPen(mPen);
23472  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height() * 0.5, rect.width(),
23473  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23474  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width() * 0.2, rect.height() * 0.3,
23475  rect.width() * 0.2,
23476  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23477  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width() * 0.8, rect.height() * 0.5,
23478  rect.width() * 0.8,
23479  rect.height() * 0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23480  }
23481  } else if (mChartStyle == csCandlestick) {
23482  if (mTwoColored) {
23483  // draw upper left half icon with positive color:
23484  painter->setBrush(mBrushPositive);
23485  painter->setPen(mPenPositive);
23486  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint()
23487  << rect.topRight().toPoint()
23488  << rect.topLeft().toPoint()));
23489  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height() * 0.5, rect.width() * 0.25,
23490  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23491  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width() * 0.75, rect.height() * 0.5,
23492  rect.width(),
23493  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23494  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width() * 0.25, rect.height() * 0.25,
23495  rect.width() * 0.5,
23496  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23497  // draw bottom right hald icon with negative color:
23498  painter->setBrush(mBrushNegative);
23499  painter->setPen(mPenNegative);
23500  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(
23501  QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint()
23502  << rect.bottomRight().toPoint()));
23503  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height() * 0.5, rect.width() * 0.25,
23504  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23505  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width() * 0.75, rect.height() * 0.5,
23506  rect.width(),
23507  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23508  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width() * 0.25, rect.height() * 0.25,
23509  rect.width() * 0.5,
23510  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23511  } else {
23512  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
23513  painter->setPen(mPen);
23514  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height() * 0.5, rect.width() * 0.25,
23515  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23516  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width() * 0.75, rect.height() * 0.5,
23517  rect.width(),
23518  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23519  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width() * 0.25, rect.height() * 0.25,
23520  rect.width() * 0.5,
23521  rect.height() * 0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
23522  }
23523  }
23524 }
23525 
23526 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23527 QCPRange
23528 QCPFinancial::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange,
23529  QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain inSignDomain) const {
23530  QCPRange range;
23531  bool haveLower = false;
23532  bool haveUpper = false;
23533 
23534  double current;
23535  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
23536  while (it != mData->constEnd()) {
23537  current = it.value().key;
23538  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) ||
23539  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0)) {
23540  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower) {
23541  range.lower = current;
23542  haveLower = true;
23543  }
23544  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper) {
23545  range.upper = current;
23546  haveUpper = true;
23547  }
23548  }
23549  ++it;
23550  }
23551  // determine exact range by including width of bars/flags:
23552  if (haveLower && mKeyAxis)
23553  range.lower = range.lower - mWidth * 0.5;
23554  if (haveUpper && mKeyAxis)
23555  range.upper = range.upper + mWidth * 0.5;
23556  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
23557  return range;
23558 }
23559 
23560 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23561 QCPRange QCPFinancial::getValueRange(
23562  bool &foundRange, QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain inSignDomain) const {
23563  QCPRange range;
23564  bool haveLower = false;
23565  bool haveUpper = false;
23566 
23567  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
23568  while (it != mData->constEnd()) {
23569  // high:
23570  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth ||
23571  (inSignDomain == sdNegative && it.value().high < 0) ||
23572  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && it.value().high > 0)) {
23573  if (it.value().high < range.lower || !haveLower) {
23574  range.lower = it.value().high;
23575  haveLower = true;
23576  }
23577  if (it.value().high > range.upper || !haveUpper) {
23578  range.upper = it.value().high;
23579  haveUpper = true;
23580  }
23581  }
23582  // low:
23583  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth ||
23584  (inSignDomain == sdNegative && it.value().low < 0) ||
23585  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && it.value().low > 0)) {
23586  if (it.value().low < range.lower || !haveLower) {
23587  range.lower = it.value().low;
23588  haveLower = true;
23589  }
23590  if (it.value().low > range.upper || !haveUpper) {
23591  range.upper = it.value().low;
23592  haveUpper = true;
23593  }
23594  }
23595  ++it;
23596  }
23597 
23598  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
23599  return range;
23600 }
23601 
23610 void QCPFinancial::drawOhlcPlot(
23611  QCPPainter *painter, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin,
23612  const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end) {
23613  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
23614  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
23615  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
23616  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
23617  return;
23618  }
23619 
23620  QPen linePen;
23621 
23622  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
23623  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
23624  if (mSelected)
23625  linePen = mSelectedPen;
23626  else if (mTwoColored)
23627  linePen =
23628  it.value().close >= it.value().open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative;
23629  else
23630  linePen = mPen;
23631  painter->setPen(linePen);
23632  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
23633  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
23634  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
23635  // draw backbone:
23636  painter->drawLine(
23637  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)),
23638  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)));
23639  // draw open:
23640  double keyWidthPixels =
23641  keyPixel -
23642  keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key - mWidth * 0.5); // sign of this
23643  // makes sure
23644  // open/close
23645  // are on
23646  // correct sides
23647  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel - keyWidthPixels, openPixel),
23648  QPointF(keyPixel, openPixel));
23649  // draw close:
23650  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, closePixel),
23651  QPointF(keyPixel + keyWidthPixels, closePixel));
23652  }
23653  } else {
23654  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
23655  if (mSelected)
23656  linePen = mSelectedPen;
23657  else if (mTwoColored)
23658  linePen =
23659  it.value().close >= it.value().open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative;
23660  else
23661  linePen = mPen;
23662  painter->setPen(linePen);
23663  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
23664  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
23665  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
23666  // draw backbone:
23667  painter->drawLine(
23668  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel),
23669  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel));
23670  // draw open:
23671  double keyWidthPixels =
23672  keyPixel -
23673  keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key - mWidth * 0.5); // sign of this
23674  // makes sure
23675  // open/close
23676  // are on
23677  // correct sides
23678  painter->drawLine(QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel - keyWidthPixels),
23679  QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel));
23680  // draw close:
23681  painter->drawLine(QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel),
23682  QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel + keyWidthPixels));
23683  }
23684  }
23685 }
23686 
23695 void QCPFinancial::drawCandlestickPlot(
23696  QCPPainter *painter, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin,
23697  const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end) {
23698  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
23699  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
23700  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
23701  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
23702  return;
23703  }
23704 
23705  QPen linePen;
23706  QBrush boxBrush;
23707 
23708  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
23709  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
23710  if (mSelected) {
23711  linePen = mSelectedPen;
23712  boxBrush = mSelectedBrush;
23713  } else if (mTwoColored) {
23714  if (it.value().close >= it.value().open) {
23715  linePen = mPenPositive;
23716  boxBrush = mBrushPositive;
23717  } else {
23718  linePen = mPenNegative;
23719  boxBrush = mBrushNegative;
23720  }
23721  } else {
23722  linePen = mPen;
23723  boxBrush = mBrush;
23724  }
23725  painter->setPen(linePen);
23726  painter->setBrush(boxBrush);
23727  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
23728  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
23729  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
23730  // draw high:
23731  painter->drawLine(
23732  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)),
23733  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(
23734  qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close))));
23735  // draw low:
23736  painter->drawLine(
23737  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)),
23738  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(
23739  qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close))));
23740  // draw open-close box:
23741  double keyWidthPixels =
23742  keyPixel - keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key - mWidth * 0.5);
23743  painter->drawRect(QRectF(QPointF(keyPixel - keyWidthPixels, closePixel),
23744  QPointF(keyPixel + keyWidthPixels, openPixel)));
23745  }
23746  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
23747  {
23748  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
23749  if (mSelected) {
23750  linePen = mSelectedPen;
23751  boxBrush = mSelectedBrush;
23752  } else if (mTwoColored) {
23753  if (it.value().close >= it.value().open) {
23754  linePen = mPenPositive;
23755  boxBrush = mBrushPositive;
23756  } else {
23757  linePen = mPenNegative;
23758  boxBrush = mBrushNegative;
23759  }
23760  } else {
23761  linePen = mPen;
23762  boxBrush = mBrush;
23763  }
23764  painter->setPen(linePen);
23765  painter->setBrush(boxBrush);
23766  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
23767  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
23768  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
23769  // draw high:
23770  painter->drawLine(
23771  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel),
23772  QPointF(
23773  valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close)),
23774  keyPixel));
23775  // draw low:
23776  painter->drawLine(
23777  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel),
23778  QPointF(
23779  valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close)),
23780  keyPixel));
23781  // draw open-close box:
23782  double keyWidthPixels =
23783  keyPixel - keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key - mWidth * 0.5);
23784  painter->drawRect(QRectF(QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel - keyWidthPixels),
23785  QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel + keyWidthPixels)));
23786  }
23787  }
23788 }
23789 
23797 double QCPFinancial::ohlcSelectTest(
23798  const QPointF &pos, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin,
23799  const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end) const {
23800  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
23801  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
23802  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
23803  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
23804  return -1;
23805  }
23806 
23807  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
23808  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it;
23809  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
23810  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
23811  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
23812  // calculate distance to backbone:
23813  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(
23814  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)),
23815  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)), pos);
23816  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
23817  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
23818  }
23819  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
23820  {
23821  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
23822  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
23823  // calculate distance to backbone:
23824  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(
23825  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel),
23826  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel), pos);
23827  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
23828  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
23829  }
23830  }
23831  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
23832 }
23833 
23842 double QCPFinancial::candlestickSelectTest(
23843  const QPointF &pos, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin,
23844  const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end) const {
23845  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
23846  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
23847  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) {
23848  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
23849  return -1;
23850  }
23851 
23852  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
23853  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it;
23854  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
23855  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
23856  double currentDistSqr;
23857  // determine whether pos is in open-close-box:
23858  QCPRange boxKeyRange(it.value().key - mWidth * 0.5,
23859  it.value().key + mWidth * 0.5);
23860  QCPRange boxValueRange(it.value().close, it.value().open);
23861  double posKey, posValue;
23862  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
23863  if (boxKeyRange.contains(posKey) &&
23864  boxValueRange.contains(posValue)) // is in open-close-box
23865  {
23866  currentDistSqr = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99 *
23867  mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
23868  } else {
23869  // calculate distance to high/low lines:
23870  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
23871  double highLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(
23872  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)),
23873  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(
23874  qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close))),
23875  pos);
23876  double lowLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(
23877  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)),
23878  QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(
23879  qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close))),
23880  pos);
23881  currentDistSqr = qMin(highLineDistSqr, lowLineDistSqr);
23882  }
23883  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
23884  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
23885  }
23886  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
23887  {
23888  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
23889  double currentDistSqr;
23890  // determine whether pos is in open-close-box:
23891  QCPRange boxKeyRange(it.value().key - mWidth * 0.5,
23892  it.value().key + mWidth * 0.5);
23893  QCPRange boxValueRange(it.value().close, it.value().open);
23894  double posKey, posValue;
23895  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
23896  if (boxKeyRange.contains(posKey) &&
23897  boxValueRange.contains(posValue)) // is in open-close-box
23898  {
23899  currentDistSqr = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99 *
23900  mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
23901  } else {
23902  // calculate distance to high/low lines:
23903  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
23904  double highLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(
23905  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel),
23906  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(
23907  qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close)),
23908  keyPixel),
23909  pos);
23910  double lowLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(
23911  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel),
23912  QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(
23913  qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close)),
23914  keyPixel),
23915  pos);
23916  currentDistSqr = qMin(highLineDistSqr, lowLineDistSqr);
23917  }
23918  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
23919  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
23920  }
23921  }
23922  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
23923 }
23924 
23946 void QCPFinancial::getVisibleDataBounds(
23947  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &lower,
23948  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &upper) const {
23949  if (!mKeyAxis) {
23950  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis";
23951  return;
23952  }
23953  if (mData->isEmpty()) {
23954  lower = mData->constEnd();
23955  upper = mData->constEnd();
23956  return;
23957  }
23958 
23959  // get visible data range as QMap iterators
23960  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator lbound =
23961  mData->lowerBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower);
23962  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator ubound =
23963  mData->upperBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper);
23964  bool lowoutlier = lbound != mData->constBegin(); // indicates whether there
23965  // exist points below axis
23966  // range
23967  bool highoutlier =
23968  ubound !=
23969  mData
23970  ->constEnd(); // indicates whether there exist points above axis range
23971 
23972  lower = (lowoutlier ? lbound - 1
23973  : lbound); // data point range that will be actually drawn
23974  upper = (highoutlier
23975  ? ubound
23976  : ubound - 1); // data point range that will be actually drawn
23977 }
23978 
23982 
23997 QCPItemStraightLine::QCPItemStraightLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
23998  : QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
23999  point1(createPosition(QLatin1String("point1"))),
24000  point2(createPosition(QLatin1String("point2"))) {
24001  point1->setCoords(0, 0);
24002  point2->setCoords(1, 1);
24003 
24004  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
24005  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
24006 }
24007 
24008 QCPItemStraightLine::~QCPItemStraightLine() {}
24009 
24015 void QCPItemStraightLine::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
24016 
24022 void QCPItemStraightLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen) {
24023  mSelectedPen = pen;
24024 }
24025 
24026 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24027 double QCPItemStraightLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
24028  QVariant *details) const {
24029  Q_UNUSED(details)
24030  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
24031  return -1;
24032 
24033  return distToStraightLine(
24034  QVector2D(point1->pixelPoint()),
24035  QVector2D(point2->pixelPoint() - point1->pixelPoint()), QVector2D(pos));
24036 }
24037 
24038 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24039 void QCPItemStraightLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
24040  QVector2D start(point1->pixelPoint());
24041  QVector2D end(point2->pixelPoint());
24042  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
24043  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
24044  QLineF line = getRectClippedStraightLine(
24045  start, end - start,
24046  clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
24047  // paint visible segment, if existent:
24048  if (!line.isNull()) {
24049  painter->setPen(mainPen());
24050  painter->drawLine(line);
24051  }
24052 }
24053 
24062 double QCPItemStraightLine::distToStraightLine(const QVector2D &base,
24063  const QVector2D &vec,
24064  const QVector2D &point) const {
24065  return qAbs((base.y() - point.y()) * vec.x() -
24066  (base.x() - point.x()) * vec.y()) /
24067  vec.length();
24068 }
24069 
24078 QLineF QCPItemStraightLine::getRectClippedStraightLine(
24079  const QVector2D &base, const QVector2D &vec, const QRect &rect) const {
24080  double bx, by;
24081  double gamma;
24082  QLineF result;
24083  if (vec.x() == 0 && vec.y() == 0)
24084  return result;
24085  if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is vertical
24086  {
24087  // check top of rect:
24088  bx = rect.left();
24089  by = rect.top();
24090  gamma = base.x() - bx + (by - base.y()) * vec.x() / vec.y();
24091  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
24092  result.setLine(bx + gamma, rect.top(), bx + gamma,
24093  rect.bottom()); // no need to check bottom because we know
24094  // line is vertical
24095  } else if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is horizontal
24096  {
24097  // check left of rect:
24098  bx = rect.left();
24099  by = rect.top();
24100  gamma = base.y() - by + (bx - base.x()) * vec.y() / vec.x();
24101  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
24102  result.setLine(rect.left(), by + gamma, rect.right(),
24103  by + gamma); // no need to check right because we know line
24104  // is horizontal
24105  } else // line is skewed
24106  {
24107  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
24108  // check top of rect:
24109  bx = rect.left();
24110  by = rect.top();
24111  gamma = base.x() - bx + (by - base.y()) * vec.x() / vec.y();
24112  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
24113  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx + gamma, by));
24114  // check bottom of rect:
24115  bx = rect.left();
24116  by = rect.bottom();
24117  gamma = base.x() - bx + (by - base.y()) * vec.x() / vec.y();
24118  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
24119  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx + gamma, by));
24120  // check left of rect:
24121  bx = rect.left();
24122  by = rect.top();
24123  gamma = base.y() - by + (bx - base.x()) * vec.y() / vec.x();
24124  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
24125  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by + gamma));
24126  // check right of rect:
24127  bx = rect.right();
24128  by = rect.top();
24129  gamma = base.y() - by + (bx - base.x()) * vec.y() / vec.x();
24130  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
24131  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by + gamma));
24132 
24133  // evaluate points:
24134  if (pointVectors.size() == 2) {
24135  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(),
24136  pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
24137  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2) {
24138  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there.
24139  // single out the point pair with greatest distance:
24140  double distSqrMax = 0;
24141  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
24142  for (int i = 0; i < pointVectors.size() - 1; ++i) {
24143  for (int k = i + 1; k < pointVectors.size(); ++k) {
24144  double distSqr =
24145  (pointVectors.at(i) - pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
24146  if (distSqr > distSqrMax) {
24147  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
24148  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
24149  distSqrMax = distSqr;
24150  }
24151  }
24152  }
24153  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
24154  }
24155  }
24156  return result;
24157 }
24158 
24164 QPen QCPItemStraightLine::mainPen() const {
24165  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
24166 }
24167 
24171 
24190 QCPItemLine::QCPItemLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
24191  : QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
24192  start(createPosition(QLatin1String("start"))),
24193  end(createPosition(QLatin1String("end"))) {
24194  start->setCoords(0, 0);
24195  end->setCoords(1, 1);
24196 
24197  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
24198  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
24199 }
24200 
24201 QCPItemLine::~QCPItemLine() {}
24202 
24208 void QCPItemLine::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
24209 
24215 void QCPItemLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen) { mSelectedPen = pen; }
24216 
24228 void QCPItemLine::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head) { mHead = head; }
24229 
24241 void QCPItemLine::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail) { mTail = tail; }
24242 
24243 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24244 double QCPItemLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
24245  QVariant *details) const {
24246  Q_UNUSED(details)
24247  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
24248  return -1;
24249 
24250  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine(start->pixelPoint(), end->pixelPoint(), pos));
24251 }
24252 
24253 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24254 void QCPItemLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
24255  QVector2D startVec(start->pixelPoint());
24256  QVector2D endVec(end->pixelPoint());
24257  if (startVec.toPoint() == endVec.toPoint())
24258  return;
24259  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
24260  double clipPad = qMax(mHead.boundingDistance(), mTail.boundingDistance());
24261  clipPad = qMax(clipPad, (double)mainPen().widthF());
24262  QLineF line = getRectClippedLine(
24263  startVec, endVec,
24264  clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
24265  // paint visible segment, if existent:
24266  if (!line.isNull()) {
24267  painter->setPen(mainPen());
24268  painter->drawLine(line);
24269  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
24270  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
24271  mTail.draw(painter, startVec, startVec - endVec);
24272  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
24273  mHead.draw(painter, endVec, endVec - startVec);
24274  }
24275 }
24276 
24285 QLineF QCPItemLine::getRectClippedLine(const QVector2D &start,
24286  const QVector2D &end,
24287  const QRect &rect) const {
24288  bool containsStart = rect.contains(start.x(), start.y());
24289  bool containsEnd = rect.contains(end.x(), end.y());
24290  if (containsStart && containsEnd)
24291  return QLineF(start.toPointF(), end.toPointF());
24292 
24293  QVector2D base = start;
24294  QVector2D vec = end - start;
24295  double bx, by;
24296  double gamma, mu;
24297  QLineF result;
24298  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
24299 
24300  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is not horizontal
24301  {
24302  // check top of rect:
24303  bx = rect.left();
24304  by = rect.top();
24305  mu = (by - base.y()) / vec.y();
24306  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1) {
24307  gamma = base.x() - bx + mu * vec.x();
24308  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
24309  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx + gamma, by));
24310  }
24311  // check bottom of rect:
24312  bx = rect.left();
24313  by = rect.bottom();
24314  mu = (by - base.y()) / vec.y();
24315  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1) {
24316  gamma = base.x() - bx + mu * vec.x();
24317  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
24318  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx + gamma, by));
24319  }
24320  }
24321  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is not vertical
24322  {
24323  // check left of rect:
24324  bx = rect.left();
24325  by = rect.top();
24326  mu = (bx - base.x()) / vec.x();
24327  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1) {
24328  gamma = base.y() - by + mu * vec.y();
24329  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
24330  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by + gamma));
24331  }
24332  // check right of rect:
24333  bx = rect.right();
24334  by = rect.top();
24335  mu = (bx - base.x()) / vec.x();
24336  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1) {
24337  gamma = base.y() - by + mu * vec.y();
24338  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
24339  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by + gamma));
24340  }
24341  }
24342 
24343  if (containsStart)
24344  pointVectors.append(start);
24345  if (containsEnd)
24346  pointVectors.append(end);
24347 
24348  // evaluate points:
24349  if (pointVectors.size() == 2) {
24350  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(),
24351  pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
24352  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2) {
24353  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there.
24354  // single out the point pair with greatest distance:
24355  double distSqrMax = 0;
24356  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
24357  for (int i = 0; i < pointVectors.size() - 1; ++i) {
24358  for (int k = i + 1; k < pointVectors.size(); ++k) {
24359  double distSqr =
24360  (pointVectors.at(i) - pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
24361  if (distSqr > distSqrMax) {
24362  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
24363  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
24364  distSqrMax = distSqr;
24365  }
24366  }
24367  }
24368  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
24369  }
24370  return result;
24371 }
24372 
24378 QPen QCPItemLine::mainPen() const { return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen; }
24379 
24383 
24413 QCPItemCurve::QCPItemCurve(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
24414  : QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
24415  start(createPosition(QLatin1String("start"))),
24416  startDir(createPosition(QLatin1String("startDir"))),
24417  endDir(createPosition(QLatin1String("endDir"))),
24418  end(createPosition(QLatin1String("end"))) {
24419  start->setCoords(0, 0);
24420  startDir->setCoords(0.5, 0);
24421  endDir->setCoords(0, 0.5);
24422  end->setCoords(1, 1);
24423 
24424  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
24425  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
24426 }
24427 
24428 QCPItemCurve::~QCPItemCurve() {}
24429 
24435 void QCPItemCurve::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
24436 
24442 void QCPItemCurve::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen) { mSelectedPen = pen; }
24443 
24455 void QCPItemCurve::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head) { mHead = head; }
24456 
24468 void QCPItemCurve::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail) { mTail = tail; }
24469 
24470 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24471 double QCPItemCurve::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
24472  QVariant *details) const {
24473  Q_UNUSED(details)
24474  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
24475  return -1;
24476 
24477  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
24478  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
24479  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
24480  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
24481 
24482  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
24483  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
24484 
24485  QPolygonF polygon = cubicPath.toSubpathPolygons().first();
24486  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
24487  for (int i = 1; i < polygon.size(); ++i) {
24488  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(polygon.at(i - 1), polygon.at(i), pos);
24489  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
24490  minDistSqr = distSqr;
24491  }
24492  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
24493 }
24494 
24495 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24496 void QCPItemCurve::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
24497  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
24498  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
24499  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
24500  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
24501  if (QVector2D(endVec - startVec).length() >
24502  1e10f) // too large curves cause crash
24503  return;
24504 
24505  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
24506  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
24507 
24508  // paint visible segment, if existent:
24509  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(),
24510  mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
24511  QRect cubicRect = cubicPath.controlPointRect().toRect();
24512  if (cubicRect.isEmpty()) // may happen when start and end exactly on same x or
24513  // y position
24514  cubicRect.adjust(0, 0, 1, 1);
24515  if (clip.intersects(cubicRect)) {
24516  painter->setPen(mainPen());
24517  painter->drawPath(cubicPath);
24518  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
24519  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
24520  mTail.draw(painter, QVector2D(startVec),
24521  M_PI - cubicPath.angleAtPercent(0) / 180.0 * M_PI);
24522  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
24523  mHead.draw(painter, QVector2D(endVec),
24524  -cubicPath.angleAtPercent(1) / 180.0 * M_PI);
24525  }
24526 }
24527 
24533 QPen QCPItemCurve::mainPen() const { return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen; }
24534 
24538 
24554 QCPItemRect::QCPItemRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
24555  : QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
24556  topLeft(createPosition(QLatin1String("topLeft"))),
24557  bottomRight(createPosition(QLatin1String("bottomRight"))),
24558  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
24559  topRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRight"), aiTopRight)),
24560  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
24561  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
24562  bottomLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeft"), aiBottomLeft)),
24563  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft)) {
24564  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
24565  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
24566 
24567  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
24568  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
24569  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
24570  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
24571 }
24572 
24573 QCPItemRect::~QCPItemRect() {}
24574 
24580 void QCPItemRect::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
24581 
24587 void QCPItemRect::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen) { mSelectedPen = pen; }
24588 
24596 void QCPItemRect::setBrush(const QBrush &brush) { mBrush = brush; }
24597 
24605 void QCPItemRect::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush) {
24606  mSelectedBrush = brush;
24607 }
24608 
24609 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24610 double QCPItemRect::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
24611  QVariant *details) const {
24612  Q_UNUSED(details)
24613  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
24614  return -1;
24615 
24616  QRectF rect =
24617  QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint()).normalized();
24618  bool filledRect =
24619  mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
24620  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
24621 }
24622 
24623 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24624 void QCPItemRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
24625  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
24626  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
24627  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
24628  return;
24629  QRectF rect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
24630  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
24631  QRectF boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
24632  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect())) // only draw if bounding rect of rect
24633  // item is visible in cliprect
24634  {
24635  painter->setPen(mainPen());
24636  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
24637  painter->drawRect(rect);
24638  }
24639 }
24640 
24641 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24642 QPointF QCPItemRect::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const {
24643  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
24644  switch (anchorId) {
24645  case aiTop:
24646  return (rect.topLeft() + rect.topRight()) * 0.5;
24647  case aiTopRight:
24648  return rect.topRight();
24649  case aiRight:
24650  return (rect.topRight() + rect.bottomRight()) * 0.5;
24651  case aiBottom:
24652  return (rect.bottomLeft() + rect.bottomRight()) * 0.5;
24653  case aiBottomLeft:
24654  return rect.bottomLeft();
24655  case aiLeft:
24656  return (rect.topLeft() + rect.bottomLeft()) * 0.5;
24657  }
24658 
24659  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
24660  return QPointF();
24661 }
24662 
24669 QPen QCPItemRect::mainPen() const { return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen; }
24670 
24677 QBrush QCPItemRect::mainBrush() const {
24678  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
24679 }
24680 
24684 
24708 QCPItemText::QCPItemText(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
24709  : QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
24710  position(createPosition(QLatin1String("position"))),
24711  topLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topLeft"), aiTopLeft)),
24712  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
24713  topRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRight"), aiTopRight)),
24714  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
24715  bottomRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomRight"), aiBottomRight)),
24716  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
24717  bottomLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeft"), aiBottomLeft)),
24718  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft)) {
24719  position->setCoords(0, 0);
24720 
24721  setRotation(0);
24722  setTextAlignment(Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignHCenter);
24723  setPositionAlignment(Qt::AlignCenter);
24724  setText(QLatin1String("text"));
24725 
24726  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
24727  setSelectedPen(Qt::NoPen);
24728  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
24729  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
24730  setColor(Qt::black);
24731  setSelectedColor(Qt::blue);
24732 }

24745  mSelectedColor = color;
24746 }

24756
