24765 
24773 void QCPItemText::setBrush(const QBrush &brush) { mBrush = brush; }
24774 
24782 void QCPItemText::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush) {
24783  mSelectedBrush = brush;
24784 }
24785 
24791 void QCPItemText::setFont(const QFont &font) { mFont = font; }
24792 
24798 void QCPItemText::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font) { mSelectedFont = font; }
24799 
24807 void QCPItemText::setText(const QString &text) { mText = text; }
24808 
24824 void QCPItemText::setPositionAlignment(Qt::Alignment alignment) {
24825  mPositionAlignment = alignment;
24826 }
24827 
24832 void QCPItemText::setTextAlignment(Qt::Alignment alignment) {
24833  mTextAlignment = alignment;
24834 }
24835 
24841 void QCPItemText::setRotation(double degrees) { mRotation = degrees; }
24842 
24849 void QCPItemText::setPadding(const QMargins &padding) { mPadding = padding; }
24850 
24851 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24852 double QCPItemText::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
24853  QVariant *details) const {
24854  Q_UNUSED(details)
24855  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
24856  return -1;
24857 
24858  // The rect may be rotated, so we transform the actual clicked pos to the
24859  // rotated
24860  // coordinate system, so we can use the normal rectSelectTest function for
24861  // non-rotated rects:
24862  QPointF positionPixels(position->pixelPoint());
24863  QTransform inputTransform;
24864  inputTransform.translate(positionPixels.x(), positionPixels.y());
24865  inputTransform.rotate(-mRotation);
24866  inputTransform.translate(-positionPixels.x(), -positionPixels.y());
24867  QPointF rotatedPos = inputTransform.map(pos);
24868  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mFont);
24869  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(
24870  0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | mTextAlignment, mText);
24871  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(),
24872  mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
24873  QPointF textPos =
24874  getTextDrawPoint(positionPixels, textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment);
24875  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
24876 
24877  return rectSelectTest(textBoxRect, rotatedPos, true);
24878 }
24879 
24880 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24881 void QCPItemText::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
24882  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
24883  QTransform transform = painter->transform();
24884  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
24885  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
24886  transform.rotate(mRotation);
24887  painter->setFont(mainFont());
24888  QRect textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(
24889  0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | mTextAlignment, mText);
24890  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(),
24891  mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
24892  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(
24893  QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect,
24894  mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
24895  textRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint() +
24896  QPoint(mPadding.left(), mPadding.top()));
24897  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
24898  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
24899  QRect boundingRect =
24900  textBoxRect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
24901  if (transform.mapRect(boundingRect)
24902  .intersects(painter->transform().mapRect(clipRect()))) {
24903  painter->setTransform(transform);
24904  if ((mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush &&
24905  mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0) ||
24906  (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)) {
24907  painter->setPen(mainPen());
24908  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
24909  painter->drawRect(textBoxRect);
24910  }
24911  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
24912  painter->setPen(QPen(mainColor()));
24913  painter->drawText(textRect, Qt::TextDontClip | mTextAlignment, mText);
24914  }
24915 }
24916 
24917 /* inherits documentation from base class */
24918 QPointF QCPItemText::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const {
24919  // get actual rect points (pretty much copied from draw function):
24920  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
24921  QTransform transform;
24922  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
24923  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
24924  transform.rotate(mRotation);
24925  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mainFont());
24926  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(
24927  0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | mTextAlignment, mText);
24928  QRectF textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(),
24929  mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
24930  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(
24931  QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect,
24932  mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
24933  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
24934  QPolygonF rectPoly = transform.map(QPolygonF(textBoxRect));
24935 
24936  switch (anchorId) {
24937  case aiTopLeft:
24938  return rectPoly.at(0);
24939  case aiTop:
24940  return (rectPoly.at(0) + rectPoly.at(1)) * 0.5;
24941  case aiTopRight:
24942  return rectPoly.at(1);
24943  case aiRight:
24944  return (rectPoly.at(1) + rectPoly.at(2)) * 0.5;
24945  case aiBottomRight:
24946  return rectPoly.at(2);
24947  case aiBottom:
24948  return (rectPoly.at(2) + rectPoly.at(3)) * 0.5;
24949  case aiBottomLeft:
24950  return rectPoly.at(3);
24951  case aiLeft:
24952  return (rectPoly.at(3) + rectPoly.at(0)) * 0.5;
24953  }
24954 
24955  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
24956  return QPointF();
24957 }
24958 
24974 QPointF QCPItemText::getTextDrawPoint(const QPointF &pos, const QRectF &rect,
24975  Qt::Alignment positionAlignment) const {
24976  if (positionAlignment == 0 ||
24977  positionAlignment == (Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop))
24978  return pos;
24979 
24980  QPointF result = pos; // start at top left
24981  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignHCenter))
24982  result.rx() -= rect.width() / 2.0;
24983  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight))
24984  result.rx() -= rect.width();
24985  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignVCenter))
24986  result.ry() -= rect.height() / 2.0;
24987  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom))
24988  result.ry() -= rect.height();
24989  return result;
24990 }
24991 
24998 QFont QCPItemText::mainFont() const {
24999  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
25000 }
25001 
25008 QColor QCPItemText::mainColor() const {
25009  return mSelected ? mSelectedColor : mColor;
25010 }
25011 
25018 QPen QCPItemText::mainPen() const { return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen; }
25019 
25026 QBrush QCPItemText::mainBrush() const {
25027  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
25028 }
25029 
25033 
25049 QCPItemEllipse::QCPItemEllipse(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
25050  : QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
25051  topLeft(createPosition(QLatin1String("topLeft"))),
25052  bottomRight(createPosition(QLatin1String("bottomRight"))),
25053  topLeftRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topLeftRim"), aiTopLeftRim)),
25054  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
25055  topRightRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRightRim"), aiTopRightRim)),
25056  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
25057  bottomRightRim(
25058  createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomRightRim"), aiBottomRightRim)),
25059  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
25060  bottomLeftRim(
25061  createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeftRim"), aiBottomLeftRim)),
25062  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft)),
25063  center(createAnchor(QLatin1String("center"), aiCenter)) {
25064  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
25065  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
25066 
25067  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
25068  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
25069  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
25070  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
25071 }
25072 
25073 QCPItemEllipse::~QCPItemEllipse() {}
25074 
25080 void QCPItemEllipse::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
25081 
25087 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen) { mSelectedPen = pen; }
25088 
25096 void QCPItemEllipse::setBrush(const QBrush &brush) { mBrush = brush; }
25097 
25105 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush) {
25106  mSelectedBrush = brush;
25107 }
25108 
25109 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25110 double QCPItemEllipse::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
25111  QVariant *details) const {
25112  Q_UNUSED(details)
25113  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
25114  return -1;
25115 
25116  double result = -1;
25117  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
25118  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
25119  QPointF center((p1 + p2) / 2.0);
25120  double a = qAbs(p1.x() - p2.x()) / 2.0;
25121  double b = qAbs(p1.y() - p2.y()) / 2.0;
25122  double x = pos.x() - center.x();
25123  double y = pos.y() - center.y();
25124 
25125  // distance to border:
25126  double c = 1.0 / qSqrt(x * x / (a * a) + y * y / (b * b));
25127  result = qAbs(c - 1) * qSqrt(x * x + y * y);
25128  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
25129  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99 &&
25130  mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0) {
25131  if (x * x / (a * a) + y * y / (b * b) <= 1)
25132  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
25133  }
25134  return result;
25135 }
25136 
25137 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25138 void QCPItemEllipse::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
25139  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
25140  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
25141  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
25142  return;
25143  QRectF ellipseRect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
25144  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(),
25145  mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
25146  if (ellipseRect.intersects(
25147  clip)) // only draw if bounding rect of ellipse is visible in cliprect
25148  {
25149  painter->setPen(mainPen());
25150  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
25151 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
25152  try // drawEllipse sometimes throws exceptions if ellipse is too big
25153  {
25154 #endif
25155  painter->drawEllipse(ellipseRect);
25156 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
25157  } catch (...) {
25158  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item too large for memory, setting invisible";
25159  setVisible(false);
25160  }
25161 #endif
25162  }
25163 }
25164 
25165 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25166 QPointF QCPItemEllipse::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const {
25167  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
25168  switch (anchorId) {
25169  case aiTopLeftRim:
25170  return rect.center() + (rect.topLeft() - rect.center()) * 1 / qSqrt(2);
25171  case aiTop:
25172  return (rect.topLeft() + rect.topRight()) * 0.5;
25173  case aiTopRightRim:
25174  return rect.center() + (rect.topRight() - rect.center()) * 1 / qSqrt(2);
25175  case aiRight:
25176  return (rect.topRight() + rect.bottomRight()) * 0.5;
25177  case aiBottomRightRim:
25178  return rect.center() + (rect.bottomRight() - rect.center()) * 1 / qSqrt(2);
25179  case aiBottom:
25180  return (rect.bottomLeft() + rect.bottomRight()) * 0.5;
25181  case aiBottomLeftRim:
25182  return rect.center() + (rect.bottomLeft() - rect.center()) * 1 / qSqrt(2);
25183  case aiLeft:
25184  return (rect.topLeft() + rect.bottomLeft()) * 0.5;
25185  case aiCenter:
25186  return (rect.topLeft() + rect.bottomRight()) * 0.5;
25187  }
25188 
25189  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
25190  return QPointF();
25191 }
25192 
25199 QPen QCPItemEllipse::mainPen() const { return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen; }
25200 
25207 QBrush QCPItemEllipse::mainBrush() const {
25208  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
25209 }
25210 
25214 
25239 QCPItemPixmap::QCPItemPixmap(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
25240  : QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
25241  topLeft(createPosition(QLatin1String("topLeft"))),
25242  bottomRight(createPosition(QLatin1String("bottomRight"))),
25243  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
25244  topRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRight"), aiTopRight)),
25245  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
25246  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
25247  bottomLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeft"), aiBottomLeft)),
25248  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft)) {
25249  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
25250  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
25251 
25252  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
25253  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue));
25254  setScaled(false, Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
25255 }
25256 
25257 QCPItemPixmap::~QCPItemPixmap() {}
25258 
25262 void QCPItemPixmap::setPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap) {
25263  mPixmap = pixmap;
25264  if (mPixmap.isNull())
25265  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "pixmap is null";
25266 }
25267 
25273 void QCPItemPixmap::setScaled(bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode aspectRatioMode,
25274  Qt::TransformationMode transformationMode) {
25275  mScaled = scaled;
25276  mAspectRatioMode = aspectRatioMode;
25277  mTransformationMode = transformationMode;
25278  updateScaledPixmap();
25279 }
25280 
25286 void QCPItemPixmap::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
25287 
25294 void QCPItemPixmap::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen) { mSelectedPen = pen; }
25295 
25296 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25297 double QCPItemPixmap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
25298  QVariant *details) const {
25299  Q_UNUSED(details)
25300  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
25301  return -1;
25302 
25303  return rectSelectTest(getFinalRect(), pos, true);
25304 }
25305 
25306 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25307 void QCPItemPixmap::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
25308  bool flipHorz = false;
25309  bool flipVert = false;
25310  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
25311  double clipPad = mainPen().style() == Qt::NoPen ? 0 : mainPen().widthF();
25312  QRect boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
25313  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect())) {
25314  updateScaledPixmap(rect, flipHorz, flipVert);
25315  painter->drawPixmap(rect.topLeft(), mScaled ? mScaledPixmap : mPixmap);
25316  QPen pen = mainPen();
25317  if (pen.style() != Qt::NoPen) {
25318  painter->setPen(pen);
25319  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
25320  painter->drawRect(rect);
25321  }
25322  }
25323 }
25324 
25325 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25326 QPointF QCPItemPixmap::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const {
25327  bool flipHorz;
25328  bool flipVert;
25329  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
25330  // we actually want denormal rects (negative width/height) here, so restore
25331  // the flipped state:
25332  if (flipHorz)
25333  rect.adjust(rect.width(), 0, -rect.width(), 0);
25334  if (flipVert)
25335  rect.adjust(0, rect.height(), 0, -rect.height());
25336 
25337  switch (anchorId) {
25338  case aiTop:
25339  return (rect.topLeft() + rect.topRight()) * 0.5;
25340  case aiTopRight:
25341  return rect.topRight();
25342  case aiRight:
25343  return (rect.topRight() + rect.bottomRight()) * 0.5;
25344  case aiBottom:
25345  return (rect.bottomLeft() + rect.bottomRight()) * 0.5;
25346  case aiBottomLeft:
25347  return rect.bottomLeft();
25348  case aiLeft:
25349  return (rect.topLeft() + rect.bottomLeft()) * 0.5;
25350  ;
25351  }
25352 
25353  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
25354  return QPointF();
25355 }
25356 
25375 void QCPItemPixmap::updateScaledPixmap(QRect finalRect, bool flipHorz,
25376  bool flipVert) {
25377  if (mPixmap.isNull())
25378  return;
25379 
25380  if (mScaled) {
25381  if (finalRect.isNull())
25382  finalRect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
25383  if (finalRect.size() != mScaledPixmap.size()) {
25384  mScaledPixmap = mPixmap.scaled(finalRect.size(), mAspectRatioMode,
25385  mTransformationMode);
25386  if (flipHorz || flipVert)
25387  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap::fromImage(
25388  mScaledPixmap.toImage().mirrored(flipHorz, flipVert));
25389  }
25390  } else if (!mScaledPixmap.isNull())
25391  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap();
25392 }
25393 
25415 QRect QCPItemPixmap::getFinalRect(bool *flippedHorz, bool *flippedVert) const {
25416  QRect result;
25417  bool flipHorz = false;
25418  bool flipVert = false;
25419  QPoint p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint().toPoint();
25420  QPoint p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint().toPoint();
25421  if (p1 == p2)
25422  return QRect(p1, QSize(0, 0));
25423  if (mScaled) {
25424  QSize newSize = QSize(p2.x() - p1.x(), p2.y() - p1.y());
25425  QPoint topLeft = p1;
25426  if (newSize.width() < 0) {
25427  flipHorz = true;
25428  newSize.rwidth() *= -1;
25429  topLeft.setX(p2.x());
25430  }
25431  if (newSize.height() < 0) {
25432  flipVert = true;
25433  newSize.rheight() *= -1;
25434  topLeft.setY(p2.y());
25435  }
25436  QSize scaledSize = mPixmap.size();
25437  scaledSize.scale(newSize, mAspectRatioMode);
25438  result = QRect(topLeft, scaledSize);
25439  } else {
25440  result = QRect(p1, mPixmap.size());
25441  }
25442  if (flippedHorz)
25443  *flippedHorz = flipHorz;
25444  if (flippedVert)
25445  *flippedVert = flipVert;
25446  return result;
25447 }
25448 
25455 QPen QCPItemPixmap::mainPen() const { return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen; }
25456 
25460 
25511 QCPItemTracer::QCPItemTracer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
25512  : QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
25513  position(createPosition(QLatin1String("position"))), mGraph(0) {
25514  position->setCoords(0, 0);
25515 
25516  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
25517  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
25518  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
25519  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
25520  setStyle(tsCrosshair);
25521  setSize(6);
25522  setInterpolating(false);
25523  setGraphKey(0);
25524 }
25525 
25526 QCPItemTracer::~QCPItemTracer() {}
25527 
25533 void QCPItemTracer::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
25534 
25540 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen) { mSelectedPen = pen; }
25541 
25547 void QCPItemTracer::setBrush(const QBrush &brush) { mBrush = brush; }
25548 
25555 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush) {
25556  mSelectedBrush = brush;
25557 }
25558 
25564 void QCPItemTracer::setSize(double size) { mSize = size; }
25565 
25573 void QCPItemTracer::setStyle(QCPItemTracer::TracerStyle style) {
25574  mStyle = style;
25575 }
25576 
25591 void QCPItemTracer::setGraph(QCPGraph *graph) {
25592  if (graph) {
25593  if (graph->parentPlot() == mParentPlot) {
25594  position->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
25595  position->setAxes(graph->keyAxis(), graph->valueAxis());
25596  mGraph = graph;
25597  updatePosition();
25598  } else
25599  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
25600  << "graph isn't in same QCustomPlot instance as this item";
25601  } else {
25602  mGraph = 0;
25603  }
25604 }
25605 
25618 void QCPItemTracer::setGraphKey(double key) { mGraphKey = key; }
25619 
25636 void QCPItemTracer::setInterpolating(bool enabled) { mInterpolating = enabled; }
25637 
25638 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25639 double QCPItemTracer::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
25640  QVariant *details) const {
25641  Q_UNUSED(details)
25642  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
25643  return -1;
25644 
25645  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
25646  double w = mSize / 2.0;
25647  QRect clip = clipRect();
25648  switch (mStyle) {
25649  case tsNone:
25650  return -1;
25651  case tsPlus: {
25652  if (clipRect().intersects(
25653  QRectF(center - QPointF(w, w), center + QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
25654  return qSqrt(qMin(
25655  distSqrToLine(center + QPointF(-w, 0), center + QPointF(w, 0), pos),
25656  distSqrToLine(center + QPointF(0, -w), center + QPointF(0, w), pos)));
25657  break;
25658  }
25659  case tsCrosshair: {
25660  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(QPointF(clip.left(), center.y()),
25661  QPointF(clip.right(), center.y()), pos),
25662  distSqrToLine(QPointF(center.x(), clip.top()),
25663  QPointF(center.x(), clip.bottom()), pos)));
25664  }
25665  case tsCircle: {
25666  if (clip.intersects(
25667  QRectF(center - QPointF(w, w), center + QPointF(w, w)).toRect())) {
25668  // distance to border:
25669  double centerDist = QVector2D(center - pos).length();
25670  double circleLine = w;
25671  double result = qAbs(centerDist - circleLine);
25672  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
25673  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99 &&
25674  mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0) {
25675  if (centerDist <= circleLine)
25676  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance() * 0.99;
25677  }
25678  return result;
25679  }
25680  break;
25681  }
25682  case tsSquare: {
25683  if (clip.intersects(
25684  QRectF(center - QPointF(w, w), center + QPointF(w, w)).toRect())) {
25685  QRectF rect = QRectF(center - QPointF(w, w), center + QPointF(w, w));
25686  bool filledRect =
25687  mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
25688  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
25689  }
25690  break;
25691  }
25692  }
25693  return -1;
25694 }
25695 
25696 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25697 void QCPItemTracer::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
25698  updatePosition();
25699  if (mStyle == tsNone)
25700  return;
25701 
25702  painter->setPen(mainPen());
25703  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
25704  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
25705  double w = mSize / 2.0;
25706  QRect clip = clipRect();
25707  switch (mStyle) {
25708  case tsNone:
25709  return;
25710  case tsPlus: {
25711  if (clip.intersects(
25712  QRectF(center - QPointF(w, w), center + QPointF(w, w)).toRect())) {
25713  painter->drawLine(
25714  QLineF(center + QPointF(-w, 0), center + QPointF(w, 0)));
25715  painter->drawLine(
25716  QLineF(center + QPointF(0, -w), center + QPointF(0, w)));
25717  }
25718  break;
25719  }
25720  case tsCrosshair: {
25721  if (center.y() > clip.top() && center.y() < clip.bottom())
25722  painter->drawLine(
25723  QLineF(clip.left(), center.y(), clip.right(), center.y()));
25724  if (center.x() > clip.left() && center.x() < clip.right())
25725  painter->drawLine(
25726  QLineF(center.x(), clip.top(), center.x(), clip.bottom()));
25727  break;
25728  }
25729  case tsCircle: {
25730  if (clip.intersects(
25731  QRectF(center - QPointF(w, w), center + QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
25732  painter->drawEllipse(center, w, w);
25733  break;
25734  }
25735  case tsSquare: {
25736  if (clip.intersects(
25737  QRectF(center - QPointF(w, w), center + QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
25738  painter->drawRect(QRectF(center - QPointF(w, w), center + QPointF(w, w)));
25739  break;
25740  }
25741  }
25742 }
25743 
25762 void QCPItemTracer::updatePosition() {
25763  if (mGraph) {
25764  if (mParentPlot->hasPlottable(mGraph)) {
25765  if (mGraph->data()->size() > 1) {
25766  QCPDataMap::const_iterator first = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
25767  QCPDataMap::const_iterator last = mGraph->data()->constEnd() - 1;
25768  if (mGraphKey < first.key())
25769  position->setCoords(first.key(), first.value().value);
25770  else if (mGraphKey > last.key())
25771  position->setCoords(last.key(), last.value().value);
25772  else {
25773  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->lowerBound(mGraphKey);
25774  if (it != first) // mGraphKey is somewhere between iterators
25775  {
25776  QCPDataMap::const_iterator prevIt = it - 1;
25777  if (mInterpolating) {
25778  // interpolate between iterators around mGraphKey:
25779  double slope = 0;
25780  if (!qFuzzyCompare((double)it.key(), (double)prevIt.key()))
25781  slope = (it.value().value - prevIt.value().value) /
25782  (it.key() - prevIt.key());
25783  position->setCoords(mGraphKey,
25784  (mGraphKey - prevIt.key()) * slope +
25785  prevIt.value().value);
25786  } else {
25787  // find iterator with key closest to mGraphKey:
25788  if (mGraphKey < (prevIt.key() + it.key()) * 0.5)
25789  it = prevIt;
25790  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
25791  }
25792  } else // mGraphKey is exactly on first iterator
25793  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
25794  }
25795  } else if (mGraph->data()->size() == 1) {
25796  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
25797  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
25798  } else
25799  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph has no data";
25800  } else
25801  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO
25802  << "graph not contained in QCustomPlot instance (anymore)";
25803  }
25804 }
25805 
25812 QPen QCPItemTracer::mainPen() const { return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen; }
25813 
25820 QBrush QCPItemTracer::mainBrush() const {
25821  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
25822 }
25823 
25827 
25860 QCPItemBracket::QCPItemBracket(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
25861  : QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot), left(createPosition(QLatin1String("left"))),
25862  right(createPosition(QLatin1String("right"))),
25863  center(createAnchor(QLatin1String("center"), aiCenter)) {
25864  left->setCoords(0, 0);
25865  right->setCoords(1, 1);
25866 
25867  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
25868  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
25869  setLength(8);
25870  setStyle(bsCalligraphic);
25871 }
25872 
25873 QCPItemBracket::~QCPItemBracket() {}
25874 
25886 void QCPItemBracket::setPen(const QPen &pen) { mPen = pen; }
25887 
25893 void QCPItemBracket::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen) { mSelectedPen = pen; }
25894 
25907 void QCPItemBracket::setLength(double length) { mLength = length; }
25908 
25914 void QCPItemBracket::setStyle(QCPItemBracket::BracketStyle style) {
25915  mStyle = style;
25916 }
25917 
25918 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25919 double QCPItemBracket::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable,
25920  QVariant *details) const {
25921  Q_UNUSED(details)
25922  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
25923  return -1;
25924 
25925  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
25926  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
25927  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
25928  return -1;
25929 
25930  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec - leftVec) * 0.5f;
25931  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
25932  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized() * mLength;
25933  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec + leftVec) * 0.5f - lengthVec;
25934 
25935  switch (mStyle) {
25936  case QCPItemBracket::bsSquare:
25937  case QCPItemBracket::bsRound: {
25938  double a = distSqrToLine((centerVec - widthVec).toPointF(),
25939  (centerVec + widthVec).toPointF(), pos);
25940  double b = distSqrToLine((centerVec - widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF(),
25941  (centerVec - widthVec).toPointF(), pos);
25942  double c = distSqrToLine((centerVec + widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF(),
25943  (centerVec + widthVec).toPointF(), pos);
25944  return qSqrt(qMin(qMin(a, b), c));
25945  }
25946  case QCPItemBracket::bsCurly:
25947  case QCPItemBracket::bsCalligraphic: {
25948  double a = distSqrToLine(
25949  (centerVec - widthVec * 0.75f + lengthVec * 0.15f).toPointF(),
25950  (centerVec + lengthVec * 0.3f).toPointF(), pos);
25951  double b = distSqrToLine(
25952  (centerVec - widthVec + lengthVec * 0.7f).toPointF(),
25953  (centerVec - widthVec * 0.75f + lengthVec * 0.15f).toPointF(), pos);
25954  double c = distSqrToLine(
25955  (centerVec + widthVec * 0.75f + lengthVec * 0.15f).toPointF(),
25956  (centerVec + lengthVec * 0.3f).toPointF(), pos);
25957  double d = distSqrToLine(
25958  (centerVec + widthVec + lengthVec * 0.7f).toPointF(),
25959  (centerVec + widthVec * 0.75f + lengthVec * 0.15f).toPointF(), pos);
25960  return qSqrt(qMin(qMin(a, b), qMin(c, d)));
25961  }
25962  }
25963  return -1;
25964 }
25965 
25966 /* inherits documentation from base class */
25967 void QCPItemBracket::draw(QCPPainter *painter) {
25968  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
25969  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
25970  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
25971  return;
25972 
25973  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec - leftVec) * 0.5f;
25974  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
25975  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized() * mLength;
25976  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec + leftVec) * 0.5f - lengthVec;
25977 
25978  QPolygon boundingPoly;
25979  boundingPoly << leftVec.toPoint() << rightVec.toPoint()
25980  << (rightVec - lengthVec).toPoint()
25981  << (leftVec - lengthVec).toPoint();
25982  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(),
25983  mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
25984  if (clip.intersects(boundingPoly.boundingRect())) {
25985  painter->setPen(mainPen());
25986  switch (mStyle) {
25987  case bsSquare: {
25988  painter->drawLine((centerVec + widthVec).toPointF(),
25989  (centerVec - widthVec).toPointF());
25990  painter->drawLine((centerVec + widthVec).toPointF(),
25991  (centerVec + widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF());
25992  painter->drawLine((centerVec - widthVec).toPointF(),
25993  (centerVec - widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF());
25994  break;
25995  }
25996  case bsRound: {
25997  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
25998  QPainterPath path;
25999  path.moveTo((centerVec + widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF());
26000  path.cubicTo((centerVec + widthVec).toPointF(),
26001  (centerVec + widthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
26002  path.cubicTo((centerVec - widthVec).toPointF(),
26003  (centerVec - widthVec).toPointF(),
26004  (centerVec - widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF());
26005  painter->drawPath(path);
26006  break;
26007  }
26008  case bsCurly: {
26009  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
26010  QPainterPath path;
26011  path.moveTo((centerVec + widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF());
26012  path.cubicTo((centerVec + widthVec - lengthVec * 0.8f).toPointF(),
26013  (centerVec + 0.4f * widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF(),
26014  centerVec.toPointF());
26015  path.cubicTo((centerVec - 0.4f * widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF(),
26016  (centerVec - widthVec - lengthVec * 0.8f).toPointF(),
26017  (centerVec - widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF());
26018  painter->drawPath(path);
26019  break;
26020  }
26021  case bsCalligraphic: {
26022  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
26023  painter->setBrush(QBrush(mainPen().color()));
26024  QPainterPath path;
26025  path.moveTo((centerVec + widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF());
26026 
26027  path.cubicTo((centerVec + widthVec - lengthVec * 0.8f).toPointF(),
26028  (centerVec + 0.4f * widthVec + 0.8f * lengthVec).toPointF(),
26029  centerVec.toPointF());
26030  path.cubicTo((centerVec - 0.4f * widthVec + 0.8f * lengthVec).toPointF(),
26031  (centerVec - widthVec - lengthVec * 0.8f).toPointF(),
26032  (centerVec - widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF());
26033 
26034  path.cubicTo((centerVec - widthVec - lengthVec * 0.5f).toPointF(),
26035  (centerVec - 0.2f * widthVec + 1.2f * lengthVec).toPointF(),
26036  (centerVec + lengthVec * 0.2f).toPointF());
26037  path.cubicTo((centerVec + 0.2f * widthVec + 1.2f * lengthVec).toPointF(),
26038  (centerVec + widthVec - lengthVec * 0.5f).toPointF(),
26039  (centerVec + widthVec + lengthVec).toPointF());
26040 
26041  painter->drawPath(path);
26042  break;
26043  }
26044  }
26045  }
26046 }
26047 
26048 /* inherits documentation from base class */
26049 QPointF QCPItemBracket::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const {
26050  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
26051  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
26052  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
26053  return leftVec.toPointF();
26054 
26055  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec - leftVec) * 0.5f;
26056  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
26057  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized() * mLength;
26058  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec + leftVec) * 0.5f - lengthVec;
26059 
26060  switch (anchorId) {
26061  case aiCenter:
26062  return centerVec.toPointF();
26063  }
26064  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
26065  return QPointF();
26066 }
26067 
26073 QPen QCPItemBracket::mainPen() const { return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen; }

Definition: qcustomplot.h:3817

Definition: qcustomplot.h:3875
